name: numbertheory_4x3m7y3neq2003
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  mod7_eq (x y : ℤ) (h : 4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 = 2003) :
    (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 1 := by
  have h₁ : (4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 : ℤ) = 2003 := by exact_mod_cast h
  have h₂ : (4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 2003 % 7 := by
    rw [h₁]
  have h₃ : (4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 := by
    have h₄ : (7 * y ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 0 := by
      have h₅ : (7 : ℤ) % 7 = 0 := by norm_num
      have h₆ : (7 * y ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 0 := by
        simp [h₅, Int.mul_emod, pow_three]
      exact h₆
    have h₅ : (4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 := by
      omega
    exact h₅
  have h₆ : (2003 : ℤ) % 7 = 1 := by norm_num
  have h₇ : (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 1 := by
    omega
  exact h₇

lemma cube_mod7_cases (x : ℤ) :
    (x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 0 ∨ (x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 1 ∨ (x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 6 := by
  have h₁ : (x : ℤ) % 7 = 0 ∨ (x : ℤ) % 7 = 1 ∨ (x : ℤ) % 7 = 2 ∨ (x : ℤ) % 7 = 3 ∨
            (x : ℤ) % 7 = 4 ∨ (x : ℤ) % 7 = 5 ∨ (x : ℤ) % 7 = 6 := by
    omega
  rcases h₁ with (h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁) <;>
    (try omega) <;>
    (try {
      simp [h₁, pow_three, Int.mul_emod, Int.add_emod, Int.sub_emod] <;>
      norm_num <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try { aesop })
    })

lemma impossible_mod7 (x y : ℤ) (h : 4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 = 2003) : False := by
  have h₁ : (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 1 := mod7_eq x y h
  have h₂ : (x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 0 ∨ (x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 1 ∨ (x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 6 :=
    cube_mod7_cases x
  rcases h₂ with h₂ | h₂ | h₂
  · 
    have h₃ : (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 0 := by
      omega
    omega
  · 
    have h₃ : (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 4 := by
      omega
    omega
  · 
    have h₃ : (4 * x ^ 3 : ℤ) % 7 = 2 := by
      omega
    omega

theorem numbertheory_4x3m7y3neq2003 (x y : ℤ) : 4 * x ^ 3 - 7 * y ^ 3 ≠ 2003 := by
  intro h
  have h₁ : False := impossible_mod7 x y h
  exact h₁

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

theorem aime_1983_p1 (x y z w : ℕ) (ht : 1 < x ∧ 1 < y ∧ 1 < z) (hw : 0 ≤ w)
    (h0 : Real.log w / Real.log x = 24) (h1 : Real.log w / Real.log y = 40)
    (h2 : Real.log w / Real.log (x * y * z) = 12) : Real.log w / Real.log z = 60 := by
  have h3 : Real.log x > 0 := by
    have hx : (x : ℝ) > 1 := by
      norm_cast
      linarith [ht.1]
    have : Real.log (x : ℝ) > 0 := Real.log_pos hx
    exact this
  
  have h4 : Real.log y > 0 := by
    have hy : (y : ℝ) > 1 := by
      norm_cast
      linarith [ht.2.1]
    have : Real.log (y : ℝ) > 0 := Real.log_pos hy
    exact this
  
  have h5 : Real.log z > 0 := by
    have hz : (z : ℝ) > 1 := by
      norm_cast
      linarith [ht.2.2]
    have : Real.log (z : ℝ) > 0 := Real.log_pos hz
    exact this
  
  have h6 : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z := by
    have h6₁ : (x : ℝ) > 0 := by
      norm_cast
      linarith [ht.1]
    have h6₂ : (y : ℝ) > 0 := by
      norm_cast
      linarith [ht.2.1]
    have h6₃ : (z : ℝ) > 0 := by
      norm_cast
      linarith [ht.2.2]
    have h6₄ : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) := rfl
    have h6₅ : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) := rfl
    have h6₆ : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z := by
      have h6₇ : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log ((x : ℝ) * (y : ℝ) * (z : ℝ)) := by norm_num
      rw [h6₇]
      have h6₈ : Real.log ((x : ℝ) * (y : ℝ) * (z : ℝ)) = Real.log ((x : ℝ) * (y : ℝ)) + Real.log (z : ℝ) := by
        rw [Real.log_mul (by positivity) (by positivity)]
      rw [h6₈]
      have h6₉ : Real.log ((x : ℝ) * (y : ℝ)) = Real.log (x : ℝ) + Real.log (y : ℝ) := by
        rw [Real.log_mul (by positivity) (by positivity)]
      rw [h6₉]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> linarith
    exact h6₆
  
  have h7 : Real.log w = 24 * Real.log x := by
    have h7₁ : Real.log w / Real.log x = 24 := h0
    have h7₂ : Real.log x ≠ 0 := by linarith [h3]
    field_simp [h7₂] at h7₁
    linarith
  
  have h8 : Real.log w = 40 * Real.log y := by
    have h8₁ : Real.log w / Real.log y = 40 := h1
    have h8₂ : Real.log y ≠ 0 := by linarith [h4]
    field_simp [h8₂] at h8₁
    linarith
  
  have h9 : 24 * Real.log x = 40 * Real.log y := by
    linarith [h7, h8]
  
  have h10 : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z := by
    exact h6
  
  have h11 : Real.log w = 12 * (Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z) := by
    have h11₁ : Real.log w / Real.log (x * y * z) = 12 := h2
    have h11₂ : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) ≠ 0 := by
      have h11₃ : Real.log (x * y * z : ℝ) = Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z := h10
      have h11₄ : Real.log x > 0 := h3
      have h11₅ : Real.log y > 0 := h4
      have h11₆ : Real.log z > 0 := h5
      have h11₇ : Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z > 0 := by linarith
      linarith
    have h11₃ : Real.log w = 12 * Real.log (x * y * z) := by
      field_simp [h11₂] at h11₁
      linarith
    rw [h11₃]
    <;>
      (try simp_all [h10]) <;>
      (try ring_nf at * <;> linarith) <;>
      (try norm_num) <;>
      (try linarith)
  
  have h12 : Real.log x = Real.log y + Real.log z := by
    have h12₁ : Real.log w = 24 * Real.log x := h7
    have h12₂ : Real.log w = 12 * (Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z) := h11
    have h12₃ : 24 * Real.log x = 12 * (Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z) := by linarith
    have h12₄ : 2 * Real.log x = Real.log x + Real.log y + Real.log z := by linarith
    have h12₅ : Real.log x = Real.log y + Real.log z := by linarith
    exact h12₅
  
  have h13 : 3 * Real.log x = 5 * Real.log y := by
    linarith
  
  have h14 : 3 * Real.log z = 2 * Real.log y := by
    have h14₁ : 3 * Real.log x = 5 * Real.log y := h13
    have h14₂ : Real.log x = Real.log y + Real.log z := h12
    rw [h14₂] at h14₁
    ring_nf at h14₁ ⊢
    linarith
  
  have h15 : Real.log w = 60 * Real.log z := by
    have h15₁ : Real.log w = 40 * Real.log y := h8
    have h15₂ : 3 * Real.log z = 2 * Real.log y := h14
    have h15₃ : Real.log w = 60 * Real.log z := by
      have h15₄ : 60 * Real.log z = 40 * Real.log y := by
        linarith
      linarith [h15₁]
    exact h15₃
  
  have h16 : Real.log w / Real.log z = 60 := by
    have h16₁ : Real.log w = 60 * Real.log z := h15
    have h16₂ : Real.log z ≠ 0 := by linarith [h5]
    rw [h16₁]
    field_simp [h16₂]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> linarith
  
  exact h16

name: mathd_algebra_141

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  sum_eq (a b : ℝ) (h₂ : 2 * (a + b) = 54) : a + b = 27 := by
  have h₃ : a + b = 27 := by
    linarith
  exact h₃

lemma square_of_sum (a b : ℝ) : (a + b) ^ 2 = a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 + 2 * (a * b) := by
  ring

lemma sum_of_squares_eq_369 (a b : ℝ) (h₁ : a * b = 180) (h₂ : 2 * (a + b) = 54) :
    a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 369 := by
  have h_sum : a + b = 27 := sum_eq a b h₂
  have h_sq : (a + b) ^ 2 = a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 + 2 * (a * b) := square_of_sum a b
  have h_sq_val : (a + b) ^ 2 = 729 := by
    rw [h_sum]
    norm_num
  have h_expand : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 + 2 * (a * b) = 729 := by
    linarith [h_sq, h_sq_val]
  have h_final : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 369 := by
    linarith [h₁, h_expand]
  exact h_final

theorem mathd_algebra_141 (a b : ℝ) (h₁ : a * b = 180) (h₂ : 2 * (a + b) = 54) :
    a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 369 := by
  exact sum_of_squares_eq_369 a b h₁ h₂

name: mathd_algebra_209
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  σ1_10_eq_2 (σ : Equiv ℝ ℝ) (h₀ : σ.2 2 = 10) :
    σ.1 10 = 2 := by
  have h₃ := σ.left_inv 2
  have h₄ : σ.1 (σ.2 2) = 2 := by simpa using h₃
  have h₅ : σ.1 10 = 2 := by
    have h₆ : σ.2 2 = 10 := h₀
    calc
      σ.1 10 = σ.1 (σ.2 2) := by simpa [h₆]
      _ = 2 := by simpa using h₄
  exact h₅

lemma σ1_2_eq_1 (σ : Equiv ℝ ℝ) (h₂ : σ.2 1 = 2) :
    σ.1 2 = 1 := by
  have h₃ := σ.left_inv 1
  have h₄ : σ.1 (σ.2 1) = 1 := by simpa using h₃
  have h₅ : σ.1 2 = 1 := by
    have h₆ : σ.2 1 = 2 := h₂
    calc
      σ.1 2 = σ.1 (σ.2 1) := by simpa [h₆]
      _ = 1 := by simpa using h₄
  exact h₅

theorem mathd_algebra_209 (σ : Equiv ℝ ℝ) (h₀ : σ.2 2 = 10) (h₁ : σ.2 10 = 1) (h₂ : σ.2 1 = 2) :
    σ.1 (σ.1 10) = 1 := by
  have h₃ : σ.1 10 = 2 := σ1_10_eq_2 σ h₀
  have h₄ : σ.1 2 = 1 := σ1_2_eq_1 σ h₂
  calc
    σ.1 (σ.1 10) = σ.1 2 := by simpa [h₃]
    _ = 1 := by simpa [h₄]

lemma  n_eq_4_of_range_and_dvd (n : ℕ) (h₀ : n ≤ 9)
    (h₁ : 18 ∣ 374 * 10 + n) : n = 4 := by
  have h₂ : n ≤ 9 := h₀
  have h₃ : 18 ∣ 374 * 10 + n := h₁

lemma  y_eq_of_two_mul_x (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : x ≠ 0) (h₁ : 2 * x = 5 * y) :
    y = (2 / 5 : ℝ) * x := by
  have h₃ : y = (2 / 5 : ℝ) * x := by
    have h₄ : 2 * x = 5 * y := h₁
    ring_nf at h₄ ⊢
    nlinarith
  exact h₃

lemma z_eq_of_seven_mul_y (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : x ≠ 0) (h₁ : 2 * x = 5 * y)
    (h₂ : 7 * y = 10 * z) (h₃ : y = (2 / 5 : ℝ) * x) :
    z = (7 / 25 : ℝ) * x := by
  have h₅ : 7 * y = 10 * z := h₂
  have h₆ : y = (2 / 5 : ℝ) * x := h₃
  rw [h₆] at h₅
  ring_nf at h₅ ⊢
  nlinarith

lemma z_div_x_eq (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : x ≠ 0) (h₃ : y = (2 / 5 : ℝ) * x)
    (h₄ : z = (7 / 25 : ℝ) * x) :
    z / x = (7 / 25 : ℝ) := by
  have h₅ : z = (7 / 25 : ℝ) * x := h₄
  rw [h₅]
  field_simp [h₀]
  <;> ring
  <;> nlinarith

theorem mathd_algebra_33 (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : x ≠ 0) (h₁ : 2 * x = 5 * y) (h₂ : 7 * y = 10 * z) :
    z / x = 7 / 25 := by
  have h₃ : y = (2 / 5 : ℝ) * x := y_eq_of_two_mul_x x y z h₀ h₁
  have h₄ : z = (7 / 25 : ℝ) * x := z_eq_of_seven_mul_y x y z h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  exact z_div_x_eq x y z h₀ h₃ h₄

lemma  h₁_eq (x : ℝ)
    (h₀ : 2 + 1 / (1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x))) = 144 / 53) :
    2 + (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 144 / 53 := by
  have h₁ : 2 + 1 / (1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x))) = 144 / 53 := h₀
  have h₂ : (3 + x) ≠ 0 := by
    by_contra h

    norm_num at h₁ ⊢

  have h₃ : (8 + 2 * x) ≠ 0 := by
    by_contra h
    have h₄ : 8 + 2 * x = 0 := by linarith
    have h₅ : x = -4 := by linarith
    rw [h₅] at h₁
    norm_num at h₁ ⊢
    <;>
    (try contradiction) <;>
    (try norm_num at h₁ ⊢) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        field_simp [add_assoc] at h₁ ⊢
        <;> ring_nf at h₁ ⊢ <;> nlinarith
      })
  have h₄ : (11 + 3 * x) ≠ 0 := by
    by_contra h
    have h₅ : 11 + 3 * x = 0 := by linarith
    have h₆ : x = -11 / 3 := by linarith
    rw [h₆] at h₁
    norm_num at h₁ ⊢
    <;>
    (try contradiction) <;>
    (try norm_num at h₁ ⊢) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        field_simp [add_assoc] at h₁ ⊢
        <;> ring_nf at h₁ ⊢ <;> nlinarith
      })
  have h₅ : 2 + 1 / (1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x))) = 144 / 53 := h₁
  have h₆ : 2 + (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 144 / 53 := by
    have h₇ : 2 + 1 / (1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x))) = 144 / 53 := h₁
    have h₈ : 1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x)) = (11 + 3 * x) / (8 + 2 * x) := by
      have h₉ : 1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x)) = (11 + 3 * x) / (8 + 2 * x) := by
        have h₁₀ : 2 + 2 / (3 + x) = (8 + 2 * x) / (3 + x) := by
          field_simp [h₂] <;> ring_nf <;> field_simp [h₂] <;> ring_nf
        rw [h₁₀]
        have h₁₁ : (3 + x) ≠ 0 := h₂
        have h₁₂ : (8 + 2 * x) ≠ 0 := h₃
        field_simp [h₁₁, h₁₂] <;> ring_nf <;> field_simp [h₁₁, h₁₂] <;> ring_nf
        <;>
          (try
            {
              nlinarith [sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₁₁), sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₁₂)]
            })
      rw [h₉]
    rw [h₈] at h₇
    have h₉ : (11 + 3 * x) ≠ 0 := h₄
    have h₁₀ : (8 + 2 * x) ≠ 0 := h₃
    have h₁₁ : 2 + 1 / ((11 + 3 * x) / (8 + 2 * x)) = 144 / 53 := by
      simpa [div_eq_mul_inv] using h₇
    have h₁₂ : 2 + 1 / ((11 + 3 * x) / (8 + 2 * x)) = 2 + (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) := by
      field_simp [h₉, h₁₀] <;> ring_nf <;> field_simp [h₉, h₁₀] <;> ring_nf
    rw [h₁₂] at h₁₁
    linarith
  exact h₆


lemma h₂_eq (x : ℝ)
    (h₁ : 2 + (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 144 / 53) :
    (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 38 / 53 := by

  linarith


lemma h₃_eq (x : ℝ)
    (h₂ : (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 38 / 53) :
    x = 3 / 4 := by
  have h₃ : (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 38 / 53 := h₂
  have h₄ : (11 + 3 * x) ≠ 0 := by
    by_contra h
    rw [h] at h₃
    norm_num at h₃
    <;>
    (try contradiction) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        field_simp at h₃ ⊢
        <;> ring_nf at h₃ ⊢
        <;> nlinarith
      })
  have h₅ : (8 + 2 * x) = (38 / 53) * (11 + 3 * x) := by
    field_simp at h₃
    <;>
    (try ring_nf at h₃ ⊢) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        nlinarith [sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₄)]

    <;>
    nlinarith
  have h₆ : x = 3 / 4 := by
    nlinarith [sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₄)]
  exact h₆

theorem amc12b_2021_p3 (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 2 + 1 / (1 + 1 / (2 + 2 / (3 + x))) = 144 / 53) : x = 3 / 4 := by
  have h₁ : 2 + (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 144 / 53 := h₁_eq x h₀
  have h₂ : (8 + 2 * x) / (11 + 3 * x) = 38 / 53 := h₂_eq x h₁
  have h₃ : x = 3 / 4 := h₃_eq x h₂
  exact h₃

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  expr_eq (a b : ℝ) (h₀ : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 1) :
    a * b = (1 - (a - b) ^ 2) / 2 := by
  have h₁ : (a - b) ^ 2 = a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 - 2 * (a * b) := by
    ring
  have h₂ : (a - b) ^ 2 = 1 - 2 * (a * b) := by
    rw [h₁]
    nlinarith
  have h₃ : a * b = (1 - (a - b) ^ 2) / 2 := by
    linarith
  exact h₃


lemma quad_ineq (t : ℝ) (ht : t ≥ 0) :
    (1 - t ^ 2) / 2 + t ≤ 1 := by
  have h₁ : (1 - t ^ 2) / 2 + t ≤ 1 := by
    have h₂ : 0 ≤ (t - 1) ^ 2 := by nlinarith
    nlinarith
  exact h₁


lemma main_ineq (a b : ℝ) (h₀ : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 1) :
    a * b + abs (a - b) ≤ 1 := by
  have h₁ : a * b = (1 - (a - b) ^ 2) / 2 := expr_eq a b h₀
  have h₂ : abs (a - b) ≥ 0 := abs_nonneg (a - b)
  have h₃ : (1 - (abs (a - b)) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) ≤ (1 : ℝ) := by
    have h₄ : (abs (a - b) : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by exact_mod_cast h₂
    have h₅ : (1 - (abs (a - b)) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) ≤ (1 : ℝ) := by
      have h₆ : 0 ≤ (abs (a - b) : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₂
      have h₇ : (1 - (abs (a - b)) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) ≤ (1 : ℝ) := by
        have h₈ : (1 - (abs (a - b)) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) = (1 - (abs (a - b)) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) := by rfl
        rw [h₈]
        nlinarith [sq_nonneg (abs (a - b) - 1)]
      exact h₇
    exact h₅
  have h₄ : a * b + abs (a - b) ≤ 1 := by
    have h₅ : a * b = (1 - (a - b) ^ 2) / 2 := h₁
    have h₆ : (1 - (a - b) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) ≤ (1 : ℝ) := by
      have h₇ : (abs (a - b) : ℝ) = abs (a - b) := by norm_num
      have h₈ : (abs (a - b) : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by exact_mod_cast h₂
      have h₉ : (1 - (abs (a - b)) ^ 2) / 2 + abs (a - b) ≤ (1 : ℝ) := h₃
      have h₁₀ : (a - b) ^ 2 = (abs (a - b)) ^ 2 := by
        rw [sq_abs]
        <;>
        nlinarith [abs_nonneg (a - b)]
      nlinarith [h₁₀]
    nlinarith [h₅]
  exact h₄

theorem algebra_sqineq_unitcircatbpabsamblt1 (a b : ℝ) (h₀ : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 1) :
    a * b + abs (a - b) ≤ 1 := by
  exact main_ineq a b h₀

name: imo_1977_p6

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  f_one_eq_one (f : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : ∀ n, 0 < f n)
    (h₁ : ∀ n, 0 < n → f (f n) < f (n + 1)) : f 1 = 1 := by
  have h₂ : f 1 = 1 := by
    by_contra h₃
    have h₄ : f 1 ≠ 1 := h₃
    have h₅ : 0 < f 1 := h₀ 1
    have h₆ : f 1 > 1 := by
      by_contra h₇
      have h₈ : f 1 ≤ 1 := by linarith
      have h₉ : f 1 ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ 1]
      have h₁₀ : f 1 = 1 := by omega
      contradiction
    have h₇ : f (f 1) < f 2 := by
      have h₈ : 0 < (1 : ℕ) := by decide
      have h₉ := h₁ 1 h₈
      simpa using h₉
    have h₈ : 0 < f 1 := h₀ 1
    have h₉ : f (f (f 1)) < f (f 1 + 1) := by
      have h₁₀ : 0 < f 1 := by linarith
      have h₁₁ := h₁ (f 1) h₁₀
      simpa [Nat.add_comm] using h₁₁
    have h₁₀ : 0 < f (f 1) := h₀ (f 1)
    have h₁₁ : 0 < f 2 := h₀ 2
    have h₁₂ : f (f 1) < f 2 := by linarith
    have h₁₃ : f (f (f 1)) < f (f 1 + 1) := by linarith
    have h₁₄ : f (f 1) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (f 1)]
    have h₁₅ : f 2 ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ 2]
    have h₁₆ : f (f 1 + 1) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (f 1 + 1)]
    have h₁₇ : f (f (f 1)) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (f (f 1))]
    omega
  exact h₂


lemma f_eq_id (f : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : ∀ n, 0 < f n)
    (h₁ : ∀ n, 0 < n → f (f n) < f (n + 1)) : ∀ n, 0 < n → f n = n := by
  intro n hn
  have h₃ : ∀ n, 0 < n → f n = n := by
    intro n hn
    induction n using Nat.strong_induction_on with
    | h n ih =>
      match n with
      | 0 => contradiction
      | 1 =>
        have h₄ : f 1 = 1 := f_one_eq_one (f := f) (h₀ := h₀) (h₁ := h₁)
        simpa using h₄
      | (n + 2) =>
        have h₅ : 0 < (n + 2) := by linarith
        have h₆ : f (n + 2) = (n + 2) := by
          by_contra h₇
          have h₈ : f (n + 2) ≠ (n + 2) := h₇
          have h₉ : 0 < f (n + 2) := h₀ (n + 2)
          have h₁₀ : 0 < (n + 2) := by linarith
          have h₁₁ : f (f (n + 2)) < f ((n + 2) + 1) := h₁ (n + 2) h₁₀
          have h₁₂ : ∀ m, 0 < m → m < (n + 2) → f m = m := by
            intro m hm₁ hm₂
            have h₁₃ : m < (n + 2) := by linarith
            have h₁₄ : 0 < m := by linarith
            have h₁₅ : f m = m := by
              apply ih m
              <;> omega
              <;> omega
            exact h₁₅
          have h₁₃ : f (n + 2) > (n + 2) ∨ f (n + 2) < (n + 2) := by
            omega
          cases h₁₃ with
          | inl h₁₄ =>
            have h₁₅ : f (n + 2) > (n + 2) := h₁₄
            have h₁₆ : 0 < f (n + 2) := h₀ (n + 2)
            have h₁₇ : 0 < (n + 2) := by linarith
            have h₁₈ : f (f (n + 2)) < f ((n + 2) + 1) := h₁ (n + 2) h₁₇
            have h₁₉ : f (n + 2) ≥ (n + 2) + 1 := by omega
            have h₂₀ : f (f (n + 2)) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (f (n + 2))]
            have h₂₁ : f ((n + 2) + 1) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ ((n + 2) + 1)]
            omega
          | inr h₁₄ =>
            have h₁₅ : f (n + 2) < (n + 2) := h₁₄
            have h₁₆ : 0 < f (n + 2) := h₀ (n + 2)
            have h₁₇ : 0 < (n + 2) := by linarith
            have h₁₈ : f (f (n + 2)) < f ((n + 2) + 1) := h₁ (n + 2) h₁₇
            have h₁₉ : f (n + 2) ≤ (n + 2) - 1 := by omega
            have h₂₀ : f (f (n + 2)) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (f (n + 2))]
            have h₂₁ : f ((n + 2) + 1) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ ((n + 2) + 1)]
            have h₂₂ : f (f (n + 2)) < f ((n + 2) + 1) := h₁₈
            have h₂₃ : 0 < f (n + 2) := h₀ (n + 2)
            have h₂₄ : f (n + 2) < (n + 2) := h₁₅
            have h₂₅ : f (n + 2) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (n + 2)]
            have h₂₆ : ∀ m, 0 < m → m < (n + 2) → f m = m := by
              intro m hm₁ hm₂
              have h₂₇ : m < (n + 2) := by linarith
              have h₂₈ : 0 < m := by linarith
              have h₂₉ : f m = m := by
                apply ih m
                <;> omega
                <;> omega
              exact h₂₉
            have h₂₇ : f (f (n + 2)) = f (n + 2) := by
              have h₂₈ : f (n + 2) < (n + 2) := h₁₅
              have h₂₉ : 0 < f (n + 2) := h₀ (n + 2)
              have h₃₀ : f (n + 2) < (n + 2) := h₁₅
              have h₃₁ : f (f (n + 2)) < f ((n + 2) + 1) := h₁₈
              have h₃₂ : 0 < (n + 2) := by linarith
              have h₃₃ : f (n + 2) ≤ (n + 2) - 1 := by omega
              have h₃₄ : 0 < f (n + 2) := h₀ (n + 2)
              have h₃₅ : f (n + 2) < (n + 2) := h₁₅
              have h₃₆ : f (f (n + 2)) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ (f (n + 2))]
              have h₃₇ : f ((n + 2) + 1) ≥ 1 := by linarith [h₀ ((n + 2) + 1)]
              omega
            omega
        exact h₆
  exact h₃ n hn

theorem imo_1977_p6 (f : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : ∀ n, 0 < f n) (h₁ : ∀ n, 0 < n → f (f n) < f (n + 1)) :
    ∀ n, 0 < n → f n = n := by
  have h₂ : ∀ n, 0 < n → f n = n := by
    intro n hn
    exact (f_eq_id (f := f) (h₀ := h₀) (h₁ := h₁)) n hn
  intro n hn
  exact h₂ n hn

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  logb_eq_imp_n_eq_256 {n : ℕ} (h₀ : 1 < n)
    (h₁ : Real.logb 2 (Real.logb 16 n) = Real.logb 4 (Real.logb 4 n)) :
    n = 256 := by
  have h₂ : Real.logb 2 (Real.logb 16 n) = Real.logb 4 (Real.logb 4 n) := h₁
  have h₃ : Real.logb 16 n = Real.log n / Real.log 16 := by
    rw [Real.logb]
  have h₄ : Real.logb 4 n = Real.log n / Real.log 4 := by
    rw [Real.logb]
  have h₅ : Real.logb 2 (Real.logb 16 n) = Real.log (Real.logb 16 n) / Real.log 2 := by
    rw [Real.logb]
  have h₆ : Real.logb 4 (Real.logb 4 n) = Real.log (Real.logb 4 n) / Real.log 4 := by
    rw [Real.logb]
  have h₇ : Real.log 16 = 4 * Real.log 2 := by
    have h₇₁ : Real.log 16 = Real.log (2 ^ 4) := by norm_num
    rw [h₇₁]
    have h₇₂ : Real.log (2 ^ 4) = 4 * Real.log 2 := by
      rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
    rw [h₇₂]
  have h₈ : Real.log 4 = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
    have h₈₁ : Real.log 4 = Real.log (2 ^ 2) := by norm_num
    rw [h₈₁]
    have h₈₂ : Real.log (2 ^ 2) = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
      rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
    rw [h₈₂]
  have h₉ : Real.log (Real.logb 16 n) / Real.log 2 = Real.log (Real.logb 4 n) / Real.log 4 := by
    rw [h₅, h₆] at h₂
    exact h₂
  have h₁₀ : Real.log (Real.logb 16 n) / Real.log 2 = Real.log (Real.logb 4 n) / (2 * Real.log 2) := by
    rw [h₈] at h₉
    exact h₉
  have h₁₁ : Real.log (Real.logb 16 n) = Real.log (Real.logb 4 n) / 2 := by
    have h₁₁₁ : Real.log 2 ≠ 0 := by norm_num
    field_simp [h₁₁₁] at h₁₀ ⊢
    <;> nlinarith [Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 2)]
  have h₁₂ : Real.logb 16 n = Real.log n / (4 * Real.log 2) := by
    rw [h₃, h₇]
    <;> ring_nf
  have h₁₃ : Real.logb 4 n = Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) := by
    rw [h₄, h₈]
    <;> ring_nf
  have h₁₄ : Real.log (Real.log n / (4 * Real.log 2)) = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) / 2 := by
    rw [h₁₂, h₁₃] at h₁₁
    exact h₁₁
  have h₁₅ : Real.log (Real.log n / (4 * Real.log 2)) = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) - Real.log 2 := by
    have h₁₅₁ : Real.log (Real.log n / (4 * Real.log 2)) = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) / 2) := by
      congr 1 <;> field_simp <;> ring_nf
      <;> try norm_num
      <;> try linarith [Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 2)]
    rw [h₁₅₁]
    have h₁₅₂ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) / 2) = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) - Real.log 2 := by
      have h₁₅₃ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) / 2) = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) + Real.log (1 / 2) := by
        have h₁₅₄ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) / 2) = Real.log ((Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) * (1 / 2)) := by
          ring_nf
          <;> field_simp
          <;> ring_nf
        rw [h₁₅₄]
        have h₁₅₅ : Real.log ((Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) * (1 / 2)) = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) + Real.log (1 / 2) := by
          rw [Real.log_mul (by
            have h₁₅₆ : Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) > 0 := by
              have h₁₅₇ : (n : ℝ) > 1 := by exact_mod_cast h₀
              have h₁₅₈ : Real.log (n : ℝ) > 0 := Real.log_pos (by
                norm_num at h₀ ⊢
                <;> linarith)
              have h₁₅₉ : Real.log 2 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
              positivity
            positivity
          ) (by
            have h₁₅₆ : (1 / 2 : ℝ) > 0 := by norm_num
            positivity
          )]
          <;> ring_nf
        rw [h₁₅₅]
        <;> ring_nf
      rw [h₁₅₃]
      have h₁₅₆ : Real.log (1 / 2) = -Real.log 2 := by
        have h₁₅₇ : Real.log (1 / 2) = Real.log 1 - Real.log 2 := by
          rw [Real.log_div (by norm_num) (by norm_num)]
          <;> norm_num
        rw [h₁₅₇]
        have h₁₅₈ : Real.log 1 = 0 := by norm_num
        rw [h₁₅₈]
        <;> ring_nf
        <;> norm_num
      rw [h₁₅₆]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
    rw [h₁₅₂]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> norm_num
  have h₁₆ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) - Real.log 2 = Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) / 2 := by
    linarith [h₁₄, h₁₅]
  have h₁₇ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
    linarith [h₁₆]
  have h₁₈ : Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) = 4 := by
    have h₁₈₁ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) = Real.log 4 := by
      have h₁₈₂ : Real.log 4 = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
        have h₁₈₃ : Real.log 4 = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
          have h₁₈₄ : Real.log 4 = Real.log (2 ^ 2) := by norm_num
          rw [h₁₈₄]
          have h₁₈₅ : Real.log (2 ^ 2) = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
            rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
          rw [h₁₈₅]
        exact h₁₈₃
      rw [h₁₇] at *
      <;> linarith
    have h₁₈₅ : Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) > 0 := by
      have h₁₈₆ : (n : ℝ) > 1 := by exact_mod_cast h₀
      have h₁₈₇ : Real.log (n : ℝ) > 0 := Real.log_pos (by
        norm_num at h₀ ⊢
        <;> linarith)
      have h₁₈₈ : Real.log 2 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
      positivity
    have h₁₈₆ : Real.log (Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2)) = Real.log 4 := by linarith
    have h₁₈₇ : Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) = 4 := by
      apply Real.log_injOn_pos (Set.mem_Ioi.mpr h₁₈₅) (Set.mem_Ioi.mpr (by positivity))
      linarith
    linarith
  have h₁₉ : Real.log n = 8 * Real.log 2 := by
    have h₁₉₁ : Real.log n / (2 * Real.log 2) = 4 := h₁₈
    have h₁₉₂ : Real.log n = 8 * Real.log 2 := by
      have h₁₉₃ : Real.log 2 ≠ 0 := by norm_num
      field_simp [h₁₉₃] at h₁₉₁ ⊢
      <;> nlinarith [Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 2)]
    exact h₁₉₂
  have h₂₀ : (n : ℝ) = 256 := by
    have h₂₀₁ : Real.log (n : ℝ) = Real.log 256 := by
      have h₂₀₂ : Real.log 256 = 8 * Real.log 2 := by
        have h₂₀₃ : Real.log 256 = Real.log (2 ^ 8) := by norm_num
        rw [h₂₀₃]
        have h₂₀₄ : Real.log (2 ^ 8) = 8 * Real.log 2 := by
          rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
        rw [h₂₀₄]
      linarith [h₁₉]
    have h₂₀₅ : (n : ℝ) > 0 := by
      have h₂₀₆ : (n : ℕ) > 0 := by linarith
      exact_mod_cast (Nat.pos_of_ne_zero (by intro h; simp_all))
    have h₂₀₆ : (n : ℝ) = 256 := by
      apply Real.log_injOn_pos (Set.mem_Ioi.mpr (by positivity)) (Set.mem_Ioi.mpr (by positivity))
      linarith
    exact h₂₀₆
  have h₂₁ : n = 256 := by
    norm_cast at h₂₀ ⊢
    <;>
    (try norm_num at h₂₀ ⊢) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        ring_nf at h₂₀ ⊢
        <;> norm_cast at h₂₀ ⊢
        <;> nlinarith
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        simp_all [Nat.log_eq_iff]
        <;> norm_num at *
        <;> (try omega)
        <;> (try nlinarith)
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        norm_num at h₂₀ ⊢
        <;>
        (try
          {
            rcases n with (_ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | _ | n) <;>
            norm_num at h₂₀ ⊢ <;>
            (try contradiction) <;>
            (try linarith) <;>
            (try nlinarith)
          })
        <;>
        (try
          {
            simp_all [Nat.log_eq_iff]
            <;> norm_num at *
            <;> (try omega)
            <;> (try nlinarith)
          })
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        simp_all [Nat.log_eq_iff]
        <;> norm_num at *
        <;> (try omega)
        <;> (try nlinarith)
      })
  exact h₂₁

theorem amc12a_2020_p10 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 1 < n)
    (h₁ : Real.logb 2 (Real.logb 16 n) = Real.logb 4 (Real.logb 4 n)) :
    (List.sum (Nat.digits 10 n)) = 13 := by
  have h₂ : n = 256 := by
    exact logb_eq_imp_n_eq_256 (n := n) h₀ h₁
  rw [h₂]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

name: imo_1960_p2

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  lower_bound_of_h₀ (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 ≤ 1 + 2 * x) : -(1 / 2) ≤ x := by
  have h₄ : -(1 / 2) ≤ x := by
    linarith
  exact h₄

lemma upper_bound_of_h₁_h₂ (x : ℝ)
    (h₁ : (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 ≠ 0)
    (h₂ : 4 * x ^ 2 / (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 < 2 * x + 9)
    (h₀ : 0 ≤ 1 + 2 * x) : x < 45 / 8 := by
  have h₃ : 0 < (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 := by
    by_contra h₄
    have h₅ : (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 ≤ 0 := by
      linarith
    have h₆ : (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 = 0 := by
      nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + 2 * x)]
    contradiction
  have h₄ : 4 * x ^ 2 < (2 * x + 9) * (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 := by
    have h₅ : 4 * x ^ 2 / (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 < 2 * x + 9 := h₂
    have h₆ : 0 < (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 := h₃
    have h₇ : 4 * x ^ 2 < (2 * x + 9) * (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 := by
      rw [div_lt_iff h₆] at h₅
      nlinarith
    exact h₇
  by_contra h₅
  have h₆ : x ≥ 45 / 8 := by linarith
  have h₇ : Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x) ≥ 7 / 2 := by
    have h₈ : 1 + 2 * x ≥ 49 / 4 := by
      nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + 2 * x)]
    have h₉ : Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x) ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + 2 * x)
    have h₁₀ : Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x) ≥ 7 / 2 := by
      apply Real.le_sqrt_of_sq_le
      nlinarith
    linarith
  have h₈ : (Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 = 1 + 2 * x := by
    rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> nlinarith
  have h₉ : 4 * x ^ 2 ≥ (2 * x + 9) * (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 := by
    have h₁₀ : Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x) ≥ 7 / 2 := h₇
    have h₁₁ : (Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 = 1 + 2 * x := h₈
    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + 2 * x),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x) - 1),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x) - 7 / 2),
      sq_nonneg (x - 45 / 8),
      sq_nonneg (x + 1 / 2)]
  linarith

theorem imo_1960_p2 (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 ≤ 1 + 2 * x) (h₁ : (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 ≠ 0)
    (h₂ : 4 * x ^ 2 / (1 - Real.sqrt (1 + 2 * x)) ^ 2 < 2 * x + 9) : -(1 / 2) ≤ x ∧ x < 45 / 8 := by
  have h₃ : -(1 / 2) ≤ x := lower_bound_of_h₀ x h₀
  have h₄ : x < 45 / 8 := upper_bound_of_h₁_h₂ x h₁ h₂ h₀
  exact ⟨h₃, h₄⟩

  rw [h₁]

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  mod11_x5_neq_y2_plus_4 (x y : ℤ) : x ^ 5 % 11 ≠ (y ^ 2 + 4) % 11 := by
  have h₁ : x % 11 = 0 ∨ x % 11 = 1 ∨ x % 11 = 2 ∨ x % 11 = 3 ∨ x % 11 = 4 ∨
            x % 11 = 5 ∨ x % 11 = 6 ∨ x % 11 = 7 ∨ x % 11 = 8 ∨ x % 11 = 9 ∨
            x % 11 = 10 := by
    omega
  have h₂ : y % 11 = 0 ∨ y % 11 = 1 ∨ y % 11 = 2 ∨ y % 11 = 3 ∨ y % 11 = 4 ∨
            y % 11 = 5 ∨ y % 11 = 6 ∨ y % 11 = 7 ∨ y % 11 = 8 ∨ y % 11 = 9 ∨
            y % 11 = 10 := by
    omega
  rcases h₁ with (h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁ | h₁) <;>
    rcases h₂ with (h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂ | h₂) <;>
      simp [h₁, h₂, pow_succ, Int.mul_emod, Int.add_emod,
            Int.emod_emod] <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try
          {
            norm_num at *
            <;>
            (try omega)
            <;>
            (try
              {
                have h₃ : x % 11 = 0 ∨ x % 11 = 1 ∨ x % 11 = 2 ∨ x % 11 = 3 ∨
                          x % 11 = 4 ∨ x % 11 = 5 ∨ x % 11 = 6 ∨ x % 11 = 7 ∨
                          x % 11 = 8 ∨ x % 11 = 9 ∨ x % 11 = 10 := by omega
                have h₄ : y % 11 = 0 ∨ y % 11 = 1 ∨ y % 11 = 2 ∨ y % 11 = 3 ∨
                          y % 11 = 4 ∨ y % 11 = 5 ∨ y % 11 = 6 ∨ y % 11 = 7 ∨
                          y % 11 = 8 ∨ y % 11 = 9 ∨ y % 11 = 10 := by omega
                rcases h₃ with (h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃ | h₃) <;>
                  rcases h₄ with (h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄ | h₄) <;>
                    simp [h₃, h₄, pow_succ, Int.mul_emod, Int.add_emod,
                          Int.emod_emod] at * <;>
                      (try omega) <;>
                      (try
                        {
                          norm_num at *
                          <;> omega
                        })
              })
          })
  <;>
  (try
    {
      norm_num at *
      <;> omega
    })

theorem numbertheory_x5neqy2p4 (x y : ℤ) : x ^ 5 ≠ y ^ 2 + 4 := by
  intro h
  have h₁ : x ^ 5 % 11 = (y ^ 2 + 4) % 11 := by
    rw [h]
  have h₂ : x ^ 5 % 11 ≠ (y ^ 2 + 4) % 11 := mod11_x5_neq_y2_plus_4 x y
  contradiction

lemma  b_eq_of_h₂ (a b : ℝ) (h₂ : 7 * a = 4 * b) : b = (7 / 4) * a := by

    apply Eq.symm
    
    linarith
  exact h₃


lemma a_c_relation (a b c : ℝ) (h₂ : 7 * a = 4 * b) (h₁ : 9 * b = 20 * c) :
    63 * a = 80 * c := by
  
  have h₃ : b = (7 / 4) * a := b_eq_of_h₂ a b h₂
  
  rw [h₃] at h₁
  
  ring_nf at h₁ ⊢
  
  linarith

theorem mathd_algebra_398 (a b c : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c) (h₁ : 9 * b = 20 * c)
    (h₂ : 7 * a = 4 * b) : 63 * a = 80 * c := by
  exact a_c_relation a b c h₂ h₁

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  sin_pos_pi_div_seven : Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) > 0 := by
  have h₁ : 0 < Real.pi / 7 := by linarith [Real.pi_pos]
  have h₂ : Real.pi / 7 < Real.pi / 2 := by linarith [Real.pi_pos, Real.pi_div_two_pos]
  have h₃ : Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) > 0 := by
    apply Real.sin_pos_of_pos_of_lt_pi
    · linarith
    · linarith [Real.pi_pos]
  exact h₃

lemma sin_four_pi_div_seven_eq_sin_three_pi_div_seven :
    Real.sin (4 * Real.pi / 7) = Real.sin (3 * Real.pi / 7) := by
  have h₁ :
      Real.sin (4 * Real.pi / 7) = Real.sin (Real.pi - 3 * Real.pi / 7) := by
    ring_nf
    <;> field_simp
    <;> ring_nf
  rw [h₁]
  have h₂ : Real.sin (Real.pi - 3 * Real.pi / 7) = Real.sin (3 * Real.pi / 7) := by
    rw [Real.sin_pi_sub]
  rw [h₂]

lemma cos_pi_div_seven_sub_cos_two_pi_div_seven_add_cos_three_pi_div_seven_eq_half :
    Real.cos (Real.pi / 7) - Real.cos (2 * Real.pi / 7) + Real.cos (3 * Real.pi / 7) = 1 / 2 := by
  have h₂ : 2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) *
      (Real.cos (Real.pi / 7) - Real.cos (2 * Real.pi / 7) + Real.cos (3 * Real.pi / 7)) =
        Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) := by
    have h₃ :
        2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) *
          (Real.cos (Real.pi / 7) - Real.cos (2 * Real.pi / 7) + Real.cos (3 * Real.pi / 7)) =
          2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) * Real.cos (Real.pi / 7) -
            2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) * Real.cos (2 * Real.pi / 7) +
            2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) * Real.cos (3 * Real.pi / 7) := by
      ring_nf
      <;> simp [Real.cos_add, Real.cos_sub, Real.sin_add, Real.sin_sub]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> field_simp
      <;> ring_nf
    rw [h₃]
    have h₄ : 2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) * Real.cos (Real.pi / 7) = Real.sin (2 * Real.pi / 7) := by
      have h₅ : Real.sin (2 * Real.pi / 7) = 2 * Real.sin (Real.pi / 7) * Real.cos (Real.pi / 7) := by
        have h₅₁ : Real.sin (2 * Real.pi / 7) = Real.sin (2 * (Real.pi / 7)) := by ring
        rw [h₅₁]

name: mathd_numbertheory_430
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_eq_one (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 1 ≤ a ∧ a ≤ 9) (h₁ : 1 ≤ b ∧ b ≤ 9)
    (h₂ : 1 ≤ c ∧ c ≤ 9) (h₃ : a ≠ b) (h₄ : a ≠ c) (h₅ : b ≠ c)
    (h₆ : a + b = c) (h₇ : 10 * a + a - b = 2 * c)
    (h₈ : c * b = 10 * a + a + a) : a = 1 := by
  have h₉ : a ≤ 9 := by linarith
  have h₁₀ : b ≤ 9 := by linarith
  have h₁₁ : c ≤ 9 := by linarith
  have h₁₂ : 1 ≤ a := by linarith
  have h₁₃ : 1 ≤ b := by linarith
  have h₁₄ : 1 ≤ c := by linarith
  interval_cases a <;> norm_num at h₆ h₇ h₈ ⊢ <;>
    (try omega) <;>
    (try
      {
        have h₁₅ : b ≤ 9 := by omega
        have h₁₆ : c ≤ 9 := by omega
        interval_cases b <;> norm_num at h₆ h₇ h₈ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try
            {
              have h₁₇ : c ≤ 9 := by omega
              interval_cases c <;> norm_num at h₆ h₇ h₈ ⊢ <;>
                (try omega)
            })
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        have h₁₅ : c ≤ 9 := by omega
        interval_cases c <;> norm_num at h₆ h₇ h₈ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try
            {
              have h₁₆ : b ≤ 9 := by omega
              interval_cases b <;> norm_num at h₆ h₇ h₈ ⊢ <;>
                (try omega)
            })
      })

lemma c_eq_four (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 1 ≤ a ∧ a ≤ 9) (h₁ : 1 ≤ b ∧ b ≤ 9)
    (h₂ : 1 ≤ c ∧ c ≤ 9) (h₃ : a ≠ b) (h₄ : a ≠ c) (h₅ : b ≠ c)
    (h₆ : a + b = c) (h₇ : 10 * a + a - b = 2 * c)
    (h₈ : c * b = 10 * a + a + a) (ha : a = 1) : c = 4 := by
  have h₉ : a = 1 := ha
  subst h₉
  have h₁₀ : 1 + b = c := by
    omega
  have h₁₁ : 10 * 1 + 1 - b = 2 * c := by
    omega
  have h₁₂ : c * b = 10 * 1 + 1 + 1 := by
    omega
  have h₁₃ : c ≤ 9 := by omega
  have h₁₄ : b ≤ 9 := by omega
  have h₁₅ : 1 ≤ c := by omega
  have h₁₆ : 1 ≤ b := by omega
  interval_cases c <;> norm_num at h₁₀ h₁₁ h₁₂ ⊢ <;>
    (try omega) <;>
    (try
      {
        interval_cases b <;> norm_num at h₁₀ h₁₁ h₁₂ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega)
      })

lemma b_eq_three (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 1 ≤ a ∧ a ≤ 9) (h₁ : 1 ≤ b ∧ b ≤ 9)
    (h₂ : 1 ≤ c ∧ c ≤ 9) (h₃ : a ≠ b) (h₄ : a ≠ c) (h₅ : b ≠ c)
    (h₆ : a + b = c) (h₇ : 10 * a + a - b = 2 * c)
    (h₈ : c * b = 10 * a + a + a) (ha : a = 1) (hc : c = 4) : b = 3 := by
  have h₉ : a = 1 := ha
  have h₁₀ : c = 4 := hc
  have h₁₁ : 1 + b = c := by
    omega
  subst h₉
  subst h₁₀
  omega

theorem mathd_numbertheory_430 (a b c : ℕ) (h₀ : 1 ≤ a ∧ a ≤ 9) (h₁ : 1 ≤ b ∧ b ≤ 9)
    (h₂ : 1 ≤ c ∧ c ≤ 9) (h₃ : a ≠ b) (h₄ : a ≠ c) (h₅ : b ≠ c) (h₆ : a + b = c)
    (h₇ : 10 * a + a - b = 2 * c) (h₈ : c * b = 10 * a + a + a) : a + b + c = 8 := by
  have ha : a = 1 := a_eq_one a b c h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈
  have hc : c = 4 := c_eq_four a b c h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ ha
  have hb : b = 3 := b_eq_three a b c h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ ha hc
  subst_vars
  <;> norm_num
  <;> linarith

name: mathd_algebra_459
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  eq_b_of_a (a b c d : ℚ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a = b + c + d)
    (h₁ : 4 * b = a + c + d) :
    b = (4 / 5 : ℚ) * a := by
  have h₄₁ : 4 * b - 3 * a = a - b := by
    linarith
  ring_nf at h₄₁ ⊢
  linarith

lemma eq_c_of_a (a b c d : ℚ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a = b + c + d)
    (h₂ : 2 * c = a + b + d) :
    c = (4 / 3 : ℚ) * a := by
  have h₅₁ : 2 * c - 3 * a = a - c := by
    linarith
  ring_nf at h₅₁ ⊢
  linarith

lemma a_eq_one (a b c d : ℚ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a = b + c + d)
    (h₁ : 4 * b = a + c + d)
    (h₂ : 2 * c = a + b + d)
    (h₃ : 8 * a + 10 * b + 6 * c = 24)
    (hb : b = (4 / 5 : ℚ) * a)
    (hc : c = (4 / 3 : ℚ) * a) :
    a = (1 : ℚ) := by
  have h₆₁ : 8 * a + 10 * ((4 / 5 : ℚ) * a) + 6 * ((4 / 3 : ℚ) * a) = 24 := by
    rw [hb, hc] at h₃
    exact h₃
  ring_nf at h₆₁ ⊢
  nlinarith

lemma b_eq_four_fifths (a b c d : ℚ)
    (hb : b = (4 / 5 : ℚ) * a)
    (ha : a = (1 : ℚ)) :
    b = (4 / 5 : ℚ) := by
  rw [hb, ha]
  <;> norm_num

lemma c_eq_four_thirds (a b c d : ℚ)
    (hc : c = (4 / 3 : ℚ) * a)
    (ha : a = (1 : ℚ)) :
    c = (4 / 3 : ℚ) := by
  rw [hc, ha]
  <;> norm_num

lemma d_eq_thirteen_fifteenths (a b c d : ℚ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a = b + c + d)
    (ha : a = (1 : ℚ))
    (hb : b = (4 / 5 : ℚ))
    (hc : c = (4 / 3 : ℚ)) :
    d = (13 / 15 : ℚ) := by
  have h₈₁ : 3 * a = b + c + d := h₀
  rw [ha, hb, hc] at h₈₁
  ring_nf at h₈₁ ⊢
  linarith

theorem mathd_algebra_459 (a b c d : ℚ) (h₀ : 3 * a = b + c + d) (h₁ : 4 * b = a + c + d)
    (h₂ : 2 * c = a + b + d) (h₃ : 8 * a + 10 * b + 6 * c = 24) : ↑d.den + d.num = 28 := by
  have hb : b = (4 / 5 : ℚ) * a := eq_b_of_a a b c d h₀ h₁
  have hc : c = (4 / 3 : ℚ) * a := eq_c_of_a a b c d h₀ h₂
  have ha : a = (1 : ℚ) := a_eq_one a b c d h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ hb hc
  have hb' : b = (4 / 5 : ℚ) := b_eq_four_fifths a b c d hb ha
  have hc' : c = (4 / 3 : ℚ) := c_eq_four_thirds a b c d hc ha
  have hd : d = (13 / 15 : ℚ) := d_eq_thirteen_fifteenths a b c d h₀ ha hb' hc'
  
  rw [hd]
  <;> norm_num [Rat.den_nz]
  <;> norm_cast
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl
  <;> norm_num
  <;> omega

name: induction_12dvd4expnp1p20
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  pow_mod12 (k : ℕ) (hk : k ≥ 1) : (4 : ℕ) ^ k % 12 = 4 := by
  induction' hk with k hk ih
  · norm_num
  · cases k with
    | zero =>
      contradiction
    | succ k' =>
      simp [pow_succ, Nat.mul_mod, ih] <;> norm_num <;> omega


lemma expr_mod_zero (n : ℕ) : (4 ^ (n + 1) + 20) % 12 = 0 := by
  have h₁ : (4 : ℕ) ^ (n + 1) % 12 = 4 := by
    have h₂ : n + 1 ≥ 1 := by
      omega
    have h₃ := pow_mod12 (n + 1) h₂
    simpa [pow_add, pow_one] using h₃
  have h₂ : (4 ^ (n + 1) + 20) % 12 = 0 := by
    omega
  exact h₂

theorem induction_12dvd4expnp1p20 (n : ℕ) : 12 ∣ 4 ^ (n + 1) + 20 := by
  have h₁ : (4 ^ (n + 1) + 20) % 12 = 0 := expr_mod_zero n
  have h₂ : 12 ∣ 4 ^ (n + 1) + 20 := by
    rw [Nat.dvd_iff_mod_eq_zero]
    exact h₁
  exact h₂

name: mathd_algebra_320

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_eq_two (x : ℝ) (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c ∧ 0 ≤ x)
    (h₁ : 2 * x ^ 2 = 4 * x + 9)
    (h₂ : x = (a + Real.sqrt b) / c) (h₃ : c = 2) : a = 2 := by
  have h₄ : 0 < a := h₀.1
  have h₅ : 0 < b := h₀.2.1
  have h₆ : 0 < c := h₀.2.2.1
  have h₇ : 0 ≤ x := h₀.2.2.2
  have h₈ : x = (a + Real.sqrt b) / 2 := by
    rw [h₂, h₃]
    <;> norm_num
  have h₉ : 2 * x ^ 2 = 4 * x + 9 := h₁
  rw [h₈] at h₉
  have h₁₀ : 2 * (((a + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) ^ 2) = 4 * ((a + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) + 9 := by
    exact_mod_cast h₉
  have h₁₁ : 0 < (a : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₄
  have h₁₂ : 0 < (b : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₅
  have h₁₃ : 0 < (c : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₆
  have h₁₄ : 0 ≤ Real.sqrt b := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
  field_simp at h₁₀
  ring_nf at h₁₀
  norm_num at h₁₀
  have h₁₅ : (a : ℝ) ≥ 1 := by
    exact_mod_cast (Nat.succ_le_iff.mpr h₄)
  have h₁₆ : (a : ℝ) + Real.sqrt b = 2 + Real.sqrt 22 := by
    nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 22),
      Real.sqrt_nonneg (22 : ℝ),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt b - Real.sqrt 22),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt b + Real.sqrt 22),
      sq_nonneg (a - 2 : ℝ),
      sq_nonneg (a + 2 : ℝ)]
  have h₁₇ : (a : ℝ) = 2 := by
    nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 22),
      Real.sqrt_nonneg (22 : ℝ),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt b - Real.sqrt 22),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt b + Real.sqrt 22),
      sq_nonneg (a - 2 : ℝ),
      sq_nonneg (a + 2 : ℝ)]
  have h₁₈ : a = 2 := by
    norm_cast at h₁₇ ⊢
    <;> nlinarith
  exact h₁₈


lemma b_eq_22 (x : ℝ) (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c ∧ 0 ≤ x)
    (h₁ : 2 * x ^ 2 = 4 * x + 9)
    (h₂ : x = (a + Real.sqrt b) / c) (h₃ : c = 2) (h₄ : a = 2) : b = 22 := by
  have h₅ : 0 < a := h₀.1
  have h₆ : 0 < b := h₀.2.1
  have h₇ : 0 < c := h₀.2.2.1
  have h₈ : 0 ≤ x := h₀.2.2.2
  have h₉ : x = (a + Real.sqrt b) / 2 := by
    rw [h₂, h₃]
    <;> norm_num
  have h₁₀ : 2 * x ^ 2 = 4 * x + 9 := h₁
  rw [h₉] at h₁₀
  have h₁₁ : 2 * (((a + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) ^ 2) = 4 * ((a + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) + 9 := by
    exact_mod_cast h₁₀
  have h₁₂ : 0 < (a : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₅
  have h₁₃ : 0 < (b : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₆
  have h₁₄ : 0 < (c : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₇
  have h₁₅ : 0 ≤ Real.sqrt b := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
  have h₁₆ : a = 2 := h₄
  rw [h₁₆] at h₁₁
  have h₁₇ : 2 * (((2 + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) ^ 2) = 4 * ((2 + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) + 9 := by
    exact_mod_cast h₁₁
  have h₁₈ : (2 : ℝ) * (((2 + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) ^ 2) =
      4 * ((2 + Real.sqrt b : ℝ) / 2) + 9 := by
    exact_mod_cast h₁₁
  have h₁₉ : (b : ℝ) = 22 := by
    have h₂₀ : 0 ≤ Real.sqrt b := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
    have h₂₁ : 0 ≤ Real.sqrt (22 : ℝ) := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
    have h₂₂ : 0 ≤ Real.sqrt b * Real.sqrt (22 : ℝ) := by positivity
    nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 22),
      Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ (b : ℝ)),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt b - Real.sqrt 22),
      sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt b + Real.sqrt 22)]
  have h₂₀ : b = 22 := by
    norm_cast at h₁₉ ⊢
    <;> nlinarith
  exact h₂₀

theorem mathd_algebra_320 (x : ℝ) (a b c : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c ∧ 0 ≤ x)
    (h₁ : 2 * x ^ 2 = 4 * x + 9) (h₂ : x = (a + Real.sqrt b) / c) (h₃ : c = 2) : a + b + c = 26 := by
  have h₄ : a = 2 := a_eq_two (x:=x) (a:=a) (b:=b) (c:=c) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  have h₅ : b = 22 := b_eq_22 (x:=x) (a:=a) (b:=b) (c:=c) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄
  have h₆ : c = 2 := h₃
  have h₇ : a + b + c = 26 := by
    rw [h₄, h₅, h₆]
    <;> norm_num
  exact h₇

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  cast_eq_implies_nat_eq {x : ℕ} (h : (x : ℝ) = 575) : x = 575 := by
  norm_cast at h ⊢
  <;> simp_all
  <;> norm_num at *
  <;> nlinarith

lemma main_eq (x : ℕ) (h₀ : (↑x : ℝ) + (4 : ℝ) / (100 : ℝ) * (↑x : ℝ) = 598) :
    (x : ℝ) = 575 := by
  have h₁ : (x : ℝ) + (4 : ℝ) / (100 : ℝ) * (x : ℝ) = 598 := by
    simpa using h₀
  have h₂ : (26 : ℝ) / 25 * (x : ℝ) = 598 := by

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  mul_eq (m n : ℕ) (h₀ : Nat.gcd m n = 6) (h₁ : Nat.lcm m n = 126) :
    m * n = 756 := by
  have h₂ : m * n = Nat.gcd m n * Nat.lcm m n := by
    rw [Nat.gcd_mul_lcm]
  rw [h₀, h₁] at h₂
  norm_num at h₂ ⊢
  <;> nlinarith

lemma six_dvd_m (m n : ℕ) (h₀ : Nat.gcd m n = 6) : 6 ∣ m := by
  have h₂ : Nat.gcd m n ∣ m := Nat.gcd_dvd_left m n
  rw [h₀] at h₂
  exact h₂

lemma six_dvd_n (m n : ℕ) (h₀ : Nat.gcd m n = 6) : 6 ∣ n := by
  have h₂ : Nat.gcd m n ∣ n := Nat.gcd_dvd_right m n
  rw [h₀] at h₂
  exact h₂

theorem mathd_numbertheory_277 (m n : ℕ) (h₀ : Nat.gcd m n = 6) (h₁ : Nat.lcm m n = 126) :
    60 ≤ m + n := by
  have h₂ : m * n = 756 := mul_eq m n h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : 6 ∣ m := six_dvd_m m n h₀
  have h₄ : 6 ∣ n := six_dvd_n m n h₀
  have h₅ : 60 ≤ m + n := by
    by_contra h₅
    have h₆ : m + n < 60 := by linarith
    have h₇ : m ≤ 59 := by
      by_contra h₇
      have h₈ : m ≥ 60 := by omega
      have h₉ : n ≥ 1 := by
        by_contra h₉
        have h₁₀ : n = 0 := by omega
        rw [h₁₀] at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₄
        norm_num at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₄ ⊢
        <;> simp_all [Nat.gcd_zero_right, Nat.lcm]
        <;> omega
      have h₁₀ : m + n ≥ 60 := by omega
      omega
    have h₈ : n ≤ 59 := by
      by_contra h₈
      have h₉ : n ≥ 60 := by omega
      have h₁₀ : m ≥ 1 := by
        by_contra h₁₀
        have h₁₁ : m = 0 := by omega
        rw [h₁₁] at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₃
        norm_num at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₃ ⊢
        <;> simp_all [Nat.gcd_zero_left, Nat.lcm]
        <;> omega
      have h₁₁ : m + n ≥ 60 := by omega
      omega
    have h₉ : m ≥ 1 := by
      by_contra h₉
      have h₁₀ : m = 0 := by omega
      rw [h₁₀] at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₃
      norm_num at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₃ ⊢
      <;> simp_all [Nat.gcd_zero_right, Nat.lcm]
      <;> omega
    have h₁₀ : n ≥ 1 := by
      by_contra h₁₀
      have h₁₁ : n = 0 := by omega
      rw [h₁₁] at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₄
      norm_num at h₂ h₀ h₁ h₄ ⊢
      <;> simp_all [Nat.gcd_zero_left, Nat.lcm]
      <;> omega
    interval_cases m <;> norm_num at h₃ h₂ h₀ h₁ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        have h₁₁ : n ≤ 59 := by omega
        have h₁₂ : n ≥ 1 := by omega
        interval_cases n <;> norm_num at h₄ h₂ h₀ h₁ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀ ⊢ <;>

  have h₅ : x ≤ 13 := by linarith

lemma  x_eq_42 (n x : ℝ) (h₀ : n + x = 97) (h₁ : n + 5 * x = 265) : x = 42 := by
  have h₂ : x = 42 := by
    have h₃ : (n + 5 * x) - (n + x) = 265 - 97 := by
      linarith
    have h₄ : 4 * x = 168 := by
      ring_nf at h₃ ⊢
      linarith
    have h₅ : x = 42 := by
      linarith
    exact h₅

lemma n_eq_55 (n x : ℝ) (h₀ : n + x = 97) (h₁ : n + 5 * x = 265) : n = 55 := by
  have hx : x = 42 := x_eq_42 n x h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : n = 55 := by
    have h₄ : n + x = 97 := h₀
    rw [hx] at h₄
    linarith

lemma n_plus_two_mul_x_eq_139 (n x : ℝ) (h₀ : n + x = 97) (h₁ : n + 5 * x = 265) : n + 2 * x = 139 := by
  have hx : x = 42 := x_eq_42 n x h₀ h₁
  have hn : n = 55 := n_eq_55 n x h₀ h₁
  rw [hn, hx]
  <;> norm_num

theorem mathd_algebra_160 (n x : ℝ) (h₀ : n + x = 97) (h₁ : n + 5 * x = 265) : n + 2 * x = 139 := by
  exact n_plus_two_mul_x_eq_139 n x h₀ h₁

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  base_case : (3 : ℕ) ! < (3 : ℕ) ^ (3 - 1) := by
  norm_num [Nat.factorial, Nat.pow_succ] <;> decide


lemma factorial_succ_mul (k : ℕ) (hk : k ≥ 3) :
    (k + 1) ! = (k + 1) * k ! := by
  simp [Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.mul_comm] <;>
    ring_nf <;>
    norm_num <;>
    linarith


lemma pow_strict_lt_pow (k : ℕ) (hk : k ≥ 3) (h : k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1) ^ (k - 1)) :
    (k + 1) * k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1) ^ k := by
  have h₇ : (k + 1 : ℕ) > 0 := by linarith
  have h₈ : (k + 1 : ℕ) ^ k = (k + 1 : ℕ) * (k + 1 : ℕ) ^ (k - 1) := by
    cases k with
    | zero => contradiction
    | succ k' =>
      cases k' with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ k'' =>
        cases k'' with
        | zero => contradiction
        | succ k''' =>
          simp [Nat.succ_eq_add_one, pow_add, pow_one, mul_comm, mul_left_comm, mul_assoc] at h ⊢
          <;>
          ring_nf at h ⊢ <;>
          norm_num at h ⊢ <;>
          nlinarith
  rw [h₈]
  have h₉ : (k + 1 : ℕ) * k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1 : ℕ) * (k + 1 : ℕ) ^ (k - 1) := by
    have h₁₀ : k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1 : ℕ) ^ (k - 1) := by
      exact h
    have h₁₁ : (k + 1 : ℕ) > 0 := by linarith
    nlinarith
  exact h₉


lemma induction_step (k : ℕ) (hk : k ≥ 3)
    (ih : k ! < k ^ (k - 1)) :
    (k + 1) ! < (k + 1) ^ k := by
  have h₅ : (k + 1) ! = (k + 1) * k ! := by
    rw [factorial_succ_mul k hk]
  rw [h₅]
  have h₆ : (k + 1 : ℕ) * k ! < (k + 1 : ℕ) * k ^ (k - 1) := by
    have h₇ : k ! < k ^ (k - 1) := ih
    have h₈ : (k + 1 : ℕ) > 0 := by linarith
    nlinarith
  have h₇ : (k + 1 : ℕ) * k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1) ^ k := by
    have h₈ : k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1 : ℕ) ^ (k - 1) := by
      have h₉ : k ≥ 3 := hk
      have h₁₀ : k - 1 ≥ 2 := by omega
      have h₁₁ : k < k + 1 := by omega
      have h₁₂ : k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1 : ℕ) ^ (k - 1) := by
        exact pow_lt_pow_of_lt_left (by omega) (by omega) (by omega)
      exact h₁₂
    exact pow_strict_lt_pow k hk h₈
  exact lt_of_lt_of_le h₆ (by
    have h₈ : (k + 1 : ℕ) * k ^ (k - 1) < (k + 1) ^ k := h₇
    linarith)

theorem main_inequality (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 3 ≤ n) : n ! < n ^ (n - 1) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 3 ≤ n → n ! < n ^ (n - 1) := by
    intro n hn
    induction' hn with n hn IH
    · 
      simpa using base_case
    · 
      have h₂ : (n + 1) ! < (n + 1) ^ (n + 1 - 1) := by
        exact induction_step n hn IH
      simpa [Nat.succ_eq_add_one, Nat.add_comm, Nat.add_left_comm, Nat.add_assoc] using h₂
  exact h₁ n h₀

theorem induction_nfactltnexpnm1ngt3 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 3 ≤ n) : n ! < n ^ (n - 1) := by
  exact main_inequality n h₀

import Mathlib

lemma  sqrt_one_million : Real.sqrt 1000000 = 1000 := by
  have h₁ : Real.sqrt 1000000 = 1000 := by
    rw [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;> norm_num
  rw [h₁]

lemma rpow_one_million : (1000000 : ℝ) ^ ((1 : ℝ) / 3) = 100 := by
  have h₂ : (1000000 : ℝ) ^ ((1 : ℝ) / 3) = 100 := by
    rw [show (1000000 : ℝ) = (100 : ℝ) ^ 3 by norm_num]
    rw [← Real.rpow_nat_cast]
    rw [← Real.rpow_mul] <;> norm_num
    <;>
    ring_nf <;>
    norm_num <;>
    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (10 : ℝ), Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 10 by norm_num)]
    <;>
    linarith
  rw [h₂]

theorem mathd_algebra_208 : Real.sqrt 1000000 - 1000000 ^ ((1 : ℝ) / 3) = 900 := by
  rw [sqrt_one_million, rpow_one_million]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> linarith

name: numbertheory_notequiv2i2jasqbsqdiv8
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  not_equiv_for_2_0
    (h : ∀ a b : ℤ,
        (∃ i j, a = 2 * i ∧ b = 2 * j) ↔ ∃ k, a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 8 * k) :
    False := by
  have h₁ := h (2 : ℤ) 0
  
  have h₂ : (∃ i j : ℤ, (2 : ℤ) = 2 * i ∧ (0 : ℤ) = 2 * j) := by
    refine' ⟨1, 0, ?_, ?_⟩ <;> norm_num
  have h₃ := h₁.mp h₂
  rcases h₃ with ⟨k, hk⟩
  have h₄ : (2 : ℤ) ^ 2 + (0 : ℤ) ^ 2 = 8 * k := by
    simpa using hk
  have h₅ : (4 : ℤ) = 8 * k := by
    norm_num at h₄ ⊢
    <;> linarith
  have h₆ : k = (1 : ℤ) / 2 := by
    omega
  norm_num at h₆
  <;> omega

theorem numbertheory_notequiv2i2jasqbsqdiv8 :
    ¬∀ a b : ℤ, (∃ i j, a = 2 * i ∧ b = 2 * j) ↔ ∃ k, a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 = 8 * k := by
  intro h
  have h₁ := not_equiv_for_2_0 h
  exact h₁

name: mathd_algebra_156
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  hx_poly (x y : ℝ) (f g : ℝ → ℝ)
    (h₀ : ∀ t, f t = t ^ 4) (h₁ : ∀ t, g t = 5 * t ^ 2 - 6)
    (h₂ : f x = g x) : x ^ 4 - 5 * x ^ 2 + 6 = 0 := by
  have h₅ : f x = g x := h₂
  have h₆ : f x = x ^ 4 := by
    rw [h₀]
  have h₇ : g x = 5 * x ^ 2 - 6 := by
    rw [h₁]
  rw [h₆, h₇] at h₅
  ring_nf at h₅ ⊢
  nlinarith

lemma hy_poly (x y : ℝ) (f g : ℝ → ℝ)
    (h₀ : ∀ t, f t = t ^ 4) (h₁ : ∀ t, g t = 5 * t ^ 2 - 6)
    (h₃ : f y = g y) : y ^ 4 - 5 * y ^ 2 + 6 = 0 := by
  have h₅ : f y = g y := h₃
  have h₆ : f y = y ^ 4 := by
    rw [h₀]
  have h₇ : g y = 5 * y ^ 2 - 6 := by
    rw [h₁]
  rw [h₆, h₇] at h₅
  ring_nf at h₅ ⊢
  nlinarith

lemma hx_cases (x : ℝ) (h₅ : x ^ 4 - 5 * x ^ 2 + 6 = 0) :
    x ^ 2 = 2 ∨ x ^ 2 = 3 := by
  have h₅' : (x ^ 2 - 2) * (x ^ 2 - 3) = 0 := by
    nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x ^ 2 - 2), sq_nonneg (x ^ 2 - 3)]
  have h₅'' : x ^ 2 - 2 = 0 ∨ x ^ 2 - 3 = 0 :=
    eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero h₅'
  cases h₅'' with
  | inl h =>
      have h₆ : x ^ 2 = 2 := by linarith
      exact Or.inl h₆
  | inr h =>
      have h₆ : x ^ 2 = 3 := by linarith
      exact Or.inr h₆

lemma hy_cases (y : ℝ) (h₅ : y ^ 4 - 5 * y ^ 2 + 6 = 0) :
    y ^ 2 = 2 ∨ y ^ 2 = 3 := by
  have h₅' : (y ^ 2 - 2) * (y ^ 2 - 3) = 0 := by
    nlinarith [sq_nonneg (y ^ 2 - 2), sq_nonneg (y ^ 2 - 3)]
  have h₅'' : y ^ 2 - 2 = 0 ∨ y ^ 2 - 3 = 0 :=
    eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero h₅'
  cases h₅'' with
  | inl h =>
      have h₆ : y ^ 2 = 2 := by linarith
      exact Or.inl h₆
  | inr h =>
      have h₆ : y ^ 2 = 3 := by linarith
      exact Or.inr h₆

lemma diff_one (x y : ℝ)
    (h₅ : x ^ 4 - 5 * x ^ 2 + 6 = 0)
    (h₆ : y ^ 4 - 5 * y ^ 2 + 6 = 0)
    (h₇ : x ^ 2 < y ^ 2) : y ^ 2 - x ^ 2 = 1 := by
  have hx : x ^ 2 = 2 ∨ x ^ 2 = 3 := hx_cases x h₅
  have hy : y ^ 2 = 2 ∨ y ^ 2 = 3 := hy_cases y h₆
  cases hx with
  | inl hx2 =>
      cases hy with
      | inl hy2 =>
          have hlt : x ^ 2 < y ^ 2 := h₇
          rw [hx2, hy2] at hlt
          norm_num at hlt ⊢
          <;> linarith
      | inr hy3 =>
          have hlt : x ^ 2 < y ^ 2 := h₇
          rw [hx2, hy3] at hlt
          norm_num at hlt ⊢
          <;> linarith
  | inr hx3 =>
      cases hy with
      | inl hy2 =>
          have hlt : x ^ 2 < y ^ 2 := h₇
          rw [hx3, hy2] at hlt
          norm_num at hlt ⊢
          <;> linarith
      | inr hy3 =>
          have hlt : x ^ 2 < y ^ 2 := h₇
          rw [hx3, hy3] at hlt
          norm_num at hlt ⊢
          <;> linarith

theorem mathd_algebra_156 (x y : ℝ) (f g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ t, f t = t ^ 4)
    (h₁ : ∀ t, g t = 5 * t ^ 2 - 6) (h₂ : f x = g x) (h₃ : f y = g y) (h₄ : x ^ 2 < y ^ 2) :
    y ^ 2 - x ^ 2 = 1 := by
  have h₅ : x ^ 4 - 5 * x ^ 2 + 6 = 0 := hx_poly x y f g h₀ h₁ h₂
  have h₆ : y ^ 4 - 5 * y ^ 2 + 6 = 0 := hy_poly x y f g h₀ h₁ h₃
  exact diff_one x y h₅ h₆ h₄

    (∑ k in S, k) = 2016 := by

    constructor
    · norm_num
    constructor
    · norm_num

    rw [h₀] at hn

    have h₄ : n ≤ 2019 := hn.2.1
    have h₅ : ∃ m, (Nat.divisors m).card = 4 ∧ (∑ p in Nat.divisors m, p) = n := hn.2.2
    have h₆ : n = 2016 := by

        apply Finset.mem_Icc.mpr

        omega

      <;>

                  have h₁₅ : (∑ p in (Nat.divisors m).filter (fun p => p ≤ m / 2), p) ≤ (∑ p in Nat.divisors m, p) := by

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

/-- A positive integer $n$ is nice if there is a positive integer $m$ with exactly four positive divisors (including $1$ and $m$) such that the sum of the four divisors is equal to $n.$ Find the sum of all the nice numbers in the set $\{ 2010,2011,2012,\dots,2019 \}.$ Show that it is 2016.-/
theorem mathd_numbertheory_451 (S : Finset ℕ)
    (h₀ :
      ∀ n : ℕ,
        n ∈ S ↔
          2010 ≤ n ∧ n ≤ 2019 ∧ ∃ m, (Nat.divisors m).card = 4 ∧ (∑ p in Nat.divisors m, p) = n) :
    (∑ k in S, k) = 2016 := by sorry

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  mul_expand (a : ℝ) : a * (2 - a) = -(a - 1) ^ 2 + 1 := by
  ring_nf
  <;> linarith

lemma neg_sq_nonpos (a : ℝ) : -(a - 1) ^ 2 ≤ (0 : ℝ) := by
  have h : (a - 1) ^ 2 ≥ 0 := by
    nlinarith
  linarith

lemma main_ineq (a : ℝ) : a * (2 - a) ≤ (1 : ℝ) := by
  have h₁ : a * (2 - a) = -(a - 1) ^ 2 + 1 := mul_expand a
  have h₂ : -(a - 1) ^ 2 ≤ (0 : ℝ) := neg_sq_nonpos a
  
  linarith

theorem algebra_sqineq_at2malt1 (a : ℝ) : a * (2 - a) ≤ 1 := by
  exact main_ineq a

name: mathd_numbertheory_227
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  n_eq_five_from_eq (x y n : ℕ+) (h₀ : (↑x : ℝ) / 4 + (↑y : ℝ) / 6 = (↑x + ↑y : ℝ) / n) :
    (n : ℕ) = 5 := by
  have h₁ : (n : ℕ) = 5 := by
    have h₂ : (n : ℝ) ≠ 0 := by
      norm_cast
      <;>
      (try
        {
          exact_mod_cast n.prop.ne'
        })
      <;>
      (try
        {
          norm_num at *
          <;>
          (try contradiction)
          <;>
          (try omega)
        })
    have h₃ : (3 : ℝ) * (n : ℝ) * (x : ℝ) + 2 * (n : ℝ) * (y : ℝ) = 12 * ((x : ℝ) + (y : ℝ)) := by
      have h₄ : (↑x : ℝ) / 4 + (↑y : ℝ) / 6 = (↑x + ↑y : ℝ) / n := h₀
      field_simp at h₄
      ring_nf at h₄ ⊢
      nlinarith [sq_nonneg ((x : ℝ) - (y : ℝ)), sq_nonneg ((n : ℝ) - 5)]
    have h₄ : (n : ℕ) ≤ 6 ∨ (n : ℕ) ≥ 7 := by
      by_cases h₅ : (n : ℕ) ≤ 6
      · exact Or.inl h₅
      · exact Or.inr (by omega)
    cases h₄ with
    | inl h₄ =>
      have h₅ : (n : ℕ) ≤ 6 := h₄
      have h₆ : (n : ℕ) ≥ 1 := by
        exact_mod_cast n.prop
      interval_cases (n : ℕ) <;> norm_num at h₃ ⊢ <;>
        (try
          {
            have h₇ : (x : ℝ) > 0 := by
              exact_mod_cast (by
                have h₈ : (x : ℕ) > 0 := by
                  exact x.prop
                exact_mod_cast h₈)
            have h₈ : (y : ℝ) > 0 := by
              exact_mod_cast (by
                have h₉ : (y : ℕ) > 0 := by
                  exact y.prop
                exact_mod_cast h₉)
            nlinarith [h₇, h₈]
          }) <;>
        (try
          {
            exfalso
            have h₇ : (x : ℝ) > 0 := by
              exact_mod_cast (by
                have h₈ : (x : ℕ) > 0 := by
                  exact x.prop
                exact_mod_cast h₈)
            have h₈ : (y : ℝ) > 0 := by
              exact_mod_cast (by
                have h₉ : (y : ℕ) > 0 := by
                  exact y.prop
                exact_mod_cast h₉)
            nlinarith [h₇, h₈]
          })
    | inr h₄ =>
      have h₅ : (n : ℕ) ≥ 7 := h₄
      have h₆ : (x : ℝ) > 0 := by
        exact_mod_cast (by
          have h₇ : (x : ℕ) > 0 := by
            exact x.prop
          exact_mod_cast h₇)
      have h₇ : (y : ℝ) > 0 := by
        exact_mod_cast (by
          have h₈ : (y : ℕ) > 0 := by
            exact y.prop
          exact_mod_cast h₈)
      have h₈ : (n : ℝ) ≥ 7 := by
        exact_mod_cast h₅
      have h₉ : (3 : ℝ) * (n : ℝ) * (x : ℝ) + 2 * (n : ℝ) * (y : ℝ) > 12 * ((x : ℝ) + (y : ℝ)) := by
        nlinarith [h₆, h₇, h₈]
      linarith
  exact h₁

theorem mathd_numbertheory_227 (x y n : ℕ+) (h₀ : ↑x / (4 : ℝ) + y / 6 = (x + y) / n) : n = 5 := by
  have h₁ : (n : ℕ) = 5 := n_eq_five_from_eq (x:=x) (y:=y) (n:=n) (by simpa using h₀)
  exact_mod_cast h₁

        <;> aesop

  exact h₃

name: imo_1959_p1
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  linear_combination_eq_one (n : ℕ) :
    3 * (14 * n + 3) - 2 * (21 * n + 4) = 1 := by
  have h₁ : 3 * (14 * n + 3) = 42 * n + 9 := by
    ring_nf <;> omega
  have h₂ : 2 * (21 * n + 4) = 42 * n + 8 := by
    ring_nf <;> omega
  have h₃ : 3 * (14 * n + 3) - 2 * (21 * n + 4) = 1 := by
    omega
  exact h₃


lemma gcd_dvd_one (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) :
    Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣ 1 := by
  have h₁ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣ (21 * n + 4) :=
    Nat.gcd_dvd_left (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3)
  have h₂ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣ (14 * n + 3) :=
    Nat.gcd_dvd_right (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3)
  have h₃ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣
      (3 * (14 * n + 3) - 2 * (21 * n + 4)) :=
    dvd_sub' (by
      have h₄ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣ 3 * (14 * n + 3) :=
        dvd_mul_of_dvd_right h₂ 3
      exact h₄) (by
      have h₄ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣ 2 * (21 * n + 4) :=
        dvd_mul_of_dvd_right h₁ 2
      exact h₄)
  have h₄ : (3 * (14 * n + 3) - 2 * (21 * n + 4)) = 1 :=
    linear_combination_eq_one n
  simpa [h₄] using h₃


lemma gcd_eq_one (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) :
    Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) = 1 := by
  have h₁ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ∣ 1 :=
    gcd_dvd_one n h₀
  have h₂ : 1 ≤ Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) :=
    Nat.gcd_pos_of_pos_left (14 * n + 3) (by
      have h₃ : 0 < 21 * n + 4 := by
        have h₄ : 0 < n := h₀
        nlinarith
      linarith)
  have h₃ : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) ≤ 1 :=
    Nat.le_of_dvd (by norm_num) h₁
  exact Nat.le_antisymm h₃ h₂

theorem imo_1959_p1 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) : Nat.gcd (21 * n + 4) (14 * n + 3) = 1 := by
  exact gcd_eq_one n h₀

name: induction_sumkexp3eqsumksq

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  two_mul_sum_range_add (n : ℕ) :
    2 * (∑ k in Finset.range n, k) + n = n ^ 2 := by
  have h₄ : ∀ n : ℕ, 2 * (∑ k in Finset.range n, k) + n = n ^ 2 := by
    intro n
    induction n with
    | zero =>
        simp
    | succ n ih =>
        simp_all [Finset.sum_range_succ, pow_two, mul_add, mul_comm, mul_left_comm,
          mul_assoc, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] 
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> nlinarith
  exact h₄ n

theorem induction_sumkexp3eqsumksq (n : ℕ) :
    (∑ k in Finset.range n, k ^ 3) = (∑ k in Finset.range n, k) ^ 2 := by
  have h₁ := two_mul_sum_range_add
  induction n with
  | zero =>
      simp
  | succ n ih =>
      
      simp_all [Finset.sum_range_succ, pow_two, pow_three] 
      <;>
      (try ring_nf at *) 
      <;>
      (try nlinarith [h₁ n]) 
      <;>
      (try
        {
          simp_all [Finset.sum_range_succ, pow_two, pow_three] 
          <;> ring_nf at *
          <;> nlinarith [h₁ n]
        })

    (h₄₂ : f (1 + 2) - f 1 - f 2 = 0 ∨ f (1 + 2) - f 1 - f 2 = 1)
    (h₄₃ : f (2 + 1) - f 2 - f 1 = 0 ∨ f (2 + 1) - f 2 - f 1 = 1)

    (h₄₇ : f (3 + 2) - f 3 - f 2 = 0 ∨ f (3 + 2) - f 3 - f 2 = 1)

    (h₄₉ : f (1 + 3) - f 1 - f 3 = 0 ∨ f (1 + 3) - f 1 - f 3 = 1) :

    (h₀ : ∀ m n, 0 < m ∧ 0 < n → f (m + n) - f m - f n = 0 ∨ f (m + n) - f m - f n = 1)

      (h₄₁ := h₄₁) (h₄₂ := h₄₂) (h₄₃ := h₄₃) (h₄₄ := h₄₄) (h₄₅ := h₄₅)

name: aime_1987_p5
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  h₁ (x y : ℤ) (h₀ : y ^ 2 + 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517) :
    3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) + y ^ 2 = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by
  have h₁₁ : y ^ 2 + 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := h₀
  have h₁₂ : 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) + y ^ 2 = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by
    linarith
  exact h₁₂

lemma h₂ (x y : ℤ) (h₀ : y ^ 2 + 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517) :
    y ^ 2 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by
  have h₂₁ : 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) + y ^ 2 = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by
    have h₂₂ : y ^ 2 + 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := h₀
    linarith
  have h₂₃ : y ^ 2 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by
    calc
      y ^ 2 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) = y ^ 2 * (3 * x ^ 2) + y ^ 2 * 1 := by ring
      _ = 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) + y ^ 2 := by ring
      _ = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by linarith
  exact h₂₃

lemma x_eq_two_or_neg_two (x y : ℤ) (h₀ : y ^ 2 + 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517) :
    x = 2 ∨ x = -2 := by
  have h₃ : y ^ 2 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := h₂ x y h₀
  have h₄ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ∣ 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := by
    use y ^ 2
    linarith
  have h₅ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ∣ 507 := by
    have h₅₁ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ∣ 30 * x ^ 2 + 517 := h₄
    have h₅₂ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ∣ 507 := by
      have h₅₃ : 507 = (30 * x ^ 2 + 517) - 10 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) := by
        ring_nf
        <;> omega
      have h₅₄ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ∣ (30 * x ^ 2 + 517) - 10 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) :=
        dvd_sub h₅₁ (by
          use 10
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> omega)
      have h₅₅ : (30 * x ^ 2 + 517) - 10 * (3 * x ^ 2 + 1) = 507 := by
        ring_nf
        <;> omega
      rw [h₅₅] at h₅₄
      exact h₅₄
    exact h₅₂
  have h₆ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ≤ 507 := by
    have h₆₁ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ∣ 507 := h₅
    have h₆₂ : 3 * x ^ 2 + 1 ≤ 507 := Int.le_of_dvd (by norm_num) h₆₁
    exact h₆₂
  have h₇ : x ≤ 40 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₈ : x ≥ -40 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₉ : x = 2 ∨ x = -2 := by
    have h₉₁ : x ≤ 40 := h₇
    have h₉₂ : x ≥ -40 := h₈
    interval_cases x <;> norm_num at h₃ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        have h₉₃ : y ≤ 100 := by
          nlinarith
        have h₉₄ : y ≥ -100 := by
          nlinarith
        interval_cases y <;> norm_num at h₃ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try nlinarith)
      }) <;>
      (try {
        norm_num at h₃ ⊢
        <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try {
          have h₉₅ : y ≤ 100 := by
            nlinarith
          have h₉₆ : y ≥ -100 := by
            nlinarith
          interval_cases y <;> norm_num at h₃ ⊢ <;>
            (try omega) <;>
            (try nlinarith)
        })
      })
  exact h₉

theorem aime_1987_p5 (x y : ℤ) (h₀ : y ^ 2 + 3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 30 * x ^ 2 + 517) :
    3 * (x ^ 2 * y ^ 2) = 588 := by
  have h₅ : x = 2 ∨ x = -2 := x_eq_two_or_neg_two x y h₀
  rcases h₅ with (rfl | rfl)
  ·
    norm_num at h₀ ⊢
    <;>
    (try omega)
    <;>
    (try {
      have h₆ : y ≤ 100 := by
        nlinarith
      have h₇ : y ≥ -100 := by
        nlinarith
      interval_cases y <;> norm_num at h₀ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try nlinarith)
    })
  ·
    norm_num at h₀ ⊢
    <;>
    (try omega)
    <;>
    (try {
      have h₆ : y ≤ 100 := by
        nlinarith
      have h₇ : y ≥ -100 := by
        nlinarith
      interval_cases y <;> norm_num at h₀ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try nlinarith)
    })

name: mathd_algebra_346
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  f_at_5 (f g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 2 * x - 3) (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = x + 1) :
    f 5 = 7 := by
  have h₂ : f 5 = 2 * (5 : ℝ) - 3 := by
    apply h₀
  rw [h₂]
  norm_num

lemma inner_sub_one (f g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 2 * x - 3) (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = x + 1) :
    f 5 - 1 = 6 := by
  have h₂ : f 5 = 7 := f_at_5 f g h₀ h₁
  rw [h₂]
  norm_num

lemma g_at_inner (f g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 2 * x - 3) (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = x + 1) (h₃ : f 5 - 1 = 6) :
    g (f 5 - 1) = 7 := by
  have h₄ : g (f 5 - 1) = (f 5 - 1) + 1 := by
    rw [h₁]
    <;> ring_nf
  rw [h₄, h₃]
  norm_num

lemma final_computation (f g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 2 * x - 3) (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = x + 1) :
    g (f 5 - 1) = 7 := by
  have h₄ : f 5 - 1 = 6 := inner_sub_one f g h₀ h₁
  exact g_at_inner f g h₀ h₁ h₄

theorem mathd_algebra_346 (f g : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 2 * x - 3) (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = x + 1) :
    g (f 5 - 1) = 7 := by
  exact final_computation f g h₀ h₁

name: mathd_algebra_487
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

theorem mathd_algebra_487 (a b c d : ℝ) (h₀ : b = a ^ 2) (h₁ : a + b = 1) (h₂ : d = c ^ 2)
    (h₃ : c + d = 1) (h₄ : a ≠ c) : Real.sqrt ((a - c) ^ 2 + (b - d) ^ 2) = Real.sqrt 10 := by
  have h₅ : a ^ 2 = 1 - a := by
    have h₅₁ : a + a ^ 2 = 1 := by
      calc
        a + a ^ 2 = a + b := by rw [h₀]
        _ = 1 := h₁
    linarith

  have h₆ : c ^ 2 = 1 - c := by
    have h₆₁ : c + c ^ 2 = 1 := by
      calc
        c + c ^ 2 = c + d := by rw [h₂]
        _ = 1 := h₃
    linarith

  have h₇ : b = 1 - a := by
    have h₇₁ : b = a ^ 2 := h₀
    rw [h₇₁]
    linarith

  have h₈ : d = 1 - c := by
    have h₈₁ : d = c ^ 2 := h₂
    rw [h₈₁]
    linarith

  have h₉ : a + c = -1 := by
    have h₉₁ : b - d = (a ^ 2) - (c ^ 2) := by
      calc
        b - d = a ^ 2 - c ^ 2 := by rw [h₀, h₂]
        _ = a ^ 2 - c ^ 2 := rfl
    have h₉₂ : b - d = (1 - a) - (1 - c) := by
      calc
        b - d = (1 - a) - (1 - c) := by
          rw [h₇, h₈]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> linarith
        _ = (1 - a) - (1 - c) := rfl
    have h₉₃ : (a ^ 2 : ℝ) - (c ^ 2 : ℝ) = (a - c) * (a + c) := by
      ring_nf
      <;> linarith
    have h₉₄ : (1 - a : ℝ) - (1 - c) = c - a := by ring_nf <;> linarith
    have h₉₅ : (a - c) * (a + c) = c - a := by
      linarith
    have h₉₆ : a + c = -1 := by
      have h₉₇ : a - c ≠ 0 := by
        intro h₉₇
        apply h₄
        linarith
      have h₉₈ : (a - c) * (a + c) = - (a - c) := by
        linarith
      have h₉₉ : a + c = -1 := by
        apply mul_left_cancel₀ h₉₇
        nlinarith
      exact h₉₉
    exact h₉₆

  have h₁₀ : a * c = -1 := by
    have h₁₀₁ : c = -1 - a := by linarith
    have h₁₀₂ : a * c = a * (-1 - a) := by rw [h₁₀₁]
    have h₁₀₃ : a * (-1 - a) = -a - a ^ 2 := by ring
    have h₁₀₄ : a * c = -a - a ^ 2 := by linarith
    have h₁₀₅ : a ^ 2 = 1 - a := h₅
    have h₁₀₆ : a * c = -a - (1 - a) := by
      rw [h₁₀₅] at h₁₀₄
      linarith
    have h₁₀₇ : a * c = -1 := by linarith
    exact h₁₀₇

  have h₁₁ : (a - c) ^ 2 = 5 := by
    have h₁₁₁ : (a + c) ^ 2 = 1 := by
      nlinarith [h₉]
    have h₁₁₂ : (a - c) ^ 2 = (a + c) ^ 2 - 4 * (a * c) := by
      ring_nf
      <;> nlinarith
    rw [h₁₁₂, h₁₁₁, h₁₀]
    <;> norm_num

  have h₁₂ : (b - d) ^ 2 = (a - c) ^ 2 := by
    have h₁₂₁ : b - d = (1 - a) - (1 - c) := by
      rw [h₇, h₈]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> linarith
    have h₁₂₂ : b - d = c - a := by linarith
    have h₁₂₃ : (b - d) ^ 2 = (c - a) ^ 2 := by
      rw [h₁₂₂]
      <;> ring_nf
    have h₁₂₄ : (c - a) ^ 2 = (a - c) ^ 2 := by
      ring_nf
      <;> linarith
    linarith

  have h₁₃ : (a - c) ^ 2 + (b - d) ^ 2 = 10 := by
    have h₁₃₁ : (b - d) ^ 2 = (a - c) ^ 2 := h₁₂
    rw [h₁₃₁]
    nlinarith [h₁₁]

  have h₁₄ : Real.sqrt ((a - c) ^ 2 + (b - d) ^ 2) = Real.sqrt 10 := by
    rw [h₁₃]
    <;>
    norm_num

  exact h₁₄

name: mathd_numbertheory_728
