import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  mod_pow_diff_eq_three : (29 ^ 13 - 5 ^ 13) % 7 = 3 := by
  norm_num [Nat.mod_eq_of_lt, pow_succ, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mul_assoc, Nat.mul_comm, Nat.mul_left_comm]

theorem mathd_numbertheory_728 : (29 ^ 13 - 5 ^ 13) % 7 = 3 := by
  exact mod_pow_diff_eq_three

name: mathd_algebra_184
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  b_eq_three (a b : NNReal) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a ^ 2 = 6 * b)
    (h₂ : a ^ 2 = 54 / b) : b = 3 := by
  have h₁' : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 6 * (b : ℝ) := by
    norm_cast at h₁ ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₂' : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 54 / (b : ℝ) := by
    norm_cast at h₂ ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₃ : (6 : ℝ) * (b : ℝ) = 54 / (b : ℝ) := by
    linarith
  have h₄ : (b : ℝ) > 0 := by
    exact_mod_cast h₀.2
  have h₅ : (6 : ℝ) * (b : ℝ) ^ 2 = 54 := by
    field_simp at h₃
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₆ : (b : ℝ) ^ 2 = 9 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₇ : (b : ℝ) = 3 := by
    nlinarith [sq_nonneg ((b : ℝ) - 3)]
  have h₈ : b = 3 := by
    norm_cast at h₇ ⊢
    <;>
    (try norm_num at h₇ ⊢) <;>
    (try simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        have h₉ : (b : ℝ) = 3 := by linarith
        have h₁₀ : (b : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
        have h₁₁ : (b : ℝ) = 3 := by linarith
        have h₁₂ : (b : ℕ) = 3 := by
          norm_cast at h₁₁ ⊢
          <;>
          (try norm_num at h₁₁ ⊢) <;>
          (try nlinarith) <;>
          (try
            {
              field_simp at h₁₁ ⊢
              <;>
              ring_nf at h₁₁ ⊢
              <;>
              nlinarith
            })
          <;>
          (try
            {
              norm_num at h₁₁ ⊢
              <;>
              nlinarith
            })
          <;>
          (try
            {
              simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
              <;>
              norm_num at h₁₁ ⊢
              <;>
              nlinarith
            })
        norm_num [h₁₂] at h₇ ⊢ <;>
        (try norm_num at h₇ ⊢) <;>
        (try nlinarith)
        <;>
        (try
          {
            field_simp at h₁₁ ⊢
            <;>
            ring_nf at h₁₁ ⊢
            <;>
            nlinarith
          })
        <;>
        (try
          {
            norm_num at h₁₁ ⊢
            <;>
            nlinarith
          })
        <;>
        (try
          {
            simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
            <;>
            norm_num at h₁₁ ⊢
            <;>
            nlinarith
          })
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
        <;>
        norm_num at h₇ ⊢
        <;>
        nlinarith
      })
  exact h₈

lemma a_sq_eq_18 (a b : NNReal) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a ^ 2 = 6 * b)
    (h₂ : a ^ 2 = 54 / b) (hb : b = 3) : a ^ 2 = 18 := by
  have h₁' : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 6 * (b : ℝ) := by
    norm_cast at h₁ ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₂' : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 54 / (b : ℝ) := by
    norm_cast at h₂ ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₃ : (b : ℝ) = 3 := by
    norm_cast at hb ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₄ : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 18 := by
    have h₅ : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 6 * (b : ℝ) := h₁'
    have h₆ : (b : ℝ) = 3 := h₃
    rw [h₆] at h₅
    norm_num at h₅ ⊢
    <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        have h₇ : (a : ℝ) > 0 := by
          exact_mod_cast h₀.1
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 2 by norm_num)]
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        have h₇ : (a : ℝ) > 0 := by
          exact_mod_cast h₀.1
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 2 by norm_num)]
      })
  have h₅ : a ^ 2 = 18 := by
    norm_cast at h₄ ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  exact h₅

lemma a_eq_3_sqrt2 (a b : NNReal) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a ^ 2 = 6 * b)
    (h₂ : a ^ 2 = 54 / b) (hb : b = 3) (ha2 : a ^ 2 = 18) : a = 3 * NNReal.sqrt 2 := by
  have h₃ : (a : ℝ) > 0 := by exact_mod_cast h₀.1
  have h₄ : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 18 := by
    norm_cast at ha2 ⊢
    <;> simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₅ : (a : ℝ) = 3 * Real.sqrt 2 := by
    have h₅₁ : (a : ℝ) > 0 := by exact_mod_cast h₀.1
    have h₅₂ : (a : ℝ) ^ 2 = 18 := h₄
    have h₅₃ : (a : ℝ) = 3 * Real.sqrt 2 := by
      
      have h₅₄ : (a : ℝ) = 3 * Real.sqrt 2 := by
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 2 by norm_num),
          sq_nonneg ((a : ℝ) - 3 * Real.sqrt 2)]
      exact h₅₄
    exact h₅₃
  have h₆ : a = 3 * NNReal.sqrt 2 := by
    have h₆₁ : (a : ℝ) = 3 * Real.sqrt 2 := h₅
    have h₆₂ : a = 3 * NNReal.sqrt 2 := by
      apply NNReal.eq
      simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]
      <;>
      (try norm_num at h₆₁ ⊢) <;>
      (try simp_all [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]) <;>
      (try nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 2 by norm_num)]) <;>
      (try
        {
          have h₆₃ : (a : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
          have h₆₄ : Real.sqrt 2 ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg 2
          nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 2 by norm_num)]
        })
    exact h₆₂
  exact h₆

theorem mathd_algebra_184 (a b : NNReal) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a ^ 2 = 6 * b)
    (h₂ : a ^ 2 = 54 / b) : a = 3 * NNReal.sqrt 2 := by
  have hb : b = 3 := b_eq_three a b h₀ h₁ h₂
  have ha2 : a ^ 2 = 18 := a_sq_eq_18 a b h₀ h₁ h₂ hb
  have ha : a = 3 * NNReal.sqrt 2 := a_eq_3_sqrt2 a b h₀ h₁ h₂ hb ha2
  exact ha

name: mathd_numbertheory_552
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  h_dvd_11 (f g h : ℕ+ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 12 * x + 7)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = 5 * x + 2)
    (h₂ : ∀ x, h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x)) (x : ℕ+) :
    h x ∣ 11 := by
  have hx : h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x) := h₂ x
  have hx' : h x ∣ 11 := by
    have h₄ : h x = Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) := by
      have h₅ : f x = 12 * (x : ℕ) + 7 := by
        simpa [h₀] using rfl
      have h₆ : g x = 5 * (x : ℕ) + 2 := by
        simpa [h₁] using rfl
      simpa [h₂, h₅, h₆] using rfl
    rw [h₄]
    have h₅ : Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) ∣ 11 := by
      have h₆ : Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) ∣ 12 * (x : ℕ) + 7 :=
        Nat.gcd_dvd_left (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2)
      have h₇ : Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) ∣ 5 * (x : ℕ) + 2 :=
        Nat.gcd_dvd_right (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2)
      have h₈ : Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) ∣ 5 * (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) :=
        dvd_mul_of_dvd_right h₆ 5
      have h₉ : Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) ∣ 12 * (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) :=
        dvd_mul_of_dvd_right h₇ 12
      have h₁₀ : Nat.gcd (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) ∣ 5 * (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) - 12 * (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) := by
        exact Nat.dvd_sub' h₈ h₉
      have h₁₁ : 5 * (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) - 12 * (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) = 11 := by
        have h₁₂ : 5 * (12 * (x : ℕ) + 7) ≥ 12 * (5 * (x : ℕ) + 2) := by
          omega
        omega
      rw [h₁₁] at h₁₀
      exact h₁₀
    exact h₅
  exact hx'

lemma h_eq_one_or_eleven (f g h : ℕ+ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 12 * x + 7)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = 5 * x + 2)
    (h₂ : ∀ x, h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x)) (x : ℕ+) :
    h x = 1 ∨ h x = 11 := by
  have h₅ : h x ∣ 11 := h_dvd_11 f g h h₀ h₁ h₂ x
  have h₆ : h x ≤ 11 := Nat.le_of_dvd (by norm_num) h₅
  have h₇ : h x = 1 ∨ h x = 11 := by
    interval_cases h x <;> norm_num at h₅ ⊢ <;> (try omega) <;> (try norm_num) <;> (try omega)
  exact h₇

lemma one_mem_range (f g h : ℕ+ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 12 * x + 7)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = 5 * x + 2)
    (h₂ : ∀ x, h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x)) :
    (1 : ℕ) ∈ Set.range h := by
  use (⟨1, by norm_num⟩ : ℕ+)
  simp_all [h₀, h₁, h₂]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

lemma eleven_mem_range (f g h : ℕ+ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 12 * x + 7)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = 5 * x + 2)
    (h₂ : ∀ x, h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x)) :
    (11 : ℕ) ∈ Set.range h := by
  use (⟨4, by norm_num⟩ : ℕ+)
  simp_all [h₀, h₁, h₂]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

lemma sum_range_eq_12 (f g h : ℕ+ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 12 * x + 7)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = 5 * x + 2)
    (h₂ : ∀ x, h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x)) (h₃ : Fintype (Set.range h)) :
    (∑ k in (Set.range h).toFinset, k) = 12 := by
  have h₅ : (∑ k in (Set.range h).toFinset, k) = 12 := by
    have h₆ : ∀ y ∈ Set.range h, y = 1 ∨ y = 11 := by
      intro y hy
      rcases hy with ⟨x, rfl⟩
      exact h_eq_one_or_eleven f g h h₀ h₁ h₂ x
    have h₇ : (Set.range h).toFinset = {1, 11} := by
      apply Finset.ext
      intro y
      simp only [Finset.mem_insert, Finset.mem_singleton, Set.mem_range] at *
      constructor
      · intro h₈
        have h₉ : y = 1 ∨ y = 11 := by
          have h₁₀ : y ∈ Set.range h := by simpa using h₈
          exact h₆ y h₁₀
        cases h₉ with
        | inl h₉ => simp [h₉]
        | inr h₉ => simp [h₉]
      · intro h₈
        have h₉ : y = 1 ∨ y = 11 := by simpa using h₈
        cases h₉ with
        | inl h₉ =>
          have h₁₀ : (1 : ℕ) ∈ Set.range h := one_mem_range f g h h₀ h₁ h₂
          simpa [h₉] using h₁₀
        | inr h₉ =>
          have h₁₀ : (11 : ℕ) ∈ Set.range h := eleven_mem_range f g h h₀ h₁ h₂
          simpa [h₉] using h₁₀
    rw [h₇]
    norm_num
  exact h₅

theorem mathd_numbertheory_552 (f g h : ℕ+ → ℕ) (h₀ : ∀ x, f x = 12 * x + 7)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, g x = 5 * x + 2) (h₂ : ∀ x, h x = Nat.gcd (f x) (g x)) (h₃ : Fintype (Set.range h)) :
    (∑ k in (Set.range h).toFinset, k) = 12 := by
  exact sum_range_eq_12 f g h h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃

name: amc12b_2021_p9

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  numerator_eq :
    Real.log 80 * Real.log 40 - Real.log 160 * Real.log 20 = 2 * (Real.log 2) ^ 2 := by
  have h₁ : Real.log 80 = Real.log (2 ^ 4 * 5) := by norm_num
  have h₂ : Real.log 40 = Real.log (2 ^ 3 * 5) := by norm_num
  have h₃ : Real.log 160 = Real.log (2 ^ 5 * 5) := by norm_num
  have h₄ : Real.log 20 = Real.log (2 ^ 2 * 5) := by norm_num
  rw [h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄]
  have h₅ : Real.log (2 ^ 4 * 5) = Real.log (2 ^ 4) + Real.log 5 := by
    rw [Real.log_mul (by positivity) (by positivity)]
  have h₆ : Real.log (2 ^ 3 * 5) = Real.log (2 ^ 3) + Real.log 5 := by
    rw [Real.log_mul (by positivity) (by positivity)]
  have h₇ : Real.log (2 ^ 5 * 5) = Real.log (2 ^ 5) + Real.log 5 := by
    rw [Real.log_mul (by positivity) (by positivity)]
  have h₈ : Real.log (2 ^ 2 * 5) = Real.log (2 ^ 2) + Real.log 5 := by
    rw [Real.log_mul (by positivity) (by positivity)]
  rw [h₅, h₆, h₇, h₈]
  have h₉ : Real.log (2 ^ 4) = 4 * Real.log 2 := by
    rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
  have h₁₀ : Real.log (2 ^ 3) = 3 * Real.log 2 := by
    rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
  have h₁₁ : Real.log (2 ^ 5) = 5 * Real.log 2 := by
    rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
  have h₁₂ : Real.log (2 ^ 2) = 2 * Real.log 2 := by
    rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
  rw [h₉, h₁₀, h₁₁, h₁₂]
  ring_nf
  <;>
  nlinarith [Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 2), Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 5)]


lemma denominator_ne_zero : (Real.log 2) ^ 2 ≠ 0 := by
  have h₁ : Real.log 2 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
  have h₂ : (Real.log 2) ^ 2 > 0 := by positivity
  exact ne_of_gt h₂

theorem amc12b_2021_p9 :
    Real.log 80 / Real.log 2 / (Real.log 2 / Real.log 40) -
        Real.log 160 / Real.log 2 / (Real.log 2 / Real.log 20) =
      2 := by
  have h_num := numerator_eq
  have h_den_ne_zero := denominator_ne_zero
  have h₁ :
      Real.log 80 / Real.log 2 / (Real.log 2 / Real.log 40) -
        Real.log 160 / Real.log 2 / (Real.log 2 / Real.log 20) =
        (Real.log 80 * Real.log 40 - Real.log 160 * Real.log 20) / (Real.log 2) ^ 2 := by
    have h₂ : Real.log 2 ≠ 0 := by
      have h₃ : Real.log 2 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
      linarith
    have h₃ : Real.log 40 ≠ 0 := by
      have h₄ : Real.log 40 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
      linarith
    have h₄ : Real.log 80 ≠ 0 := by
      have h₅ : Real.log 80 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
      linarith
    have h₅ : Real.log 160 ≠ 0 := by
      have h₆ : Real.log 160 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
      linarith
    have h₆ : Real.log 20 ≠ 0 := by
      have h₇ : Real.log 20 > 0 := Real.log_pos (by norm_num)
      linarith
    field_simp [h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> field_simp [h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> linarith
  rw [h₁]
  have h₂ : (Real.log 80 * Real.log 40 - Real.log 160 * Real.log 20) / (Real.log 2) ^ 2 = 2 := by
    rw [h_num]
    have h₃ : (Real.log 2) ^ 2 ≠ 0 := denominator_ne_zero
    field_simp [h₃]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> nlinarith [Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 2)]
  rw [h₂]
  <;> norm_num

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  t_eq_4 (s t : ℝ) (h₀ : s = 9 - 2 * t) (h₁ : t = 3 * s + 1) : t = 4 := by
  have h₂ : t = 3 * (9 - 2 * t) + 1 := by
    rw [h₀] at h₁
    exact h₁
  have h₃ : t = 28 - 6 * t := by
    ring_nf at h₂ ⊢
    linarith
  have h₄ : t = 4 := by
    have h₅ : 7 * t = 28 := by linarith
    nlinarith
  exact h₄

lemma s_eq_1 (s t : ℝ) (h₀ : s = 9 - 2 * t) (h₁ : t = 3 * s + 1) (ht : t = 4) : s = 1 := by
  have h₃ : s = 9 - 2 * t := h₀
  rw [ht] at h₃
  ring_nf at h₃ ⊢
  linarith

theorem mathd_algebra_44 (s t : ℝ) (h₀ : s = 9 - 2 * t) (h₁ : t = 3 * s + 1) : s = 1 ∧ t = 4 := by
  have h₂ : t = 4 := t_eq_4 s t h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : s = 1 := s_eq_1 s t h₀ h₁ h₂
  exact ⟨h₃, h₂⟩

name: mathd_algebra_215

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  S_eq (S : Finset ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x : ℝ, x ∈ S ↔ (x + 3) ^ 2 = 121) :
    S = {8, -14} := by
  apply Finset.ext
  intro x
  simp only [Finset.mem_insert, Finset.mem_singleton]
  constructor
  · intro hx
    have h₁ : x ∈ S := hx
    have h₂ : (x + 3) ^ 2 = 121 := (h₀ x).mp h₁
    have h₃ : x = 8 ∨ x = -14 := by
      have h₄ : x + 3 = 11 ∨ x + 3 = -11 := by
        apply or_iff_not_imp_left.mpr
        intro h₅
        apply eq_of_sub_eq_zero
        apply mul_left_cancel₀ (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₅)
        nlinarith
      cases h₄ with
      | inl h₄ =>
        have h₅ : x = 8 := by linarith
        exact Or.inl h₅
      | inr h₄ =>
        have h₅ : x = -14 := by linarith
        exact Or.inr h₅
    cases h₃ with
    | inl h₃ => simp [h₃]
    | inr h₃ => simp [h₃]
  · intro hx
    have h₁ : x = 8 ∨ x = -14 := by aesop
    cases h₁ with
    | inl h₁ =>
      rw [h₁]
      have h₂ : (8 : ℝ) ∈ S := by
        have h₃ : ((8 : ℝ) + 3) ^ 2 = (121 : ℝ) := by norm_num
        have h₄ : (8 : ℝ) ∈ S := by
          rw [h₀]
          norm_num
        exact h₄
      exact h₂
    | inr h₁ =>
      rw [h₁]
      have h₂ : (-14 : ℝ) ∈ S := by
        have h₃ : ((-14 : ℝ) + 3) ^ 2 = (121 : ℝ) := by norm_num
        have h₄ : (-14 : ℝ) ∈ S := by
          rw [h₀]
          norm_num
        exact h₄
      exact h₂


lemma sum_S_eq_neg6 (S : Finset ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x : ℝ, x ∈ S ↔ (x + 3) ^ 2 = 121) :
    (∑ k in S, k) = -6 := by
  have h₁ : S = {8, -14} := S_eq S h₀
  rw [h₁]
  norm_num

theorem mathd_algebra_215 (S : Finset ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ x : ℝ, x ∈ S ↔ (x + 3) ^ 2 = 121) :
    (∑ k in S, k) = -6 := by
  exact sum_S_eq_neg6 S h₀

lemma  a0_eq (a : ℕ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ n, a (n + 2) - a (n + 1) = a (n + 1) - a n)
    (h₁ : a 1 = 2 / 3) (h₂ : a 9 = 4 / 5) : a 0 = 13 / 20 := by

  have h₄ := h₀ 1
  have h₅ := h₀ 2

lemma a5_eq (a : ℕ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ n, a (n + 2) - a (n + 1) = a (n + 1) - a n)
    (h₁ : a 1 = 2 / 3) (h₂ : a 9 = 4 / 5) : a 5 = 11 / 15 := by

  have h₄ := h₀ 1

  have h₆ := h₀ 3
  have h₇ := h₀ 4
  have h₈ := h₀ 5

  have h₁₀ := h₀ 7
  have h₁₁ := h₀ 8
  have h₁₂ := h₀ 9
  have h₁₃ : a 0 = 13 / 20 := by
    have h₁₄ := h₀ 0

  have h₁₄ : a 5 = 11 / 15 := by

    have h₁₇ := h₀ 2
    have h₁₈ := h₀ 3
    have h₁₉ := h₀ 4

    have h₂₃ := h₀ 8
    have h₂₄ := h₀ 9
    norm_num at *
    ring_nf at *
    linarith
  exact h₁₄

theorem mathd_algebra_452 (a : ℕ → ℝ) (h₀ : ∀ n, a (n + 2) - a (n + 1) = a (n + 1) - a n)
    (h₁ : a 1 = 2 / 3) (h₂ : a 9 = 4 / 5) : a 5 = 11 / 15 := by
  exact a5_eq a h₀ h₁ h₂

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  le_of_square_and_cube
    (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 10 ≤ n) (h₁ : ∃ x, x ^ 2 = n) (h₂ : ∃ t, t ^ 3 = n) :
    64 ≤ n := by
  by_contra! h
  have h₃ : n ≤ 63 := by linarith
  have h₄ : ∃ x, x ^ 2 = n := h₁
  have h₅ : ∃ t, t ^ 3 = n := h₂
  rcases h₄ with ⟨x, hx⟩
  rcases h₅ with ⟨t, ht⟩
  have h₆ : x ^ 2 = n := hx
  have h₇ : t ^ 3 = n := ht
  have h₈ : x ^ 2 ≤ 63 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₉ : t ^ 3 ≤ 63 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₁₀ : x ≤ 7 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₁₁ : t ≤ 3 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (t : ℤ), pow_two_nonneg (t - 1 : ℤ)]
  have h₁₂ : x ≥ 4 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₁₃ : t ≥ 2 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (t : ℤ), pow_two_nonneg (t - 1 : ℤ)]
  have h₁₄ : x = 4 ∨ x = 5 ∨ x = 6 ∨ x = 7 := by
    have h₁₅ : x ≤ 7 := h₁₀
    have h₁₆ : x ≥ 4 := h₁₂
    interval_cases x <;> norm_num at h₆ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        have h₁₇ : t ≤ 3 := h₁₁
        have h₁₈ : t ≥ 2 := h₁₃
        interval_cases t <;> norm_num at h₇ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try nlinarith)
      })
  have h₁₅ : t = 2 ∨ t = 3 := by
    have h₁₆ : t ≤ 3 := h₁₁
    have h₁₇ : t ≥ 2 := h₁₃
    interval_cases t <;> norm_num at h₇ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        have h₁₈ : x ≤ 7 := h₁₀
        have h₁₉ : x ≥ 4 := h₁₂
        interval_cases x <;> norm_num at h₆ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try nlinarith)
      })
  rcases h₁₄ with (rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl) <;>
    rcases h₁₅ with (rfl | rfl) <;>
      norm_num at h₆ h₇ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try nlinarith)

theorem mathd_numbertheory_5 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 10 ≤ n) (h₁ : ∃ x, x ^ 2 = n) (h₂ : ∃ t, t ^ 3 = n) :
    64 ≤ n := by
  exact le_of_square_and_cube n h₀ h₁ h₂

name: mathd_numbertheory_483
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_mod_four (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : a 1 = 1) (h₁ : a 2 = 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ n, a (n + 2) = a (n + 1) + a n) :
    ∀ n, a n % 4 = (Nat.fib (n % 6)) % 4 := by
  intro n
  have h₃ : ∀ n, a n % 4 = (Nat.fib (n % 6)) % 4 := by
    intro n
    have h₄ : a n % 4 = (Nat.fib (n % 6)) % 4 := by
      induction n using Nat.strong_induction_on with
      | h n ih =>
        match n with
        | 0 =>
          
          have h₅ := h₂ 0
          have h₆ := h₂ 1
          have h₇ := h₂ 2
          have h₈ := h₂ 3
          have h₉ := h₂ 4
          have h₁₀ := h₂ 5
          simp at h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀ ⊢
          <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            ring_nf at *
            <;> omega
          })
        | 1 =>
          simp [h₀] <;>
          (try {
            norm_num [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod] at *
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          })
        | 2 =>
          simp [h₁] <;>
          (try {
            norm_num [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod] at *
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          })
        | 3 =>
          have h₅ := h₂ 1
          have h₆ := h₂ 2
          have h₇ := h₂ 3
          simp [h₀, h₁] at h₅ h₆ h₇ ⊢
          <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            ring_nf at *
            <;> omega
          })
        | 4 =>
          have h₅ := h₂ 2
          have h₆ := h₂ 3
          have h₇ := h₂ 4
          simp [h₀, h₁] at h₅ h₆ h₇ ⊢
          <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            ring_nf at *
            <;> omega
          })
        | 5 =>
          have h₅ := h₂ 3
          have h₆ := h₂ 4
          have h₇ := h₂ 5
          simp [h₀, h₁] at h₅ h₆ h₇ ⊢
          <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            ring_nf at *
            <;> omega
          })
        | n + 6 =>
          have h₅ := h₂ (n + 4)
          have h₆ := h₂ (n + 5)
          have h₇ := h₂ (n + 6)
          have h₈ := ih (n + 4) (by omega)
          have h₉ := ih (n + 5) (by omega)
          have h₁₀ := ih n (by omega)
          have h₁₁ := ih (n + 1) (by omega)
          have h₁₂ := ih (n + 2) (by omega)
          have h₁₃ := ih (n + 3) (by omega)
          simp [h₂, Nat.add_assoc] at h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀ h₁₁ h₁₂ h₁₃ ⊢
          <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> ring_nf at *
            <;> omega
          }) <;>
          (try {
            simp_all [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
            <;> omega
          })
    exact h₄
  exact h₃ n

theorem mathd_numbertheory_483 (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : a 1 = 1) (h₁ : a 2 = 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ n, a (n + 2) = a (n + 1) + a n) : a 100 % 4 = 3 := by
  have h₃ : ∀ n, a n % 4 = (Nat.fib (n % 6)) % 4 := a_mod_four a h₀ h₁ h₂
  have h₄ : a 100 % 4 = (Nat.fib (100 % 6)) % 4 := by
    apply h₃
  have h₅ : (Nat.fib (100 % 6)) % 4 = 3 := by
    norm_num [Nat.fib_add_two, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.mod_mod]
    <;> rfl
  omega

name: amc12b_2020_p21
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma `S_eq_explicit` stating that `S` equals the explicit finite
   set containing those six numbers.  
   The proof is done by elementwise membership:
   * forward direction: from the defining condition derive the six possible
     values by bounding `n` (using `⌊√n⌋ ≤ √n` and `√n < ⌊√n⌋ + 1`) and checking each
     case numerically;
   * backward direction: for each of the six numbers, verify the condition
     directly (compute `⌊√n⌋` and the division, using `norm_num` and the facts
     `Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq`, `Int.floor_eq_iff`).

3. **Compute the cardinality.**  
   With the equality `S = {400,2290,2360,2430,2500,4900}` the cardinality is
   immediate; `norm_num` together with `Finset.card_insert_of_not_mem` etc.
   gives `S.card = 6`.  This is captured in the lemma `S_card_eq_six`.

4. **Conclude the theorem.**  
   The theorem `amc12b_2020_p21` is a direct invocation of `S_card_eq_six`.

**Key facts used.**
- `Real.sqrt_nonneg`, `Real.sq_sqrt` to evaluate square roots of perfect squares.
- `Int.floor_eq_iff` to translate the floor condition into inequalities.
- `norm_num` to handle the arithmetic of the six explicit candidates.
- Basic inequalities (`linarith`, `nlinarith`) to bound `n` from the defining
  equation.

By structuring the proof into the two lemmas above, the final theorem becomes
a one‑liner, and the overall argument is clearer and easier to maintain.
### Final Lean 4 Proof
```lean4
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  S_eq_explicit (S : Finset ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ n : ℕ, n ∈ S ↔ 0 < n ∧ (↑n + (1000 : ℝ)) / 70 = Int.floor (Real.sqrt n)) :
    S = {400, 2290, 2360, 2430, 2500, 4900} := by
  apply Finset.ext
  intro n
  simp only [Finset.mem_insert, Finset.mem_singleton, h₀]
  constructor
  · intro h
    have h₁ : 0 < n := h.1
    have h₂ : (↑n + (1000 : ℝ)) / 70 = Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) := by
      exact_mod_cast h.2
    have h₃ : n = 400 ∨ n = 2290 ∨ n = 2360 ∨ n = 2430 ∨ n = 2500 ∨ n = 4900 := by
      have h₄ : 0 < n := h₁
      have h₅ : (n : ℝ) + 1000 = 70 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n)) := by
        have h₅₁ : (↑n + (1000 : ℝ)) / 70 = Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) := h₂
        field_simp at h₅₁ ⊢
        <;> ring_nf at h₅₁ ⊢ <;> norm_cast at h₅₁ ⊢ <;>
          (try norm_num at h₅₁ ⊢) <;>
          (try linarith) <;>
          (try
            {
              nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
                Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ)),
                Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt n),
                Int.lt_floor_add_one (Real.sqrt n)]
            })
      have h₆ : 0 < n := h₁
      have h₇ : 0 < (n : ℝ) := by positivity
      have h₈ : 0 ≤ Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
      have h₉ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ)) : ℝ) ≤ Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) :=
        Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ))
      have h₁₀ : Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) < (Int.floor (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ)) : ℝ) + 1 :=
        Int.lt_floor_add_one (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ))
      have h₁₁ : (n : ℝ) + 1000 = 70 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n)) := h₅
      have h₁₂ : (n : ℤ) > 0 := by exact_mod_cast h₆
      have h₁₃ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≥ 0 := by
        apply Int.floor_nonneg.mpr
        apply Real.sqrt_nonneg
      have h₁₄ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≥ 1 := by
        by_contra h
        have h₁₅ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≤ 0 := by linarith
        have h₁₆ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≤ 0 := by
          exact_mod_cast h₁₅
        have h₁₇ : Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
        have h₁₈ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≤ Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) :=
          Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ))
        have h₁₉ : (n : ℝ) + 1000 = 70 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) := by
          exact_mod_cast h₅
        nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ)),
          Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ), sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) - 1)]
      have h₁₅ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≤ 70 := by
        by_contra h
        have h₁₆ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≥ 71 := by linarith
        have h₁₇ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≥ 71 := by
          exact_mod_cast h₁₆
        have h₁₈ : (n : ℝ) + 1000 = 70 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) := h₅
        have h₁₉ : (n : ℝ) ≥ 70 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) - 1000 := by linarith
        have h₂₀ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≤ Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) :=
          Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ))
        have h₂₁ : Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) < (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) + 1 :=
          Int.lt_floor_add_one (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ))
        nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ)),
          Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ), sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) - 1)]
      have h₁₆ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≥ 1 := by linarith
      have h₁₇ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≤ 70 := by linarith
      have h₁₈ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℕ) ≤ 70 := by
        omega
      have h₁₉ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℕ) ≥ 1 := by
        omega
      interval_cases (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) <;>
        (try norm_num at h₅ ⊢) <;>
        (try
          {
            have h₂₀ : (n : ℝ) + 1000 = 70 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) := h₅
            have h₂₁ : (n : ℕ) ≤ 4900 := by
              by_contra h₂₁
              have h₂₂ : (n : ℕ) ≥ 4901 := by omega
              have h₂₃ : (n : ℝ) ≥ 4901 := by
                norm_cast
              have h₂₄ : Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) ≥ 70 := by
                apply Real.le_sqrt_of_sq_le
                <;> norm_num at h₂₃ ⊢ <;> nlinarith
              have h₂₅ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≥ 70 := by
                have h₂₆ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≤ Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) :=
                  Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ))
                have h₂₇ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≥ 70 := by
                  by_contra h₂₇
                  have h₂₈ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℤ) ≤ 69 := by linarith
                  have h₂₉ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≤ 69 := by
                    exact_mod_cast h₂₈
                  nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
                    Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ)),
                    Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt n),
                    Int.lt_floor_add_one (Real.sqrt n)]
                have h₃₀ : (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) : ℝ) ≥ 70 := by
                  exact_mod_cast h₂₇
                linarith
              nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
                Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ)),
                Int.floor_le (Real.sqrt n),
                Int.lt_floor_add_one (Real.sqrt n)]
            interval_cases (n : ℕ) <;> norm_num at h₅ ⊢ <;>
              (try
                {
                  norm_num [Int.floor_eq_iff, Real.le_sqrt, Real.sqrt_lt] at *
                  <;>
                  (try norm_num) <;>
                  (try nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
                    Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ))])
                })
          }) <;>
        (try
          {
            norm_num [Int.floor_eq_iff, Real.le_sqrt, Real.sqrt_lt] at *
            <;>
            (try norm_num) <;>
            (try
              {
                have h₂₀ : (n : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
                have h₂₁ : (n : ℝ) < 10000 := by
                  nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
                    Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ))]
                interval_cases (n : ℕ) <;> norm_num at h₅ ⊢ <;>
                  (try
                    {
                      norm_num [Int.floor_eq_iff, Real.le_sqrt, Real.sqrt_lt] at *
                      <;>
                      (try norm_num) <;>
                      (try nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
                        Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ))])
                    })
              })
          }) <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ),
          Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ))])
    rcases h₃ with (rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl) <;> norm_num
  · intro h
    have h₁ : n = 400 ∨ n = 2290 ∨ n = 2360 ∨ n = 2430 ∨ n = 2500 ∨ n = 4900 := by aesop
    have h₂ : 0 < n ∧ (↑n + (1000 : ℝ)) / 70 = Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) := by
      rcases h₁ with (rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl)
      ·
        constructor
        · norm_num
        ·
          have h₃ : ⌊Real.sqrt (400 : ℝ)⌋ = 20 := by
            norm_num [Int.floor_eq_iff, Real.le_sqrt, Real.sqrt_lt] <;>
              (try norm_num) <;>
              (try
                {
                  nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (400 : ℝ),
                    Real.sq_sqrt (by norm_num : 0 ≤ (400 : ℝ))]
                })
          have h₄ : (↑(400 : ℕ) + (1000 : ℝ)) / 70 = (20 : ℝ) := by norm_num
          simp_all [h₃] <;> norm_num <;>
            (try
              {
                nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (400 : ℝ),
                  Real.sq_sqrt (by norm_num : 0 ≤ (400 : ℝ))]
              })
      ·
        constructor
        · norm_num
        ·
          have h₃ : ⌊Real.sqrt (2290 : ℝ)⌋ = 47 := by
            norm_num [Int.floor_eq_iff, Real.le_sqrt, Real.sqrt_lt] <;>

          have h₄ : (↑(2290 : ℕ) + (1000 : ℝ)) / 70 = (47 : ℝ) := by norm_num

            (try

                nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (2290 : ℝ),

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  bounds_from_h₀ (A M C : ℕ) (h₀ : A ≤ 9 ∧ M ≤ 9 ∧ C ≤ 9) :
    A ≤ 9 ∧ M ≤ 9 ∧ C ≤ 9 := by
  exact h₀

lemma digits_are_unique (A M C : ℕ)
    (h₀ : A ≤ 9 ∧ M ≤ 9 ∧ C ≤ 9)
    (h₁ :
        Nat.ofDigits 10 [0, 1, C, M, A] +
          Nat.ofDigits 10 [2, 1, C, M, A] = 123422) :
    A = 6 ∧ M = 1 ∧ C = 7 := by
  have h₂ : A ≤ 9 := h₀.1
  have h₃ : M ≤ 9 := h₀.2.1
  have h₄ : C ≤ 9 := h₀.2.2
  have h₅ :
      Nat.ofDigits 10 [0, 1, C, M, A] +
        Nat.ofDigits 10 [2, 1, C, M, A] = 123422 := h₁
  have h₆ : A = 6 := by
    interval_cases A <;>
      norm_num [Nat.ofDigits] at h₅ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try
          {
            interval_cases M <;>
              norm_num [Nat.ofDigits] at h₅ ⊢ <;>
                (try omega) <;>
                (try
                  {
                    interval_cases C <;>
                      norm_num [Nat.ofDigits] at h₅ ⊢ <;>
                        (try omega)
                  })
          })
  have h₇ : M = 1 := by
    interval_cases M <;>
      norm_num [Nat.ofDigits] at h₅ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try
          {
            interval_cases C <;>
              norm_num [Nat.ofDigits] at h₅ ⊢ <;>
                (try omega)
          })
  have h₈ : C = 7 := by
    interval_cases C <;>
      norm_num [Nat.ofDigits] at h₅ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega)
  exact ⟨h₆, h₇, h₈⟩

lemma sum_is_14 (A M C : ℕ)
    (h₂ : A = 6 ∧ M = 1 ∧ C = 7) :
    A + M + C = 14 := by
  rcases h₂ with ⟨hA, hM, hC⟩
  simp [hA, hM, hC] <;> norm_num

theorem amc12a_2003_p5 (A M C : ℕ) (h₀ : A ≤ 9 ∧ M ≤ 9 ∧ C ≤ 9)
    (h₁ : Nat.ofDigits 10 [0, 1, C, M, A] + Nat.ofDigits 10 [2, 1, C, M, A] = 123422) :
    A + M + C = 14 := by
  have h₂ : A = 6 ∧ M = 1 ∧ C = 7 := digits_are_unique A M C h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : A + M + C = 14 := sum_is_14 A M C h₂
  exact h₃

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  six_dvd_a (a b : ℕ) (h₃ : Nat.gcd a b = 6) : 6 ∣ a := by
  have h₄ : Nat.gcd a b = 6 := h₃
  have h₅ : Nat.gcd a b ∣ a := Nat.gcd_dvd_left a b
  rw [h₄] at h₅
  norm_num at h₅ ⊢
  exact h₅

lemma six_dvd_b (a b : ℕ) (h₃ : Nat.gcd a b = 6) : 6 ∣ b := by
  have h₄ : Nat.gcd a b = 6 := h₃
  have h₅ : Nat.gcd a b ∣ b := Nat.gcd_dvd_right a b
  rw [h₄] at h₅
  norm_num at h₅ ⊢
  exact h₅

lemma a_ge_12 (a b : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a % 10 = 2)
    (h₂ : b % 10 = 4) (h₃ : Nat.gcd a b = 6) :
    a ≥ 12 := by
  have h₄ : 6 ∣ a := six_dvd_a a b h₃
  have h₅ : a % 10 = 2 := h₁
  have h₆ : 0 < a := h₀.1
  by_contra! h₇
  have h₈ : a ≤ 11 := by linarith
  interval_cases a <;> norm_num at h₅ h₄ ⊢ <;>
    (try omega) <;>
    (try {
      have h₉ : Nat.gcd a b = 6 := h₃
      have h₁₀ : b % 10 = 4 := h₂
      have h₁₁ : 0 < b := h₀.2
      norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right, Nat.gcd_eq_left] at h₉ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try {
          interval_cases b <;> norm_num at h₁₀ h₉ ⊢ <;>
            (try omega) <;>
            (try {
              contradiction
            })
        })
    }) <;>
    (try {
      omega
    })

lemma b_ge_24 (a b : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a % 10 = 2)
    (h₂ : b % 10 = 4) (h₃ : Nat.gcd a b = 6) :
    b ≥ 24 := by
  have h₄ : 6 ∣ b := six_dvd_b a b h₃
  have h₅ : b % 10 = 4 := h₂
  have h₆ : 0 < b := h₀.2
  by_contra! h₇
  have h₈ : b ≤ 23 := by linarith
  interval_cases b <;> norm_num at h₅ h₄ ⊢ <;>
    (try omega) <;>
    (try {
      have h₉ : Nat.gcd a b = 6 := h₃
      have h₁₀ : a % 10 = 2 := h₁
      have h₁₁ : 0 < a := h₀.1
      norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right, Nat.gcd_eq_left] at h₉ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try {
          interval_cases a <;> norm_num at h₁₀ h₉ ⊢ <;>
            (try omega) <;>
            (try {
              contradiction
            })
        })
    }) <;>
    (try {
      omega
    })

lemma lcm_ge_108 (a b : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a % 10 = 2)
    (h₂ : b % 10 = 4) (h₃ : Nat.gcd a b = 6)
    (ha : a ≥ 12) (hb : b ≥ 24) :
    108 ≤ Nat.lcm a b := by
  have h₄ : Nat.gcd a b = 6 := h₃
  have h₅ : Nat.lcm a b = a * b / Nat.gcd a b := by
    rw [Nat.lcm]
    <;>
    simp [Nat.gcd_comm]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    omega
  rw [h₅, h₄]
  have h₆ : a * b / 6 ≥ 108 := by
    have h₇ : a ≥ 12 := ha
    have h₈ : b ≥ 24 := hb
    have h₉ : a * b ≥ 12 * 24 := by
      nlinarith
    have h₁₀ : a * b ≥ 288 := by nlinarith
    have h₁₁ : a * b / 6 ≥ 48 := by
      omega
    have h₁₂ : a * b ≥ 648 := by
      by_contra h
      have h₁₃ : a * b < 648 := by linarith
      have h₁₄ : a ≤ 42 := by
        by_contra h₁₅
        have h₁₆ : a ≥ 48 := by omega
        have h₁₇ : a * b ≥ 48 * 24 := by nlinarith
        omega
      have h₁₅ : b ≤ 54 := by
        by_contra h₁₆
        have h₁₇ : b ≥ 60 := by omega
        have h₁₈ : a * b ≥ 12 * 60 := by nlinarith
        omega
      interval_cases a <;> norm_num at h₁ ⊢ <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try {
          interval_cases b <;> norm_num at h₂ h₄ ⊢ <;>
            (try omega) <;>
            (try {
              norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right, Nat.gcd_eq_left] at h₄ ⊢ <;>
                omega
            })
        })
    omega
  omega
  <;>
  simp_all [Nat.lcm]
  <;>
  norm_num
  <;>
  ring_nf at *
  <;>
  omega

theorem mathd_numbertheory_495 (a b : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b) (h₁ : a % 10 = 2) (h₂ : b % 10 = 4)
    (h₃ : Nat.gcd a b = 6) : 108 ≤ Nat.lcm a b := by
  have h₄ : a ≥ 12 := a_ge_12 a b h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  have h₅ : b ≥ 24 := b_ge_24 a b h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  exact lcm_ge_108 a b h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  h_main (n : ℕ) (hn : 0 < n) :
    ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / 2 ^ k) < 5 / 2 := by
  have h₁ :
      ∀ n : ℕ, 0 < n →
        ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / 2 ^ k) < 5 / 2 := by
    intro n hn
    induction' hn with n hn IH
    · 
      norm_num [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top]
    · 
      cases n with
      | zero =>
        norm_num [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top] at *
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, pow_succ] <;>
          (try norm_num) <;>
          (try
            {
              apply lt_trans (by
                norm_num [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, pow_succ] at *
                <;>
                linarith
                <;>
                norm_num
                <;>
                linarith
                <;>
                norm_num
                <;>
                linarith) ?_)
              <;>
              norm_num [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, pow_succ] at *
              <;>
              ring_nf at *
              <;>
              norm_num at *
              <;>
              apply lt_of_sub_pos
              <;>
              field_simp at *
              <;>
              ring_nf at *
              <;>
              nlinarith [pow_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2) n, pow_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2) (n + 1), pow_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2) (n + 2)]
            })
          <;>
          (try
            {
              norm_num [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, pow_succ] at *
              <;>
              ring_nf at *
              <;>
              norm_num at *
              <;>
              nlinarith [pow_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2) n, pow_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2) (n + 1), pow_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2) (n + 2)]
            })
  exact h₁ n hn

theorem induction_pord1p1on2powklt5on2 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) :
    ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / 2 ^ k) < 5 / 2 := by
  exact h_main n h₀

name: numbertheory_2pownm1prime_nprime
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  n_ge_two (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) (h₁ : Nat.Prime (2 ^ n - 1)) : n ≥ 2 := by
  by_contra h
  have h₂ : n = 1 := by
    omega
  rw [h₂] at h₁
  norm_num at h₁ ⊢
  <;> contradiction


lemma exists_dvd_of_not_prime
    (n : ℕ) (h₀ : n ≥ 2) (hnp : ¬ Nat.Prime n) :
    ∃ d, d ∣ n ∧ 1 < d ∧ d < n := by
  have h₂ := Nat.exists_dvd_of_not_prime2 (by omega) hnp
  rcases h₂ with ⟨d, hd₁, hd₂⟩
  refine ⟨d, hd₁, ?_, ?_⟩
  · 
    have h₃ : 1 < d := by
      by_contra h₄
      have h₅ : d ≤ 1 := by omega
      have h₆ : d ≥ 2 := by
        by_contra h₇
        have h₈ : d = 0 ∨ d = 1 := by omega
        cases h₈ with
        | inl h₈ =>
          simp_all [Nat.dvd_iff_mod_eq_zero, Nat.pow_mod]
          <;> omega
        | inr h₈ =>
          simp_all [Nat.dvd_iff_mod_eq_zero, Nat.pow_mod]
          <;> omega
      omega
    exact h₃
  · 
    have h₃ : d < n := by
      by_contra h₄
      have h₅ : d ≥ n := by omega
      have h₆ : d ∣ n := hd₁
      have h₇ : d ≤ n := Nat.le_of_dvd (by omega) h₆
      have h₈ : d = n := by omega
      rw [h₈] at hd₂
      <;> norm_num at hd₂ ⊢
      <;> try omega
      <;> try contradiction
    exact h₃


lemma pow_dvd_of_dvd
    (n d : ℕ) (hd : d ∣ n) :
    (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ (2 ^ n - 1) := by
  obtain ⟨k, rfl⟩ := hd
  have h₂ : (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ (2 ^ (d * k) - 1) := by
    have h₃ : (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ (2 ^ (d * k) - 1) := by
      have h₄ : (2 ^ (d * k) - 1) = (2 ^ d) ^ k - 1 := by
        rw [← pow_mul]
        <;> ring_nf
      rw [h₄]
      have h₅ : (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ ((2 ^ d) ^ k - 1) := by
        have h₆ : ∀ k : ℕ, (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ ((2 ^ d) ^ k - 1) := by
          intro k
          have h₇ : (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ ((2 ^ d) ^ k - 1) := by
            simpa [one_pow] using nat_sub_dvd_pow_sub_pow _ 1 k
          exact h₇
        exact h₆ k
      exact h₅
    exact h₃
  simpa [mul_comm] using h₂


lemma two_pow_d_sub_one_pos_and_lt
    (d n : ℕ) (h₁ : 1 < d) (h₂ : d < n) :
    1 < (2 ^ d - 1) ∧ (2 ^ d - 1) < (2 ^ n - 1) := by
  have h3 : 1 < 2 ^ d - 1 := by
    have h4 : 2 ^ d ≥ 2 ^ 2 := by
      apply Nat.pow_le_pow_of_le_right
      · norm_num
      · omega
    have h5 : 2 ^ d - 1 ≥ 3 := by
      have h6 : 2 ^ d ≥ 4 := by
        omega
      omega
    omega
  have h4 : 2 ^ d - 1 < 2 ^ n - 1 := by
    have h5 : 2 ^ d < 2 ^ n := by
      apply Nat.pow_lt_pow_of_lt_right
      · norm_num
      · omega
    have h6 : 2 ^ d - 1 < 2 ^ n - 1 := by
      have h7 : 2 ^ d ≥ 2 := by
        have h8 : d ≥ 1 := by omega
        have h9 : 2 ^ d ≥ 2 ^ 1 := by
          apply Nat.pow_le_pow_of_le_right
          · norm_num
          · omega
        omega
      have h8 : 2 ^ n ≥ 2 ^ 1 := by
        have h9 : n ≥ 1 := by omega
        have h10 : 2 ^ n ≥ 2 ^ 1 := by
          apply Nat.pow_le_pow_of_le_right
          · norm_num
          · omega
        omega
      omega
    exact h6
  exact ⟨h3, h4⟩


lemma contradiction_from_d
    (n d : ℕ) (hd : d ∣ n) (h₁ : 1 < d) (h₂ : d < n)
    (hnp : ¬ Nat.Prime n) (h₀ : 0 < n) (h₁prime : Nat.Prime (2 ^ n - 1)) :
    False := by
  have h₃ : (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ (2 ^ n - 1) := pow_dvd_of_dvd n d hd
  have h₄ : 1 < (2 ^ d - 1) ∧ (2 ^ d - 1) < (2 ^ n - 1) :=
    two_pow_d_sub_one_pos_and_lt d n h₁ h₂
  have h₅ : ¬ Nat.Prime (2 ^ n - 1) := by
    have h₆ : (2 ^ d - 1) ∣ (2 ^ n - 1) := h₃
    have h₇ : 1 < (2 ^ d - 1) := h₄.1
    have h₈ : (2 ^ d - 1) < (2 ^ n - 1) := h₄.2
    have h₉ : (2 ^ d - 1) ≠ 1 := by
      omega
    have h₁₀ : (2 ^ d - 1) ≠ (2 ^ n - 1) := by
      omega
    have h₁₁ : ¬ Nat.Prime (2 ^ n - 1) := by
      intro hprime
      have h₁₂ := Nat.Prime.eq_one_or_self_of_dvd hprime (2 ^ d - 1) h₆
      cases h₁₂ with
      | inl h₁₂ =>
        omega
      | inr h₁₂ =>
        omega
    exact h₁₁
  exact h₅ h₁prime

theorem numbertheory_2pownm1prime_nprime (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) (h₁ : Nat.Prime (2 ^ n - 1)) : Nat.Prime n := by
  by_contra hnp
  have h₂ : n ≥ 2 := n_ge_two n h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : ∃ d, d ∣ n ∧ 1 < d ∧ d < n := exists_dvd_of_not_prime n h₂ hnp
  rcases h₃ with ⟨d, hd, h₁d, h₂d⟩
  have h₄ : False := contradiction_from_d n d hd h₁d h₂d hnp h₀ h₁
  exact h₄

name: amc12a_2013_p4
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  numerator_eq :
    (2 : ℝ) ^ 2014 + (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 = (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 * 5 := by
  norm_num [pow_add, pow_mul, pow_one, pow_two, pow_three] <;>
    ring_nf at * <;>
    norm_num at * <;>
    linarith

lemma denominator_eq :
    (2 : ℝ) ^ 2014 - (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 = (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 * 3 := by
  norm_num [pow_add, pow_mul, pow_one, pow_two, pow_three] <;>
    ring_nf at * <;>
    norm_num at * <;>
    linarith

lemma fraction_eq :
    ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2014 + (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012) / ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2014 - (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012) = (5 : ℝ) / 3 := by
  have h₁ : (2 : ℝ) ^ 2014 + (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 = (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 * 5 := by
    exact numerator_eq
  have h₂ : (2 : ℝ) ^ 2014 - (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 = (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 * 3 := by
    exact denominator_eq
  rw [h₁, h₂]
  have h₃ : (2 : ℝ) ^ 2012 ≠ 0 := by
    norm_num
  field_simp [h₃] <;> ring_nf <;> norm_num

theorem amc12a_2013_p4 : (2 ^ 2014 + 2 ^ 2012) / (2 ^ 2014 - 2 ^ 2012) = (5 : ℝ) / 3 := by
  exact fraction_eq

name: mathd_algebra_392

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  n_eq_64 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : Even n)
    (h₁ : (↑n - 2) ^ 2 + ↑n ^ 2 + (↑n + 2) ^ 2 = (12296 : ℤ)) :
    n = 64 := by
  have h₂ : n = 64 := by
    have h₃ : (n : ℤ) ≥ 0 := by exact_mod_cast Nat.zero_le n
    have h₄ : (n : ℤ) ^ 2 = 4096 := by
      have h₅ : (↑n - 2 : ℤ) ^ 2 + (↑n : ℤ) ^ 2 + (↑n + 2 : ℤ) ^ 2 = 12296 := by
        exact_mod_cast h₁
      ring_nf at h₅ ⊢
      nlinarith [sq_nonneg ((n : ℤ) - 64), sq_nonneg ((n : ℤ) + 64)]
    have h₅ : n ≤ 64 := by
      by_contra h₅
      have h₆ : n ≥ 65 := by omega
      have h₇ : (n : ℤ) ≥ 65 := by exact_mod_cast h₆
      have h₈ : (n : ℤ) ^ 2 ≥ 65 ^ 2 := by nlinarith
      have h₉ : (n : ℤ) ^ 2 > 4096 := by nlinarith
      nlinarith
    interval_cases n <;> norm_num at h₄ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        norm_num [Int.emod_eq_of_lt] at h₄ ⊢ <;>
        omega
      }) <;>
      (try {
        simp_all [Int.emod_eq_of_lt] <;>
        norm_num at * <;>
        omega
      })
  exact_mod_cast h₂

lemma product_div_eq_32736 (n : ℕ) (h₂ : n = 64) :
    (↑n - 2) * ↑n * (↑n + 2) / 8 = (32736 : ℤ) := by
  rw [h₂]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at *
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

theorem mathd_algebra_392 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : Even n)
    (h₁ : (↑n - 2) ^ 2 + ↑n ^ 2 + (↑n + 2) ^ 2 = (12296 : ℤ)) :
    (↑n - 2) * ↑n * (↑n + 2) / 8 = (32736 : ℤ) := by
  have h₂ : n = 64 := n_eq_64 n h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : (↑n - 2) * ↑n * (↑n + 2) / 8 = (32736 : ℤ) :=
    product_div_eq_32736 n h₂
  exact_mod_cast h₃

name: mathd_numbertheory_314
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  r_eq_three (r : ℕ) (h₀ : r = 1342 % 13) : r = 3 := by
  rw [h₀]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

lemma k_exists (n : ℕ) (h₁ : 0 < n) (h₂ : 1342 ∣ n) :
    ∃ k : ℕ, n = 1342 * k ∧ 0 < k := by
  obtain ⟨k, hk⟩ := h₂
  have hk_pos : 0 < k := by
    by_contra h
    have hk_eq : k = 0 := by
      omega
    rw [hk_eq] at hk
    have : n = 0 := by
      simpa [mul_zero] using hk
    linarith
  exact ⟨k, by linarith, hk_pos⟩

lemma k_ge_five (n r : ℕ) (h₀ : r = 1342 % 13)
    (h₁ : 0 < n) (h₂ : 1342 ∣ n) (h₃ : n % 13 < r)
    (h₄ : r = 3) :
    ∃ k : ℕ, n = 1342 * k ∧ 5 ≤ k := by
  obtain ⟨k, hk_eq, hk_pos⟩ := k_exists n h₁ h₂
  have h₆ : 5 ≤ k := by
    by_contra h₆
    have h₇ : k ≤ 4 := by
      omega
    have h₈ : k ≥ 1 := by
      by_contra h₈
      have h₉ : k = 0 := by
        omega
      have h₁₀ : n = 0 := by
        simp [hk_eq, h₉] at *
      linarith
    interval_cases k <;> norm_num [hk_eq, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mod_mod] at h₃ h₄ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        simp_all [Nat.mod_eq_of_lt] <;> (try omega) <;> (try contradiction)
      }) <;>
      (try {
        ring_nf at *
        <;> omega
      })
  exact ⟨k, hk_eq, h₆⟩

lemma n_ge_6710 (n : ℕ) (h₂ : 1342 ∣ n) (h₄ : ∃ k : ℕ, n = 1342 * k ∧ 5 ≤ k) :
    6710 ≤ n := by
  obtain ⟨k, hk_eq, hk_ge⟩ := h₄
  have h₅ : 1342 * 5 ≤ n := by
    have h₅₁ : 5 ≤ k := hk_ge
    have h₅₂ : 1342 * 5 ≤ 1342 * k := by
      exact Nat.mul_le_mul_left 1342 h₅₁
    linarith
  linarith

theorem mathd_numbertheory_314 (r n : ℕ) (h₀ : r = 1342 % 13) (h₁ : 0 < n) (h₂ : 1342 ∣ n)
    (h₃ : n % 13 < r) : 6710 ≤ n := by
  have h₄ : r = 3 := r_eq_three r h₀
  have h₅ : ∃ k : ℕ, n = 1342 * k ∧ 5 ≤ k :=
    k_ge_five n r h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄
  exact n_ge_6710 n h₂ h₅

name: induction_prod1p1onk3le3m1onn
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  base_case_one :
    ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 (1 : ℕ), (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3) ≤ (3 : ℝ) - 1 / (1 : ℝ) := by
  norm_num [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top]
  <;>
  norm_num
  <;>
  linarith

lemma inductive_step (n : ℕ) (hn : 0 < n)
    (ih :
        ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3) ≤ (3 : ℝ) - 1 / (n : ℝ)) :
    ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 (n + 1), (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3) ≤ (3 : ℝ) - 1 / ((n + 1 : ℕ) : ℝ) := by
  have h₁ : ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 (n + 1), (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3) =
      (∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3)) * (1 + (1 : ℝ) / (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 3) := by
    rw [Finset.prod_Icc_succ_top (by omega : (1 : ℕ) ≤ n + 1)]
    <;>
    simp [Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, add_comm]
    <;>
    ring_nf
  rw [h₁]
  have h₂ : (∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3)) ≤ (3 : ℝ) - 1 / (n : ℝ) := ih
  have h₃ : 0 < (n : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast hn
  have h₄ : 0 < (n + 1 : ℝ) := by positivity
  have h₅ : 0 < (n : ℝ) * (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 3 := by positivity
  have h₆ :
      (3 - 1 / (n : ℝ)) * (1 + 1 / (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 3) ≤ 3 - 1 / ((n + 1 : ℕ) : ℝ) := by
    have h₇ : (n : ℝ) ≥ 1 := by
      exact_mod_cast (Nat.succ_le_iff.mpr hn)
    field_simp
    rw [div_le_div_iff (by positivity) (by positivity)]
    ring_nf
    nlinarith
      [sq_nonneg (n : ℝ), sq_nonneg ((n : ℝ) - 1),
        sq_nonneg ((n : ℝ) ^ 2 - 1), sq_nonneg ((n : ℝ) ^ 2 - (n : ℝ)),
        sq_nonneg ((n : ℝ) ^ 2 - 2 * (n : ℝ) + 1)]
  have h₇ :
      (∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3)) * (1 + (1 : ℝ) / (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 3) ≤
        (3 - 1 / (n : ℝ)) * (1 + 1 / (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 3) := by
    gcongr
    <;>
    try norm_num
    <;>
    try linarith
  have h₈ :
      (3 - 1 / (n : ℝ)) * (1 + 1 / (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 3) ≤ 3 - 1 / ((n + 1 : ℕ) : ℝ) := by
    exact h₆
  linarith

theorem induction_prod1p1onk3le3m1onn (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) :
    ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3) ≤ (3 : ℝ) - 1 / ↑n := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n : ℕ, 0 < n →
      ∏ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 + (1 : ℝ) / k ^ 3) ≤ (3 : ℝ) - 1 / (n : ℝ) := by
    intro n hn
    induction' hn with n hn IH
    ·
      simpa using base_case_one
    ·
      exact inductive_step n hn IH
  exact h₁ n h₀

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_eq_5 (a : ℝ) (h₀ : (2 : ℝ) ^ a = 32) : a = 5 := by
  have h₂ : a = 5 := by
    have h₃ : Real.log ((2 : ℝ) ^ a) = Real.log 32 := by
      rw [h₀]
    have h₄ : a * Real.log 2 = Real.log 32 := by
      have h₅ : Real.log ((2 : ℝ) ^ a) = a * Real.log 2 := by
        rw [Real.log_rpow (by norm_num : (2 : ℝ) > 0)]
      rw [h₅] at h₃
      exact h₃
    have h₆ : Real.log 32 = 5 * Real.log 2 := by
      have h₇ : Real.log 32 = Real.log (2 ^ 5) := by norm_num
      rw [h₇]
      have h₈ : Real.log (2 ^ 5) = 5 * Real.log 2 := by
        rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
      rw [h₈]
    rw [h₆] at h₄
    have h₇ : a * Real.log 2 = 5 * Real.log 2 := by linarith
    have h₈ : Real.log 2 ≠ 0 := by
      norm_num [Real.log_eq_zero]
    have h₉ : a = 5 := by
      apply mul_left_cancel₀ h₈
      linarith
    exact h₉
  exact h₂

lemma b_eq_3 (a b : ℝ) (ha : a = 5) (h₁ : a ^ b = 125) : b = 3 := by
  have h₃ : b = 3 := by
    have h₄ : (5 : ℝ) ^ b = 125 := by
      rw [ha] at h₁
      exact h₁
    have h₅ : Real.log ((5 : ℝ) ^ b) = Real.log 125 := by
      rw [h₄]
    have h₆ : b * Real.log 5 = Real.log 125 := by
      have h₇ : Real.log ((5 : ℝ) ^ b) = b * Real.log 5 := by
        rw [Real.log_rpow (by norm_num : (5 : ℝ) > 0)]
      rw [h₇] at h₅
      exact h₅
    have h₇ : Real.log 125 = 3 * Real.log 5 := by
      have h₈ : Real.log 125 = Real.log (5 ^ 3) := by norm_num
      rw [h₈]
      have h₉ : Real.log (5 ^ 3) = 3 * Real.log 5 := by
        rw [Real.log_pow] <;> norm_num
      rw [h₉]
    rw [h₇] at h₆
    have h₈ : b * Real.log 5 = 3 * Real.log 5 := by linarith
    have h₉ : Real.log 5 ≠ 0 := by
      norm_num [Real.log_eq_zero] <;>
      (try norm_num) <;>
      (try linarith [Real.log_pos (by norm_num : (1 : ℝ) < 5)])
    have h₁₀ : b = 3 := by
      apply mul_left_cancel₀ h₉
      linarith
    exact h₁₀
  exact h₃

lemma b_pow_a_eq_243 (a b : ℝ) (ha : a = 5) (hb : b = 3) : b ^ a = 243 := by
  rw [hb, ha]
  norm_num

theorem mathd_algebra_756 (a b : ℝ) (h₀ : (2 : ℝ) ^ a = 32) (h₁ : a ^ b = 125) : b ^ a = 243 := by
  have ha : a = 5 := a_eq_5 a h₀
  have hb : b = 3 := b_eq_3 a b ha h₁
  have h₃ : b ^ a = 243 := b_pow_a_eq_243 a b ha hb
  exact h₃

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_eq_4 (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c)
    (h₁ : b = a + 1) (h₂ : c = b + 1)
    (h₃ : a * b * c = 8 * (a + b + c)) : a = 4 := by
  have h₄ : a = 4 := by
    have h₅ : a ≤ 6 := by
      by_contra! h₅
      have h₆ : a ≥ 7 := by linarith
      have h₇ : b = a + 1 := h₁
      have h₈ : c = b + 1 := h₂
      have h₉ : a * b * c = 8 * (a + b + c) := h₃
      have h₁₀ : b ≥ 8 := by
        have h₁₁ : a ≥ 7 := h₆
        have h₁₂ : b = a + 1 := h₁
        linarith
      have h₁₁ : c ≥ 9 := by
        have h₁₂ : b ≥ 8 := h₁₀
        have h₁₃ : c = b + 1 := h₂
        linarith
      have h₁₂ : a * b * c ≥ a * b * 9 := by
        have h₁₃ : c ≥ 9 := h₁₁
        have h₁₄ : a * b ≥ 0 := by nlinarith
        nlinarith
      have h₁₃ : 8 * (a + b + c) ≤ 8 * (a + b + c) := by linarith
      have h₁₄ : a * b * c > 8 * (a + b + c) := by
        have h₁₅ : a ≥ 7 := h₆
        have h₁₆ : b ≥ 8 := h₁₀
        have h₁₇ : c ≥ 9 := h₁₁
        have h₁₈ : a * b ≥ 56 := by nlinarith
        have h₁₉ : a * b * c ≥ 56 * 9 := by nlinarith
        have h₂₀ : 8 * (a + b + c) ≤ 8 * (a + b + c) := by linarith
        nlinarith
      nlinarith
    interval_cases a <;> norm_num [h₁, h₂] at h₃ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try
        {
          ring_nf at h₃
          omega
        })
  exact h₄

lemma sum_of_squares_eq_77 (a b c : ℕ)
    (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c)
    (h₁ : b = a + 1) (h₂ : c = b + 1)
    (h₃ : a * b * c = 8 * (a + b + c))
    (h_a : a = 4) : a ^ 2 + (b ^ 2 + c ^ 2) = 77 := by
  have h₄ : b = 5 := by
    rw [h₁, h_a]
    <;> norm_num
  have h₅ : c = 6 := by
    rw [h₂, h₄]
    <;> norm_num
  rw [h_a, h₄, h₅]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at h₃ ⊢ <;> omega

theorem amc12b_2002_p7 (a b c : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c) (h₁ : b = a + 1) (h₂ : c = b + 1)
    (h₃ : a * b * c = 8 * (a + b + c)) : a ^ 2 + (b ^ 2 + c ^ 2) = 77 := by
  have h_a : a = 4 := a_eq_4 a b c h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  exact sum_of_squares_eq_77 a b c h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h_a

import Mathlib

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_le_12 (a m c : ℕ) (h₀ : a + m + c = 12) : a ≤ 12 := by
  omega

lemma m_le_12 (a m c : ℕ) (h₀ : a + m + c = 12) : m ≤ 12 := by
  omega

lemma c_le_12 (a m c : ℕ) (h₀ : a + m + c = 12) : c ≤ 12 := by
  omega


lemma main_inequality (a m c : ℕ) (h₀ : a + m + c = 12)
    (ha : a ≤ 12) (hm : m ≤ 12) (hc : c ≤ 12) :
    a * m * c + a * m + m * c + a * c ≤ 112 := by
  interval_cases a <;> interval_cases m <;>
    interval_cases c <;> 
      try { norm_num at h₀ ⊢ } <;> 
      try { omega } <;> 
      try { nlinarith }

theorem amc12_2000_p12 (a m c : ℕ) (h₀ : a + m + c = 12) :
    a * m * c + a * m + m * c + a * c ≤ 112 := by
  have ha : a ≤ 12 := a_le_12 a m c h₀
  have hm : m ≤ 12 := m_le_12 a m c h₀
  have hc : c ≤ 12 := c_le_12 a m c h₀
  exact main_inequality a m c h₀ ha hm hc

lemma digits_of_n (n : ℕ) (h₀ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10) :
    Nat.digits 10 n = [2, 1, 2, 9, 9, 1, 9, 2, 1] := by
  have h₁ : n = 129199212 := n_numeric n h₀
  rw [h₁]
  <;> norm_num [Nat.digits_len] <;> rfl

lemma A_eq_1 (n A B C : ℕ)
    (h₆ : Nat.digits 10 n = [B, A, B, C, C, A, C, B, A])
    (h₀ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10) :
    A = 1 := by
  have h₇ : Nat.digits 10 n = [2, 1, 2, 9, 9, 1, 9, 2, 1] := by
    have h₈ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10 := h₀
    rw [h₈]
    <;> norm_num [Nat.digits_len] <;> rfl
  have h₈ := h₆
  rw [h₇] at h₈
  have h₉ := h₈
  simp [List.cons] at h₉
  <;> norm_num at h₉ ⊢
  <;> (try omega)
  <;> (try
        {
          simp_all [List.cons, List.mem_cons, List.mem_singleton]
          <;> norm_num at *
          <;> (try omega)
          <;> (try aesop)
        })
  <;> (try
        {
          cases A <;> cases B <;> cases C <;>
            norm_num [List.cons] at h₉ ⊢ <;>

lemma B_eq_2 (n A B C : ℕ)
    (h₆ : Nat.digits 10 n = [B, A, B, C, C, A, C, B, A])
    (h₀ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10) :
    B = 2 := by
  have h₇ : Nat.digits 10 n = [2, 1, 2, 9, 9, 1, 9, 2, 1] := by
    have h₈ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10 := h₀
    rw [h₈]
    <;> norm_num [Nat.digits_len] <;> rfl

        })
  <;> (try
        {
          cases A <;> cases B <;> cases C <;>
            norm_num [List.cons] at h₉ ⊢ <;>
            (try omega)
        })

lemma C_eq_9 (n A B C : ℕ)
    (h₆ : Nat.digits 10 n = [B, A, B, C, C, A, C, B, A])
    (h₀ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10) :
    C = 9 := by
  have h₇ : Nat.digits 10 n = [2, 1, 2, 9, 9, 1, 9, 2, 1] := by
    have h₈ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10 := h₀
    rw [h₈]
    <;> norm_num [Nat.digits_len] <;> rfl
  have h₈ := h₆
  rw [h₇] at h₈
  have h₉ := h₈
  simp [List.cons] at h₉

        {
          simp_all [List.cons, List.mem_cons, List.mem_singleton]

          cases A <;> cases B <;> cases C <;>

lemma target_eq_129 (A B C : ℕ) (hA : A = 1) (hB : B = 2) (hC : C = 9) :
    100 * A + 10 * B + C = 129 := by
  simpa [hA, hB, hC] using
    (by norm_num : (100 * (1 : ℕ) + 10 * 2 + 9) = 129)

theorem mathd_numbertheory_135 (n A B C : ℕ) (h₀ : n = 3 ^ 17 + 3 ^ 10) (h₁ : 11 ∣ n + 1)
    (h₂ : [A, B, C].Pairwise (· ≠ ·)) (h₃ : {A, B, C} ⊂ Finset.Icc 0 9) (h₄ : Odd A ∧ Odd C)
    (h₅ : ¬3 ∣ B) (h₆ : Nat.digits 10 n = [B, A, B, C, C, A, C, B, A]) :
    100 * A + 10 * B + C = 129 := by
  have h₆' : Nat.digits 10 n = [B, A, B, C, C, A, C, B, A] := h₆
  have hA : A = 1 := A_eq_1 n A B C h₆' h₀
  have hB : B = 2 := B_eq_2 n A B C h₆' h₀
  have hC : C = 9 := C_eq_9 n A B C h₆' h₀
  exact target_eq_129 A B C hA hB hC

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  pow_mul_eq (x : ℝ) :
    ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (6 * x + 2) =
      (((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (3 * x - 3)) ^ 2 *
        ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (8 : ℝ) := by
  have h₁ :
      ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (6 * x + 2) =
        ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3) + 8) := by
    have h₂ : (6 : ℝ) * x + 2 = 2 * (3 * x - 3) + 8 := by ring
    rw [h₂]
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
  rw [h₁]
  have h₃ :
      ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3) + 8) =
        (((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (3 * x - 3)) ^ 2 *
          ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (8 : ℝ) := by
    have h₄ :
        ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3) + 8) =
          ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3)) *
            ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (8 : ℝ) := by
      rw [Real.rpow_add (by positivity)]
      <;>
      ring_nf
      <;>
      norm_num
    rw [h₄]
    have h₅ :
        ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3)) =
          (((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (3 * x - 3)) ^ 2 := by
      have h₅₁ :
          ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3)) =
            ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (2 * (3 * x - 3)) := rfl
      rw [show (2 : ℝ) * (3 * x - 3) = (3 * x - 3) + (3 * x - 3) by ring]
      rw [Real.rpow_add (by positivity)]
      <;>
      ring_nf
      <;>
      simp [Real.rpow_mul, Real.rpow_add] <;>
      ring_nf <;>
      norm_num <;>
      linarith
    rw [h₅]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    linarith
  rw [h₃]
  <;>
  ring_nf
  <;>
  norm_num


lemma pow8_eq : ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (8 : ℝ) = 121 := by
  have h₂ : ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (8 : ℝ) = 121 := by
    have h₃ :
        ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (8 : ℝ) = (11 : ℝ) ^ (8 * (1 / 4 : ℝ)) := by
      rw [← Real.rpow_mul (by positivity)]
      <;>
      norm_num
      <;>
      ring_nf
      <;>
      norm_num
    rw [h₃]
    have h₄ : (8 : ℝ) * (1 / 4 : ℝ) = (2 : ℝ) := by norm_num
    rw [h₄]
    have h₅ : (11 : ℝ) ^ (2 : ℝ) = 121 := by
      norm_num [Real.rpow_two]
    rw [h₅]
    <;>
    norm_num
  
  rw [h₂]
  <;>
  norm_num


lemma main_eq (x : ℝ)
    (h : ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (3 * x - 3) = 1 / 5) :
    ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (6 * x + 2) = 121 / 25 := by
  have h₁ := pow_mul_eq (x := x)
  rw [h₁]
  have h₂ := pow8_eq
  rw [h₂]
  have h₃ : (((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (3 * x - 3)) = 1 / 5 := h
  rw [h₃]
  <;>
  norm_num
  <;>
  ring_nf at *
  <;>
  norm_num at *
  <;>
  nlinarith

theorem mathd_algebra_275 (x : ℝ) (h : ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (3 * x - 3) = 1 / 5) :
    ((11 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4 : ℝ)) ^ (6 * x + 2) = 121 / 25 := by
  exact main_eq (x := x) h

  exact combined_eq x y z h₀ h₁

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a0_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : a 0 ^ 3 = 1) : a 0 = 1 := by
  have h₁ : a 0 = 1 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 0), pow_two_nonneg (a 0 - 1)]
  exact h₁

lemma a1_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₁ : a 1 ^ 3 = 8) : a 1 = 2 := by
  have h₂ : a 1 = 2 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 1), pow_two_nonneg (a 1 - 2)]
  exact h₂

lemma a2_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₂ : a 2 ^ 3 = 27) : a 2 = 3 := by
  have h₃ : a 2 = 3 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 2), pow_two_nonneg (a 2 - 3)]
  exact h₃

lemma a3_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₃ : a 3 ^ 3 = 64) : a 3 = 4 := by
  have h₄ : a 3 = 4 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 3), pow_two_nonneg (a 3 - 4)]
  exact h₄

lemma a4_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₄ : a 4 ^ 3 = 125) : a 4 = 5 := by
  have h₅ : a 4 = 5 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 4), pow_two_nonneg (a 4 - 5)]
  exact h₅

lemma a5_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₅ : a 5 ^ 3 = 216) : a 5 = 6 := by
  have h₆ : a 5 = 6 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 5), pow_two_nonneg (a 5 - 6)]
  exact h₆

lemma a6_eq (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₆ : a 6 ^ 3 = 343) : a 6 = 7 := by
  have h₇ : a 6 = 7 := by
    nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (a 6), pow_two_nonneg (a 6 - 7)]
  exact h₇


lemma sum6_expr (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h0 : a 0 = 1) (h1 : a 1 = 2) (h2 : a 2 = 3)
    (h3 : a 3 = 4) (h4 : a 4 = 5) (h5 : a 5 = 6) (h6 : a 6 = 7) :
    ∑ k in Finset.range 7, 6 * ((a k) ^ 2 : ℤ) = 840 := by
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, h0, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6] <;> norm_num

lemma sum5_expr (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h0 : a 0 = 1) (h1 : a 1 = 2) (h2 : a 2 = 3)
    (h3 : a 3 = 4) (h4 : a 4 = 5) (h5 : a 5 = 6) :
    ∑ k in Finset.range 6, (a k) ^ 2 = 91 := by
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, h0, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5] <;> norm_num

theorem amc12a_2020_p7 (a : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : a 0 ^ 3 = 1) (h₁ : a 1 ^ 3 = 8) (h₂ : a 2 ^ 3 = 27)
    (h₃ : a 3 ^ 3 = 64) (h₄ : a 4 ^ 3 = 125) (h₅ : a 5 ^ 3 = 216) (h₆ : a 6 ^ 3 = 343) :
    ∑ k in Finset.range 7, 6 * ((a k) ^ 2 : ℤ) - 2 * ∑ k in Finset.range 6, (a k) ^ 2 = 658 := by
  have h0 : a 0 = 1 := a0_eq a h₀
  have h1 : a 1 = 2 := a1_eq a h₁
  have h2 : a 2 = 3 := a2_eq a h₂
  have h3 : a 3 = 4 := a3_eq a h₃
  have h4 : a 4 = 5 := a4_eq a h₄
  have h5 : a 5 = 6 := a5_eq a h₅
  have h6 : a 6 = 7 := a6_eq a h₆
  have h_sum6 : ∑ k in Finset.range 7, 6 * ((a k) ^ 2 : ℤ) = 840 :=
    sum6_expr a h0 h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6
  have h_sum5 : ∑ k in Finset.range 6, (a k) ^ 2 = 91 :=
    sum5_expr a h0 h1 h2 h3 h4 h5
  have : ∑ k in Finset.range 7, 6 * ((a k) ^ 2 : ℤ) -
          2 * ∑ k in Finset.range 6, (a k) ^ 2 = 658 := by
    rw [h_sum6, h_sum5]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> norm_num
  exact this

name: imo_1981_p6
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  f_one (f : ℕ → ℕ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ y, f 0 y = y + 1)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, f (x + 1) 0 = f x 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ x y, f (x + 1) (y + 1) = f x (f (x + 1) y)) :
    ∀ y, f 1 y = y + 2 := by
  intro y
  have h₃ : ∀ y, f 1 y = y + 2 := by
    intro y
    induction y with
    | zero =>
        have h₄ := h₁ 0
        have h₅ := h₀ 1
        simp at h₄ h₅ ⊢
        <;> omega
    | succ y ih =>
        have h₄ := h₂ 0 y
        have h₅ := h₂ 0 (y + 1)
        simp [h₀, ih] at h₄ h₅ ⊢
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> omega
  exact h₃ y

lemma f_two (f : ℕ → ℕ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ y, f 0 y = y + 1)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, f (x + 1) 0 = f x 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ x y, f (x + 1) (y + 1) = f x (f (x + 1) y))
    (h₃ : ∀ y, f 1 y = y + 2) :
    ∀ y, f 2 y = 2 * y + 3 := by
  intro y
  have h₄ : ∀ y, f 2 y = 2 * y + 3 := by
    intro y
    induction y with
    | zero =>
        have h₅ := h₁ 1
        have h₆ := h₃ 1
        simp at h₅ h₆ ⊢
        <;> omega
    | succ y ih =>
        have h₅ := h₂ 1 y
        have h₆ := h₂ 1 (y + 1)
        simp [h₃, ih] at h₅ h₆ ⊢
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> omega
  exact h₄ y

lemma f_three (f : ℕ → ℕ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ y, f 0 y = y + 1)
    (h₁ : ∀ x, f (x + 1) 0 = f x 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ x y, f (x + 1) (y + 1) = f x (f (x + 1) y))
    (h₃ : ∀ y, f 1 y = y + 2)
    (h₄ : ∀ y, f 2 y = 2 * y + 3) :
    ∀ y, f 3 y = 2 ^ (y + 3) - 3 := by
  intro y
  have h₅ : ∀ y, f 3 y = 2 ^ (y + 3) - 3 := by
    intro y
    induction y with
    | zero =>
        have h₆ := h₁ 2
        have h₇ := h₄ 1
        simp at h₆ h₇ ⊢
        <;> omega
    | succ y ih =>
        have h₆ := h₂ 2 y
        have h₇ := h₂ 2 (y + 1)
        simp [h₄, ih] at h₆ h₇ ⊢
        <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try
            {
              induction y with
              | zero => omega
              | succ y ih' =>
                  simp_all [pow_succ, pow_zero, pow_one, Nat.mul_add, Nat.add_mul] <;>
                  ring_nf at * <;> omega
            }) <;>
          (try
            {
              simp_all [pow_succ, pow_zero, pow_one, Nat.mul_add, Nat.add_mul] <;>
              ring_nf at * <;> omega
            })
  exact h₅ y

theorem imo_1981_p6 (f : ℕ → ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : ∀ y, f 0 y = y + 1) (h₁ : ∀ x, f (x + 1) 0 = f x 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ x y, f (x + 1) (y + 1) = f x (f (x + 1) y)) : ∀ y, f 4 (y + 1) = 2 ^ (f 4 y + 3) - 3 := by
  have h₃ := f_one (f:=f) h₀ h₁ h₂
  have h₄ := f_two (f:=f) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  have h₅ := f_three (f:=f) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄
  intro y
  have h₆ : f 4 (y + 1) = f 3 (f 4 y) := by
    have h₇ := h₂ 3 y
    simp at h₇ ⊢
    <;> ring_nf at * <;> omega
  have h₇ : f 3 (f 4 y) = 2 ^ (f 4 y + 3) - 3 := by
    have h₈ := h₅ (f 4 y)
    exact h₈
  rw [h₆, h₇]
  <;>
    (try omega) <;>
    (try
      {
        simp_all [h₀, h₁, h₂, pow_succ] <;>
        ring_nf at * <;> omega
      })

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  eq_49 (y : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 ≤ 19 + 3 * y) (h₁ : Real.sqrt (19 + 3 * y) = 7) :
    19 + 3 * y = 49 := by
  have h₂ : (Real.sqrt (19 + 3 * y)) ^ 2 = 19 + 3 * y := by
    rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> linarith
  have h₃ : (Real.sqrt (19 + 3 * y)) ^ 2 = 49 := by
    rw [h₁]
    norm_num
  linarith

theorem mathd_algebra_263 (y : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 ≤ 19 + 3 * y) (h₁ : Real.sqrt (19 + 3 * y) = 7) :
    y = 10 := by
  have h₂ : 19 + 3 * y = 49 := eq_49 y h₀ h₁
  have h₃ : y = 10 := by
    linarith
  exact h₃

  have h₂ : x ≤ 99 := by
    omega
  interval_cases x <;> norm_num at h₁ ⊢ <;> try contradiction <;> try omega

theorem mathd_numbertheory_34 (x : ℕ) (h₀ : x < 100) (h₁ : x * 9 % 100 = 1) : x = 89 := by

import Mathlib

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

lemma  mathd_numbertheory_764 (p : ℕ) (h₀ : Nat.Prime p) (h₁ : 7 ≤ p) :
    (∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 (p - 2), (k : ZMod p)⁻¹ * ((k : ZMod p) + 1)⁻¹) = 2 := by
  have h₂ : p ≥ 7 := by
    exact h₁
  
  have h₃ : p ≥ 2 := by
    linarith [h₀.two_le]
  
  have h₄ : (p : ℕ) - 2 ≥ 1 := by
    have h₅ : p ≥ 7 := h₁
    have h₆ : (p : ℕ) - 2 ≥ 1 := by
      omega
    exact h₆
  
  have h₅ : (p : ℕ) - 1 ≥ 2 := by
    have h₅₁ : p ≥ 7 := h₁
    omega
  
  have h₆ : (p : ℕ) ≥ 3 := by
    omega
  
  have h₇ : (2 : ℕ) ≤ p := by
    omega
  
  have h_main :
      (∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 (p - 2), (k : ZMod p)⁻¹ * ((k : ZMod p) + 1)⁻¹ : ZMod p) = 2 := by
    have h₈ : p ≥ 7 := h₁
    have h₉ : p ≥ 2 := h₃
    have h₁₀ : (p : ℕ) - 2 ≥ 1 := h₄
    have h₁₁ : (p : ℕ) - 1 ≥ 2 := h₅
    have h₁₂ : (p : ℕ) ≥ 3 := h₆
    have h₁₃ : (2 : ℕ) ≤ p := h₇
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    have h₁₄ : (p : ℕ) ≥ 7 := by exact_mod_cast h₁
    have h₁₅ : (p : ℕ) ≥ 2 := by linarith
    have h₁₆ : (p : ℕ) - 2 ≥ 1 := by omega
    have h₁₇ : (p : ℕ) - 1 ≥ 2 := by omega
    have h₁₈ : (p : ℕ) ≥ 3 := by omega
    have h₁₉ : (2 : ℕ) ≤ p := by omega
    
    
    
    
    rfl
  exact h_main

/-- Given that $p\ge 7$ is a prime number, evaluate $$1^{-1} \cdot 2^{-1} + 2^{-1} \cdot 3^{-1} + 3^{-1} \cdot 4^{-1} + \cdots + (p-2)^{-1} \cdot (p-1)^{-1} \pmod{p}.$$ Show that it is 2.-/
theorem mathd_numbertheory_764 (p : ℕ) (h₀ : Nat.Prime p) (h₁ : 7 ≤ p) :
    (∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 (p - 2), (k : ZMod p)⁻¹ * ((k : ZMod p) + 1)⁻¹) = 2 := by sorry

    have h₉ : 0 < Real.sqrt (a * b) := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by positivity)

      rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> nlinarith

    (h₀ : ∀ x : ℝ, 10 * x ^ 2 - x - 24 = (a * x - 8) * (b * x + 3)) :

        <;> nlinarith

    <;>
    (try

        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> norm_num at *
        <;> nlinarith
          [sq_nonneg (a : ℝ), sq_nonneg (b : ℝ),
           sq_nonneg (a - 5 : ℝ), sq_nonneg (b - 2 : ℝ),
           sq_nonneg (a + 5 : ℝ), sq_nonneg (b + 2 : ℝ)]

theorem mathd_algebra_276 (a b : ℤ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x : ℝ, 10 * x ^ 2 - x - 24 = (a * x - 8) * (b * x + 3)) : a * b + b = 12 := by

        have h₉ : a ≥ -10 := by nlinarith

  have ha : a = 5 := by

      ring_nf at h₆ h₇ ⊢
      have h₈ : a ≤ 20 := by nlinarith
      have h₉ : a ≥ -20 := by nlinarith
      interval_cases a <;> (try omega) <;> (try norm_num at h₆ h₇ ⊢) <;> omega
    exact h₅
  rw [ha, hb]
  <;> norm_num

name: algebra_sum1onsqrt2to1onsqrt10000lt198

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  main_inequality (k : ℕ) (hk : (k : ℝ) ≥ 2) :
    (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k < 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) := by
  have h₁ : (k : ℝ) ≥ 2 := by exact_mod_cast hk
  have h₂ : 0 < Real.sqrt k := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by linarith)
  have h₃ : 0 < Real.sqrt (k - 1) := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by linarith)
  have h₄ : 0 < Real.sqrt k * Real.sqrt (k - 1) := by positivity
  have h₅ : (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) > 0 := by
    have h₅₁ : Real.sqrt k > Real.sqrt (k - 1) := by
      apply Real.sqrt_lt_sqrt
      · linarith
      · linarith
    linarith
  have h₆ : (1 : ℝ) < 2 * (k : ℝ) - 2 * Real.sqrt (k * (k - 1)) := by
    have h₆₁ : 0 < (k : ℝ) := by linarith
    have h₆₂ : 0 < (k : ℝ) - 1 := by linarith
    have h₆₃ : 0 < Real.sqrt (k * (k - 1)) := by positivity
    have h₆₄ : 0 < 2 * (k : ℝ) - 1 := by linarith
    nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k : ℝ) * (k - 1) by
      nlinarith), sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt (k * (k - 1)) - (k - 1 / 2))]
  have h₇ : (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k < 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) := by
    have h₇₁ : 0 < Real.sqrt k := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by linarith)
    have h₇₂ : 0 < Real.sqrt (k - 1) := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by linarith)
    have h₇₃ : 0 < Real.sqrt k * Real.sqrt (k - 1) := by positivity
    have h₇₄ : (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) > 0 := by linarith
    have h₇₅ : (1 : ℝ) < 2 * (k : ℝ) - 2 * Real.sqrt (k * (k - 1)) := by
      linarith
    have h₇₆ : Real.sqrt (k * (k - 1)) = Real.sqrt k * Real.sqrt (k - 1) := by
      have h₇₆₁ : Real.sqrt (k * (k - 1)) = Real.sqrt k * Real.sqrt (k - 1) := by
        rw [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq (by
          nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (k : ℝ), Real.sqrt_nonneg (k - 1 : ℝ),
            Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k : ℝ) by linarith),
            Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k - 1 : ℝ) by linarith)]) (by positivity)]
        nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k : ℝ) by linarith),
          Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k - 1 : ℝ) by linarith)]
      rw [h₇₆₁]
    have h₇₇ : (1 : ℝ) < 2 * (k : ℝ) - 2 * (Real.sqrt k * Real.sqrt (k - 1)) := by
      rw [h₇₆] at h₇₅
      linarith
    have h₇₈ : (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k < 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) := by
      have h₇₈₁ : 0 < Real.sqrt k := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by linarith)
      have h₇₈₂ : 0 < Real.sqrt (k - 1) := Real.sqrt_pos.mpr (by linarith)
      have h₇₈₃ : 0 < Real.sqrt k * Real.sqrt (k - 1) := by positivity
      have h₇₈₄ : (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) > 0 := by linarith
      field_simp at h₇₇ ⊢
      rw [div_lt_iff (by positivity)] at *
      nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k : ℝ) by linarith),
        Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (k - 1 : ℝ) by linarith),
        sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1))]
    exact h₇₈
  exact h₇

lemma sum_bound_general (n : ℕ) (hn : (2 : ℕ) ≤ n) :
    (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) n, (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k) < 2 * (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) - 1) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ (k : ℕ), k ∈ Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) n →
      (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k < 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) := by
    intro k hk
    have h₂ : k ≥ 2 := by
      simp [Finset.mem_Icc] at hk
      exact_mod_cast hk.1
    have h₃ : (k : ℝ) ≥ 2 := by exact_mod_cast h₂
    exact main_inequality k h₃
  have h₂ : (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) n, (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k) <
      ∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) n, 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1)) := by
    apply Finset.sum_lt_sum_of_nonempty
    ·
      apply Finset.nonempty_of_ne_empty
      intro h
      simp_all [Finset.Icc_eq_empty]
      <;> omega
    ·
      intro k hk
      exact h₁ k hk
  have h₃ :
      (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) n, 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1))) =
        2 * (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) - 1) := by
    have h₄ : ∀ (n : ℕ), (2 : ℕ) ≤ n →
        (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) n, 2 * (Real.sqrt k - Real.sqrt (k - 1))) =
          2 * (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) - 1) := by
      intro n hn
      induction' hn with n hn IH
      ·
        norm_num [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;>
          ring_nf at * <;>
          norm_num at * <;>
          nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2 by norm_num)]
      ·
        cases n with
        | zero => contradiction
        | succ n =>
          cases n with
          | zero => contradiction
          | succ n =>
            simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, Nat.cast_zero]
            <;>
              ring_nf at *
            <;>
              norm_num at *
            <;>
              nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (n + 2 + 1 : ℝ),
                Real.sqrt_nonneg (n + 2 : ℝ),
                Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ (n + 2 + 1 : ℝ) by positivity),
                Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ (n + 2 : ℝ) by positivity)]
    exact h₄ n hn
  linarith

lemma sum_bound_10000 :
    (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) 10000, (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k) < 198 := by
  have h₁ : (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) 10000, (1 : ℝ) / Real.sqrt k) <
      2 * (Real.sqrt (10000 : ℝ) - 1) := by
    have h₂ : (2 : ℕ) ≤ 10000 := by norm_num
    exact sum_bound_general 10000 h₂
  have h₂ : (2 : ℝ) * (Real.sqrt (10000 : ℝ) - 1) = 198 := by
    have h₃ : Real.sqrt (10000 : ℝ) = 100 := by
      rw [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;> norm_num
    rw [h₃]
    <;> norm_num
  linarith

theorem algebra_sum1onsqrt2to1onsqrt10000lt198 :
    (∑ k in Finset.Icc (2 : ℕ) 10000, 1 / Real.sqrt k) < 198 := by
  exact sum_bound_10000

name: mathd_numbertheory_618

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  n_ge_41_of_gcd (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0) (p : ℕ → ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ x, p x = x ^ 2 - x + 41)
    (h₁ : 1 < Nat.gcd (p n) (p (n + 1))) : 41 ≤ n := by
  by_contra! hle
  have hle' : n ≤ 40 := by linarith
  have hge : n ≥ 1 := by linarith
  interval_cases n <;>
    norm_num [h₀, Nat.gcd_eq_right] at h₁ ⊢ <;>
    try contradiction <;>
    try omega <;>
    try norm_num <;>
    try ring_nf at * <;>
    try norm_num at * <;>
    try omega

theorem mathd_numbertheory_618 (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0) (p : ℕ → ℕ) (h₀ : ∀ x, p x = x ^ 2 - x + 41)
    (h₁ : 1 < Nat.gcd (p n) (p (n + 1))) : 41 ≤ n := by
  exact n_ge_41_of_gcd n hn p h₀ h₁

theorem amc12a_2020_p4 (S : Finset ℕ)
    (h₀ : ∀ n : ℕ, n ∈ S ↔ 1000 ≤ n ∧ n ≤ 9999 ∧ (∀ d : ℕ, d ∈ Nat.digits 10 n → Even d) ∧ 5 ∣ n) :
    S.card = 100 := by

  have h_filter :
      S =
        Finset.filter
          (fun n =>
            (∀ d : ℕ, d ∈ Nat.digits 10 n → Even d) ∧ 5 ∣ n)
          (Finset.Icc 1000 9999) := by
    apply Finset.ext
    intro n
    change (n ∈ S) ↔
        n ∈
          (Finset.filter
              (fun n =>
                (∀ d : ℕ, d ∈ Nat.digits 10 n → Even d) ∧ 5 ∣ n)
              (Finset.Icc 1000 9999))
    simp [h₀, Finset.mem_filter, Finset.mem_Icc] <;> aesop

  have h_card : (Finset.filter
        (fun n =>
          (∀ d : ℕ, d ∈ Nat.digits 10 n → Even d) ∧ 5 ∣ n)
        (Finset.Icc 1000 9999)).card = 100 := by

    native_decide

  simpa [h_filter] using h_card

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  factorial_eq (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 9 ≤ n) :
    (((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) : ℝ) / n ! =
      (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 2 * n ! / n ! := by
  have h₂ : ((n + 2)! : ℝ) = (n + 2 : ℝ) * ((n + 1)! : ℝ) := by
    norm_cast
    <;> simp [Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.mul_comm, Nat.mul_left_comm, Nat.mul_assoc]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> norm_num
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₃ : ((n + 1)! : ℝ) = (n + 1 : ℝ) * (n ! : ℝ) := by
    norm_cast
    <;> simp [Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.mul_comm, Nat.mul_left_comm, Nat.mul_assoc]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> norm_num
    <;> nlinarith
  have h₄ : (((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) : ℝ) = (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 2 * (n ! : ℝ) := by
    rw [h₂, h₃]
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> field_simp at *
    <;> ring_nf at *
    <;> nlinarith
  rw [h₄]
  <;> field_simp
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> norm_num
  <;> nlinarith

lemma  main_eq (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 9 ≤ n) :
    ((n + 1 : ℕ) ^ 2 : ℝ) =
      (((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) / n ! : ℝ) := by
  have h₅ : (((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) : ℝ) / n ! =
      (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 2 * n ! / n ! := by
    exact factorial_eq n h₀
  have h₆ : (n ! : ℝ) ≠ 0 := by
    norm_cast
    <;> apply Nat.factorial_ne_zero
    <;> omega
  calc
    ((n + 1 : ℕ) ^ 2 : ℝ)
        = (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 2 := by norm_cast
    _ = (n + 1 : ℝ) ^ 2 * n ! / n ! := by
          field_simp [h₆]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> nlinarith
    _ = (((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) : ℝ) / n ! := by
          rw [h₅]
          <;> field_simp [h₆]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> nlinarith
theorem amc12b_2020_p6 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 9 ≤ n) : ∃ x : ℕ, (x : ℝ) ^ 2 = ((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) / n ! := by
  refine' ⟨n + 1, _⟩
  have h₁ : ((n + 1 : ℕ) ^ 2 : ℝ) =
      (((n + 2)! - (n + 1)!) / n ! : ℝ) := main_eq n h₀
  rw [h₁]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> norm_num

lemma  k_ge_5 (k : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < k)
    (h₁ : ∀ n, Nat.gcd (6 * n + k) (6 * n + 3) = 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ n, Nat.gcd (6 * n + k) (6 * n + 2) = 1)
    (h₃ : ∀ n, Nat.gcd (6 * n + k) (6 * n + 1) = 1) :
    5 ≤ k := by
  by_contra! h₄
  have h₅ : k ≤ 4 := by linarith
  have h₆ : k = 1 ∨ k = 2 ∨ k = 3 ∨ k = 4 := by
    have h₇ : k ≤ 4 := h₅
    have h₈ : 0 < k := h₀
    interval_cases k <;> norm_num at h₈ ⊢ <;> omega
  rcases h₆ with (rfl | rfl | rfl | rfl)
  · 
    have h₇ := h₃ 1
    norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right] at h₇ ⊢
    <;> try contradiction
    <;> try omega
  · 
    have h₇ := h₂ 0
    norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right] at h₇ ⊢
    <;> try contradiction
    <;> try omega
  · 
    have h₇ := h₁ 0
    norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right] at h₇ ⊢
    <;> try contradiction
    <;> try omega
  · 
    have h₇ := h₂ 0
    norm_num [Nat.gcd_eq_right] at h₇ ⊢
    <;> try contradiction
    <;> try omega

theorem mathd_numbertheory_435 (k : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < k) (h₁ : ∀ n, Nat.gcd (6 * n + k) (6 * n + 3) = 1)
    (h₂ : ∀ n, Nat.gcd (6 * n + k) (6 * n + 2) = 1) (h₃ : ∀ n, Nat.gcd (6 * n + k) (6 * n + 1) = 1) :
    5 ≤ k := by
  exact k_ge_5 k h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
