import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  y_eq_neg_six (y : ℝ) (h₀ : y < 0) (h₁ : abs y = 6) : y = -6 := by
  have h₂ : y = -6 := by
    have h₃ : abs y = 6 := h₁
    have h₄ : y < 0 := h₀
    have h₅ : y = -6 := by
      
      have h₆ : y < 0 := h₄
      have h₇ : abs y = -y := by
        rw [abs_of_neg h₆]
      
      rw [h₇] at h₃
      
      linarith
    exact h₅
  exact h₂

lemma squared_eq_225 (x y : ℝ) (h₂ : Real.sqrt ((x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2) = 15) :
    (x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2 = 225 := by
  have h₃ : Real.sqrt ((x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2) = 15 := h₂
  have h₄ : 0 ≤ (x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2 := by
    nlinarith
  have h₅ : (x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2 = 225 := by
    have h₆ : Real.sqrt ((x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2) ^ 2 = (x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2 := by
      rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> nlinarith
    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg ((x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2)]
  exact h₅

lemma squared_sub_eight_eq_144 (x y : ℝ) (h₂ : Real.sqrt ((x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2) = 15)
    (h_y : y = -6) : (x - 8) ^ 2 = 144 := by
  have h₃ : (x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2 = 225 := squared_eq_225 x y h₂
  rw [h_y] at h₃
  norm_num at h₃ ⊢
  linarith

lemma x_eq_neg_four (x : ℝ) (h₀ : x < 0) (h₄ : (x - 8) ^ 2 = 144) : x = -4 := by
  have h₅ : x - 8 = -12 := by
    have h₆ : x < 0 := h₀
    have h₇ : (x - 8) ^ 2 = 144 := h₄
    have h₈ : x - 8 = 12 ∨ x - 8 = -12 := by
      apply or_iff_not_imp_left.mpr
      intro h₉
      apply eq_of_sub_eq_zero
      apply mul_left_cancel₀ (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₉)
      nlinarith
    cases h₈ with
    | inl h₉ =>
      have h₁₀ : x - 8 = 12 := h₉
      have h₁₁ : x = 20 := by linarith
      linarith
    | inr h₉ =>
      have h₁₀ : x - 8 = -12 := h₉
      exact h₁₀
  have h₆ : x - 8 = -12 := h₅
  have h₇ : x = -4 := by linarith
  exact h₇

lemma sum_of_squares_eq_52 (x y : ℝ) (h_y : y = -6) (h_x : x = -4) :
    x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 = 52 := by
  rw [h_x, h_y]
  norm_num

lemma sum_eq_n (x y : ℝ) (n : NNReal) (h₃ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) = Real.sqrt n) :
    (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) = (n : ℝ) := by
  have h₄ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) = Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) := by
    exact_mod_cast h₃
  have h₅ : 0 ≤ (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) := by positivity
  have h₆ : 0 ≤ (n : ℝ) := by positivity
  have h₇ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) = Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) := h₄
  have h₈ : (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) = (n : ℝ) := by
    have h₉ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) = Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) := h₇
    have h₁₀ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) ^ 2 = Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) ^ 2 := by rw [h₉]
    have h₁₁ : (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) = (n : ℝ) := by
      have h₁₂ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) ^ 2 = (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) := by
        rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> positivity
      have h₁₃ : Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) ^ 2 = (n : ℝ) := by
        rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> positivity
      nlinarith
    exact h₁₁
  exact_mod_cast h₈

theorem mathd_algebra_288 (x y : ℝ) (n : NNReal) (h₀ : x < 0 ∧ y < 0) (h₁ : abs y = 6)
    (h₂ : Real.sqrt ((x - 8) ^ 2 + (y - 3) ^ 2) = 15)
    (h₃ : Real.sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) = Real.sqrt n) : n = 52 := by
  have h_y : y = -6 := y_eq_neg_six y h₀.2 h₁
  have h₄ : (x - 8) ^ 2 = 144 := squared_sub_eight_eq_144 x y h₂ h_y
  have h_x : x = -4 := x_eq_neg_four x h₀.1 h₄
  have h₅ : x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 = 52 := sum_of_squares_eq_52 x y h_y h_x
  have h₆ : (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) = (n : ℝ) := by
    exact_mod_cast sum_eq_n x y n h₃
  have h₇ : (n : ℝ) = 52 := by
    have h₈ : (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 : ℝ) = 52 := by exact_mod_cast h₅
    linarith
  have h₈ : n = 52 := by
    have h₉ : (n : ℝ) = 52 := h₇
    have h₁₀ : n = 52 := by
      norm_cast at h₉ ⊢
      <;>
      (try norm_num at h₉ ⊢) <;>
      (try simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero]) <;>
      (try nlinarith) <;>
      (try linarith) <;>
      (try ring_nf at *) <;>
      (try nlinarith)
      <;>
      (try
        {
          simp_all [NNReal.coe_eq_zero] <;>
          nlinarith
        })
    exact h₁₀
  exact h₈

import Mathlib

lemma  imo_1974_p3 (n : ℕ) :
    ¬5 ∣ ∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), Nat.choose (2 * n + 1) (2 * k + 1) * 2 ^ (3 * k) := by
  have h_main :
      ∀ (n : ℕ), ¬5 ∣ ∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), Nat.choose (2 * n + 1) (2 * k + 1) * 2 ^ (3 * k) := by
    intro n
    have h₁ : (∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), Nat.choose (2 * n + 1) (2 * k + 1) * 2 ^ (3 * k)) % 5 ≠ 0 := by
      
      have h₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ), (∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), Nat.choose (2 * n + 1) (2 * k + 1) * 2 ^ (3 * k)) % 5 ≠ 0 := by
        intro n
        induction n with
        | zero =>
            norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.add_mod, Nat.pow_mod]
        | succ n ih =>
            simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Nat.mul_add, Nat.add_mul, Nat.pow_add, Nat.pow_mul, Nat.mul_assoc] at ih ⊢
            norm_num [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.add_mod, Nat.pow_mod] at ih ⊢
            <;>
            (try omega) <;>
            (try
              {
                ring_nf at ih ⊢
                omega
              }) <;>
            (try
              {
                norm_num at ih ⊢
                <;>
                omega
              }) <;>
            (try
              {
                cases n with
                | zero =>
                    norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.add_mod, Nat.pow_mod] at *
                | succ n =>
                    simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Nat.mul_add, Nat.add_mul, Nat.pow_add, Nat.pow_mul, Nat.mul_assoc] at ih ⊢
                    norm_num [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.add_mod, Nat.pow_mod] at ih ⊢
                    <;>
                    ring_nf at ih ⊢
                    <;>
                    omega
              })
            <;>
            omega
      exact h₂ n
    omega
  exact h_main n

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  cos_ne_zero (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7) :
    Real.cos x ≠ 0 := by
  by_contra h
  have h₁ : Real.cos x = 0 := by simpa using h
  have h₂ : Real.tan x = 0 := by
    rw [Real.tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
    rw [h₁]
    simp
  have h₃ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7 := h₀
  rw [h₁, h₂] at h₃
  norm_num at h₃ <;>
    (try contradiction) <;>
    (try linarith [Real.pi_pos]) <;>
    (try
      {
        simp_all [Real.tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> nlinarith [Real.sin_le_one x, Real.cos_le_one x,
          Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x]
      })

lemma sin_ne_zero (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0) :
    Real.sin x ≠ 0 := by
  by_contra h
  have h₁ : Real.sin x = 0 := by simpa using h
  have h₂ : Real.tan x = 0 := by
    rw [Real.tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
    rw [h₁]
    simp
  have h₃ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7 := h₀
  rw [h₂] at h₃
  have h₄ : 1 / Real.cos x = 22 / 7 := by linarith
  have h₅ : Real.cos x = 7 / 22 := by
    have h₆ : Real.cos x ≠ 0 := h_cos
    field_simp at h₄
    nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x]
  have h₆ : Real.sin x ^ 2 + Real.cos x ^ 2 = 1 := Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x
  rw [h₁, h₅] at h₆
  norm_num at h₆ ⊢
  <;>
    (try contradiction) <;>
    (try nlinarith [Real.sin_le_one x, Real.cos_le_one x]) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try
      {
        simp_all [Real.tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> nlinarith [Real.sin_le_one x, Real.cos_le_one x,
          Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x]
      })

lemma eq_one_add_sin_eq (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0) (h_sin : Real.sin x ≠ 0) :
    1 + Real.sin x = (22 / 7 : ℝ) * Real.cos x := by
  have h₁ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7 := h₀
  have h₂ : Real.tan x = Real.sin x / Real.cos x := by
    rw [Real.tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
  rw [h₂] at h₁
  have h₃ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.sin x / Real.cos x = 22 / 7 := by
    linarith
  have h₄ : (1 + Real.sin x) / Real.cos x = 22 / 7 := by
    have h₅ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.sin x / Real.cos x = (1 + Real.sin x) / Real.cos x := by
      field_simp [h_cos]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> field_simp [h_cos]
      <;> ring_nf
    rw [h₅] at h₃
    linarith
  have h₅ : 1 + Real.sin x = (22 / 7 : ℝ) * Real.cos x := by
    have h₆ : Real.cos x ≠ 0 := h_cos
    field_simp [h₆] at h₄ ⊢
    <;> nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x]
  exact h₅

lemma h₂_eq (x : ℝ) (m : ℚ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h₁ : 1 / Real.sin x + 1 / Real.tan x = m) (h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0)
    (h_sin : Real.sin x ≠ 0) :
    (1 + Real.cos x) / Real.sin x = (m : ℝ) := by
  have h₂ : 1 / Real.sin x + 1 / Real.tan x = (m : ℝ) := by exact_mod_cast h₁
  have h₃ : Real.tan x = Real.sin x / Real.cos x := by
    rw [Real.tan_eq_sin_div_cos]
  have h₄ : 1 / Real.tan x = Real.cos x / Real.sin x := by
    rw [h₃]
    field_simp [h_cos, h_sin]
    <;> ring_nf
    <;> field_simp [h_cos, h_sin]
    <;> ring_nf
  rw [h₄] at h₂
  have h₅ : 1 / Real.sin x + Real.cos x / Real.sin x = (m : ℝ) := by linarith
  have h₆ : (1 + Real.cos x) / Real.sin x = (m : ℝ) := by
    have h₇ : 1 / Real.sin x + Real.cos x / Real.sin x = (1 + Real.cos x) / Real.sin x := by
      field_simp [h_sin]
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> field_simp [h_sin]
      <;> ring_nf
    rw [h₇] at h₅
    linarith
  exact h₆

lemma cos_val (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0) (h_sin : Real.sin x ≠ 0) :
    Real.cos x = 308 / 533 := by
  have h₃ : 1 + Real.sin x = (22 / 7 : ℝ) * Real.cos x :=
    eq_one_add_sin_eq x h₀ h_cos h_sin
  have h₄ : Real.sin x ^ 2 + Real.cos x ^ 2 = 1 := Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x
  have h₅ : Real.sin x = (22 / 7 : ℝ) * Real.cos x - 1 := by linarith
  rw [h₅] at h₄
  have h₆ : ((22 / 7 : ℝ) * Real.cos x - 1) ^ 2 + Real.cos x ^ 2 = 1 := by linarith
  have h₇ : Real.cos x = 308 / 533 := by
    nlinarith [sq_pos_of_ne_zero h_cos, sq_pos_of_ne_zero h_sin]
  exact h₇

lemma sin_val (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0) (h_sin : Real.sin x ≠ 0) :
    Real.sin x = 435 / 533 := by
  have h₃ : 1 + Real.sin x = (22 / 7 : ℝ) * Real.cos x :=
    eq_one_add_sin_eq x h₀ h_cos h_sin
  have h₄ : Real.cos x = 308 / 533 := cos_val x h₀ h_cos h_sin
  rw [h₄] at h₃
  have h₅ : Real.sin x = 435 / 533 := by
    nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq x]
  exact h₅

lemma m_eq (x : ℝ) (m : ℚ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h₁ : 1 / Real.sin x + 1 / Real.tan x = m) (h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0)
    (h_sin : Real.sin x ≠ 0) :
    (m : ℝ) = (29 : ℝ) / 15 := by
  have h₃ : (1 + Real.cos x) / Real.sin x = (m : ℝ) :=
    h₂_eq x m h₀ h₁ h_cos h_sin
  have h₄ : Real.cos x = 308 / 533 := cos_val x h₀ h_cos h_sin
  have h₅ : Real.sin x = 435 / 533 := sin_val x h₀ h_cos h_sin
  rw [h₄, h₅] at h₃
  norm_num at h₃ ⊢
  <;>
    (try norm_num at h₃ ⊢) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try ring_nf at h₃ ⊢) <;>
    (try field_simp at h₃ ⊢) <;>
    (try norm_num at h₃ ⊢) <;>
    (try linarith)

lemma sum_eq (x : ℝ) (m : ℚ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h₁ : 1 / Real.sin x + 1 / Real.tan x = m) :
    ↑m.den + m.num = 44 := by
  have h_cos : Real.cos x ≠ 0 := cos_ne_zero x h₀
  have h_sin : Real.sin x ≠ 0 := sin_ne_zero x h₀ h_cos
  have h₅ : (m : ℝ) = (29 : ℝ) / 15 := m_eq x m h₀ h₁ h_cos h_sin
  have h₆ : (m : ℝ) = (29 : ℝ) / 15 := by exact_mod_cast h₅
  have h₇ : m = (29 : ℚ) / 15 := by
    norm_cast at h₆ ⊢
    <;>
      (try field_simp at h₆ ⊢) <;>
      (try ring_nf at h₆ ⊢) <;>
      (try norm_num at h₆ ⊢) <;>
      (try nlinarith) <;>
      (try
        {
          rw [div_eq_div_iff (by norm_num) (by norm_num)] at h₆
          <;> norm_cast at h₆ ⊢ <;>
          (try
            {
              field_simp at h₆ ⊢ <;>
              ring_nf at h₆ ⊢ <;>
              norm_cast at h₆ ⊢ <;>
              nlinarith
            })
        })
    <;>
      (try
        {
          norm_num at h₆ ⊢
          <;>
            (try
              {
                rw [← sub_eq_zero] at h₆ ⊢
                <;>
                  field_simp at h₆ ⊢ <;>
                  ring_nf at h₆ ⊢ <;>
                  norm_cast at h₆ ⊢ <;>
                  nlinarith
              })
        })
  have h₈ : m = (29 : ℚ) / 15 := h₇
  rw [h₈]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

theorem aime_1991_p9 (x : ℝ) (m : ℚ) (h₀ : 1 / Real.cos x + Real.tan x = 22 / 7)
    (h₁ : 1 / Real.sin x + 1 / Real.tan x = m) : ↑m.den + m.num = 44 := by
  exact sum_eq x m h₀ h₁

name: amc12a_2009_p6
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  rewrite_pow_eq (m n p q : ℝ) (h₀ : p = 2 ^ m) (h₁ : q = 3 ^ n) :
    p ^ (2 * n) * q ^ m = (2 ^ m) ^ (2 * n) * (3 ^ n) ^ m := by
  
  rw [h₀, h₁]

lemma simplified_product_eq (m n : ℝ) :
    (2 ^ m) ^ (2 * n) * (3 ^ n) ^ m = (12 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by
  
  
  have h₂ : (2 : ℝ) ^ m > 0 := by positivity
  have h₃ : (3 : ℝ) ^ n > 0 := by positivity
  have h₄ : (2 : ℝ) ^ m * (3 : ℝ) ^ n > 0 := by positivity
  have h₅ : (12 : ℝ) = (2 : ℝ) ^ 2 * 3 := by norm_num
  
  have h₆ : (2 : ℝ) ^ (2 * n) > 0 := by positivity
  have h₇ : (3 : ℝ) ^ n > 0 := by positivity
  have h₈ : (2 : ℝ) ^ m > 0 := by positivity
  calc
    (2 ^ m) ^ (2 * n) * (3 ^ n) ^ m
        = (2 : ℝ) ^ (m * (2 * n)) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (n * m) := by
          have h₉ : (2 ^ m : ℝ) ^ (2 * n) = (2 : ℝ) ^ (m * (2 * n)) := by
            rw [← Real.rpow_mul (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2)]
            <;> ring_nf
            <;> field_simp
            <;> ring_nf
          have h₁₀ : (3 ^ n : ℝ) ^ m = (3 : ℝ) ^ (n * m) := by
            rw [← Real.rpow_mul (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3)]
            <;> ring_nf
            <;> field_simp
            <;> ring_nf
          rw [h₉, h₁₀]
    _ = (2 : ℝ) ^ (2 * m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by
          ring_nf
          <;> simp [mul_assoc]
          <;> ring_nf
    _ = ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by
          have h₉ : (2 : ℝ) ^ (2 * m * n) = ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) := by
            have h₁₀ : (2 : ℝ) ^ (2 * m * n) = (2 : ℝ) ^ (2 * (m * n)) := by ring_nf
            rw [h₁₀]
            have h₁₁ : (2 : ℝ) ^ (2 * (m * n)) = ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) := by
              rw [← Real.rpow_nat_cast]
              rw [← Real.rpow_mul (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2)]
              <;> ring_nf
              <;> field_simp
              <;> ring_nf
            rw [h₁₁]
          rw [h₉]
          <;> ring_nf
    _ = (2 ^ 2 * 3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by
          have h₉ : ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) =
                ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2 * 3) ^ (m * n) := by
            have h₁₀ : ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2 * 3 : ℝ) > 0 := by positivity
            have h₁₁ : ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) > 0 := by positivity
            have h₁₂ : (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) > 0 := by positivity
            calc
              ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n)
                  = ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by rfl
              _ = ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2 * 3) ^ (m * n) := by
                have h₁₃ :
                    ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2 * 3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) =
                      ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by
                  rw [show ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2 * 3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) =
                        ((2 : ℝ) ^ 2) ^ (m * n) * (3 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) by
                    {
                      rw [Real.mul_rpow (by positivity) (by positivity)]
                      <;> ring_nf
                      <;> field_simp
                      <;> ring_nf
                    }]
                rw [← h₁₃]
                <;> ring_nf
          rw [h₉]
    _ = (12 : ℝ) ^ (m * n) := by
          norm_num at h₅ ⊢
          <;>
          simp_all [h₅]
          <;>
          ring_nf at *
          <;>
          norm_num at *
          <;>
          linarith

theorem amc12a_2009_p6 (m n p q : ℝ) (h₀ : p = 2 ^ m) (h₁ : q = 3 ^ n) :
    p ^ (2 * n) * q ^ m = 12 ^ (m * n) := by
  have h₂ := rewrite_pow_eq (m := m) (n := n) (p := p) (q := q) h₀ h₁
  have h₃ := simplified_product_eq (m := m) (n := n)
  calc
    p ^ (2 * n) * q ^ m
        = (2 ^ m) ^ (2 * n) * (3 ^ n) ^ m := by
          rw [h₂]
    _ = 12 ^ (m * n) := by
          rw [h₃]
    _ = 12 ^ (m * n) := by rfl

name: mathd_algebra_158
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  sum_range_eight :
    (∑ k in Finset.range 8, (2 * k + 1 : ℤ)) = 64 := by
  norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ,
    Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ,
    Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ]
  <;> decide
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> norm_num
  <;> rfl

lemma sum_range_five (a : ℕ) :
    (∑ k in Finset.range 5, ((a : ℤ) + 2 * k)) = (5 : ℤ) * (a : ℤ) + 20 := by
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ,
    Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ] <;>
    ring_nf <;>
    norm_cast <;>
    linarith

lemma a_eq_8 (a : ℕ)
    (h : (∑ k in Finset.range 8, (2 * k + 1 : ℤ)) -
          (∑ k in Finset.range 5, ((a : ℤ) + 2 * k)) = (4 : ℤ)) :
    a = 8 := by
  have h₁ : (∑ k in Finset.range 8, (2 * k + 1 : ℤ)) = (64 : ℤ) := sum_range_eight
  have h₂ : (∑ k in Finset.range 5, ((a : ℤ) + 2 * k)) = (5 : ℤ) * (a : ℤ) + 20 := by
    simpa using sum_range_five a
  rw [h₁, h₂] at h
  have h₃ : (a : ℤ) = 8 := by
    omega
  exact_mod_cast h₃

theorem mathd_algebra_158 (a : ℕ) (h₀ : Even a)
    (h₁ : ∑ k in Finset.range 8, (2 * k + 1) - ∑ k in Finset.range 5, (a + 2 * k) = (4 : ℤ)) :
    a = 8 := by
  have h₂ :
      (∑ k in Finset.range 8, (2 * k + 1 : ℤ)) -
        (∑ k in Finset.range 5, ((a : ℤ) + 2 * k)) = (4 : ℤ) := by
    simpa using h₁
  have h₃ : a = 8 := a_eq_8 a h₂
  exact h₃

name: algebra_absxm1pabsxpabsxp1eqxp2_0leqxleq1
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  h_nonneg (x : ℝ) (h₀ : abs (x - 1) + abs x + abs (x + 1) = x + 2) :
    0 ≤ x := by
  by_contra hx
  have hx' : x < 0 := by linarith
  cases' le_or_lt 0 (x + 1) with h₁ h₁ <;>
    cases' le_or_lt 0 (x - 1) with h₂ h₂ <;>
      cases' le_or_lt 0 x with h₃ h₃ <;>
        simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_neg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt] <;>
          (try { contradiction }) <;>
            (try { linarith }) <;>
              (try {
                split_ifs at * <;>
                  norm_num at * <;>
                    (try { nlinarith }) <;>
                      (try { linarith })
              })
  <;>
    (try {
      cases' le_or_lt 0 (x + 1) with h₁ h₁ <;>
        cases' le_or_lt 0 (x - 1) with h₂ h₂ <;>
          simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_neg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt] <;>
            (try { contradiction }) <;>
              (try { linarith }) <;>
                (try { nlinarith })
    })
  <;>
    (try {
      nlinarith
    })

lemma h_le_one (x : ℝ) (h₀ : abs (x - 1) + abs x + abs (x + 1) = x + 2) :
    x ≤ 1 := by
  by_contra hx
  have hx' : x > 1 := by linarith
  cases' le_or_lt 0 (x + 1) with h₁ h₁ <;>
    cases' le_or_lt 0 (x - 1) with h₂ h₂ <;>
      cases' le_or_lt 0 x with h₃ h₃ <;>
        simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_neg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt] <;>
          (try { contradiction }) <;>
            (try { linarith }) <;>
              (try { nlinarith })
  <;>
    (try {
      nlinarith
    })

theorem algebra_absxm1pabsxpabsxp1eqxp2_0leqxleq1 (x : ℝ)
    (h₀ : abs (x - 1) + abs x + abs (x + 1) = x + 2) : 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 1 := by
  exact ⟨h_nonneg x h₀, h_le_one x h₀⟩

name: aime_1990_p4
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  y_eq_39 (x : ℝ)
    (h₁ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29 ≠ 0)
    (h₂ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45 ≠ 0)
    (h₃ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69 ≠ 0)
    (h₄ :
      1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29) +
        1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45) -
        2 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69) = 0) :
    x ^ 2 - 10 * x = 39 := by
  have h₅ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29) ≠ 0 := h₁
  have h₆ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45) ≠ 0 := h₂
  have h₇ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69) ≠ 0 := h₃
  have h₈ :
      1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29) +
        1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45) -
        2 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69) = 0 := h₄
  
  have h₉ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x) = 39 := by
    have h₉₁ :
        1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29) +
          1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45) -
          2 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69) = 0 := h₈
    have h₉₂ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29) ≠ 0 := h₅
    have h₉₃ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45) ≠ 0 := h₆
    have h₉₄ : (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69) ≠ 0 := h₇
    field_simp [h₉₂, h₉₃, h₉₄] at h₉₁
    ring_nf at h₉₁ ⊢
    nlinarith
      [sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₉₂),
       sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₉₃),
       sq_pos_of_ne_zero (sub_ne_zero.mpr h₉₄)]
  exact h₉
  <;> linarith


lemma x_eq_13_of_y (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < x)
    (h_y : x ^ 2 - 10 * x = 39) : x = 13 := by
  have h₅ : x = 13 := by
    have h₅₁ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x = 39 := h_y
    have h₅₂ : 0 < x := h₀
    nlinarith
  exact h₅

theorem aime_1990_p4 (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < x) (h₁ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29 ≠ 0)
    (h₂ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45 ≠ 0) (h₃ : x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69 ≠ 0)
    (h₄ : 1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 29) + 1 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 45) - 2 / (x ^ 2 - 10 * x - 69) = 0) :
    x = 13 := by
  have h_y : x ^ 2 - 10 * x = 39 :=
    y_eq_39 (x := x) h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄
  have h_x : x = 13 :=
    x_eq_13_of_y (x := x) h₀ h_y
  exact h_x

name: mathd_numbertheory_541
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  le_of_mul_eq (m n : ℕ) (h₂ : m * n = 2005) (h₀ : 1 < m) (h₁ : 1 < n) :
    m ≤ 2005 ∧ n ≤ 2005 := by
  have h₃ : m ≤ 2005 := by
    by_contra h
    have h₄ : m ≥ 2006 := by omega
    have h₅ : n ≤ 1 := by
      nlinarith
    have h₆ : n ≥ 2 := by omega
    omega
  have h₄ : n ≤ 2005 := by
    by_contra h
    have h₅ : n ≥ 2006 := by omega
    have h₆ : m ≤ 1 := by
      nlinarith
    have h₇ : m ≥ 2 := by omega
    omega
  exact ⟨h₃, h₄⟩


lemma m_is_5_or_401 (m n : ℕ) (h₀ : 1 < m) (h₁ : 1 < n) (h₂ : m * n = 2005)
    (h₅ : m ≤ 2005) (h₆ : n ≤ 2005) : m = 5 ∨ m = 401 := by
  have h₇ : m ∣ 2005 := by
    use n
    <;> linarith
  have h₈ : m = 5 ∨ m = 401 := by
    have h₉ : m ≤ 2005 := h₅
    have h₁₀ : m ≥ 2 := by linarith
    interval_cases m <;> norm_num at h₇ ⊢ <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try {
        have h₁₁ : n ≤ 2005 := h₆
        have h₁₂ : n ≥ 2 := by linarith
        interval_cases n <;> norm_num at h₂ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>
          (try nlinarith)
      }) <;>
      (try {
        omega
      })
  exact h₈


lemma n_is_5_or_401 (m n : ℕ) (h₀ : 1 < m) (h₁ : 1 < n) (h₂ : m * n = 2005)
    (h₅ : m ≤ 2005) (h₆ : n ≤ 2005) : n = 5 ∨ n = 401 := by
  have h₇ : n ∣ 2005 := by
    use m

        have h₁₂ : m ≥ 2 := by linarith
        interval_cases m <;> norm_num at h₂ ⊢ <;>
          (try omega) <;>

  exact h₈

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  y_eq_2_div_5 (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y ∧ 0 < z)
    (h₁ : x + 1 / y = 4) (h₂ : y + 1 / z = 1) (h₃ : z + 1 / x = 7 / 3) :
    y = 2 / 5 := by
  have hy_pos : 0 < y := h₀.2.1
  have hx_pos : 0 < x := h₀.1
  have hz_pos : 0 < z := h₀.2.2
  field_simp [hy_pos.ne', hx_pos.ne', hz_pos.ne'] at h₁ h₂ h₃ ⊢
  ring_nf at h₁ h₂ h₃ ⊢
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (y - 2 / 5), sq_nonneg (z - 5 / 3), sq_nonneg (x - 3 / 2),
    mul_pos hx_pos hy_pos, mul_pos hy_pos hz_pos, mul_pos hz_pos hx_pos,
    mul_pos (mul_pos hx_pos hy_pos) hz_pos]

lemma x_eq_3_div_2 (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y ∧ 0 < z)
    (h₁ : x + 1 / y = 4) (h₂ : y + 1 / z = 1) (h₃ : z + 1 / x = 7 / 3)
    (hy : y = 2 / 5) :
    x = 3 / 2 := by
  have hx_pos : 0 < x := h₀.1
  have hy_pos : 0 < y := h₀.2.1
  have hz_pos : 0 < z := h₀.2.2
  have h₄ : x + 1 / y = 4 := h₁
  rw [hy] at h₄
  field_simp at h₄ ⊢
  nlinarith [hx_pos, hy_pos, hz_pos]

lemma z_eq_5_div_3 (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y ∧ 0 < z)
    (h₁ : x + 1 / y = 4) (h₂ : y + 1 / z = 1) (h₃ : z + 1 / x = 7 / 3)
    (hy : y = 2 / 5) (hx : x = 3 / 2) :
    z = 5 / 3 := by
  have hx_pos : 0 < x := h₀.1
  have hy_pos : 0 < y := h₀.2.1
  have hz_pos : 0 < z := h₀.2.2
  have h₄ : y + 1 / z = 1 := h₂
  rw [hy] at h₄
  field_simp at h₄ ⊢
  nlinarith [hx_pos, hy_pos, hz_pos]

theorem amc12_2000_p20 (x y z : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y ∧ 0 < z) (h₁ : x + 1 / y = 4)
    (h₂ : y + 1 / z = 1) (h₃ : z + 1 / x = 7 / 3) : x * y * z = 1 := by
  have hy : y = 2 / 5 := y_eq_2_div_5 (x := x) (y := y) (z := z) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃
  have hx : x = 3 / 2 := x_eq_3_div_2 (x := x) (y := y) (z := z) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ hy
  have hz : z = 5 / 3 := z_eq_5_div_3 (x := x) (y := y) (z := z) h₀ h₁ h₂ h₃ hy hx
  rw [hx, hy, hz]
  norm_num

name: aime_1983_p2
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  abs_sub_p (x p : ℝ) (h₁ : p ≤ x) (h₀ : 0 < p ∧ p < 15) :
    abs (x - p) = x - p := by
  have h₄₁ : x - p ≥ 0 := by linarith
  rw [abs_of_nonneg h₄₁]

lemma abs_sub_15 (x p : ℝ) (h₁ : x ≤ 15) :
    abs (x - 15) = 15 - x := by
  have h₄₄ : x - 15 ≤ 0 := by linarith
  rw [abs_of_nonpos h₄₄]
  <;> linarith

lemma abs_sub_p_15 (x p : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < p ∧ p < 15) (h₁ : p ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 15) :
    abs (x - p - 15) = p + 15 - x := by
  have h₄₇ : x - p - 15 ≤ -p := by linarith
  have h₄₈ : x - p - 15 < 0 := by linarith
  have h₄₉ : abs (x - p - 15) = -(x - p - 15) := by
    rw [abs_of_neg h₄₈]
    <;> linarith
  rw [h₄₉]
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> linarith

lemma f_eq (x p : ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ)
    (h₀ : 0 < p ∧ p < 15) (h₁ : p ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 15)
    (h₂ : f x = abs (x - p) + abs (x - 15) + abs (x - p - 15)) :
    f x = 30 - x := by
  have h₅₁ : abs (x - p) = x - p := abs_sub_p x p h₁.1 h₀
  have h₅₂ : abs (x - 15) = 15 - x := abs_sub_15 x p h₁.2
  have h₅₃ : abs (x - p - 15) = p + 15 - x := abs_sub_p_15 x p h₀ h₁
  rw [h₂, h₅₁, h₅₂, h₅₃]
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> linarith

lemma lower_bound (x p : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < p ∧ p < 15) (h₁ : p ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 15) :
    15 ≤ (30 - x) := by
  have h₅₅ : x ≤ 15 := h₁.2
  linarith

theorem aime_1983_p2 (x p : ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < p ∧ p < 15) (h₁ : p ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 15)
    (h₂ : f x = abs (x - p) + abs (x - 15) + abs (x - p - 15)) : 15 ≤ f x := by
  have h₅₆ : f x = 30 - x := f_eq x p f h₀ h₁ h₂
  have h₅₇ : 15 ≤ (30 - x) := lower_bound x p h₀ h₁
  calc
    15 ≤ 30 - x := h₅₇
    _ = f x := by
      rw [h₅₆]
      <;> linarith

            nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (x : ℤ), pow_two_nonneg (x - 1 : ℤ)]
          })
    all_goals
      (try omega)
    all_goals
      (try
        {
          nlinarith [pow_two_nonneg (x : ℤ), pow_two_nonneg (x - 1 : ℤ)]
        })
  
  have h₅ : ∀ (t : ℕ), t ≥ 8 → t ^ 4 ≥ 4096 := by
    intro t ht
    have h₅₁ : t ≥ 8 := ht
    have h₅₂ : t ^ 2 ≥ 64 := by
      nlinarith
    have h₅₃ : t ^ 3 ≥ 512 := by
      nlinarith
    have h₅₄ : t ^ 4 ≥ 4096 := by
      nlinarith
    exact h₅₄
  
  have h₆ : ∀ (t : ℕ), t ^ 4 = n → 2 ≤ t → 8 ≤ t := by
    intro t h₆₁ h₆₂
    by_contra h₆₃
    have h₆₄ : t < 8 := by
      omega
    have h₆₅ : ¬∃ (x : ℕ), x ^ 3 = t ^ 4 := by
      apply h₄ t h₆₂ h₆₄
    have h₆₆ : ∃ (x : ℕ), x ^ 3 = t ^ 4 := by
      have h₆₇ : t ^ 4 = n := h₆₁
      have h₆₈ : ∃ (x : ℕ), x ^ 3 = n := h₁
      rcases h₆₈ with ⟨x, h₆₉⟩
      use x
      <;> linarith
    contradiction
  
  have h₇ : 4096 ≤ n := by
    obtain ⟨t, h₇₁, h₇₂⟩ := h₃
    have h₇₃ : 8 ≤ t := h₆ t h₇₁ h₇₂
    have h₇₄ : t ^ 4 ≥ 4096 := h₅ t h₇₃
    have h₇₅ : t ^ 4 = n := h₇₁
    linarith
  exact h₇

name: mathd_algebra_142
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  m_eq_neg_one (m b : ℝ) (h₀ : m * 7 + b = -1) (h₁ : m * -1 + b = 7) :
    m = -1 := by
  have h₂ : m * 7 + b - (m * -1 + b) = -1 - 7 := by
    linarith
  have h₃ : m * 7 + b - (m * -1 + b) = 8 * m := by
    ring_nf at h₂ ⊢
    <;> linarith
  have h₄ : 8 * m = -8 := by
    linarith
  have h₅ : m = -1 := by
    linarith
  exact h₅

lemma b_eq_six (m b : ℝ) (h₀ : m * 7 + b = -1) (h₁ : m * -1 + b = 7)
    (hm : m = -1) : b = 6 := by
  have h₂ : m * -1 + b = 7 := h₁
  rw [hm] at h₂
  ring_nf at h₂ ⊢
  linarith

theorem mathd_algebra_142 (m b : ℝ) (h₀ : m * 7 + b = -1) (h₁ : m * -1 + b = 7) : m + b = 5 := by
  have h_m : m = -1 := m_eq_neg_one m b h₀ h₁
  have h_b : b = 6 := b_eq_six m b h₀ h₁ h_m
  rw [h_m, h_b]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> linarith

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

/-- If $a$ and $b$ are positive integers and there exists a positive integer $k$ such that $2^k = (a + b^2) (b + a^2)$, then show that $a = 1$.-/
theorem numbertheory_exk2powkeqapb2mulbpa2_aeq1 (a b : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b)
    (h₁ : ∃ k > 0, 2 ^ k = (a + b ^ 2) * (b + a ^ 2)) : a = 1 := by sorry

name: mathd_algebra_400
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  eq_55_mul (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 5 + 500 / 100 * 10 = 110 / 100 * x) :
    55 = (110 / 100 : ℝ) * x := by
  norm_num at h₀ ⊢
  <;> linarith


lemma solve_for_x (x : ℝ) (h₁ : 55 = (110 / 100 : ℝ) * x) : x = 50 := by
  have h₂ : x = 50 := by
    have h₃ : (55 : ℝ) = (110 / 100 : ℝ) * x := h₁
    ring_nf at h₃ ⊢
    <;> nlinarith
  exact h₂

theorem mathd_algebra_400 (x : ℝ) (h₀ : 5 + 500 / 100 * 10 = 110 / 100 * x) : x = 50 := by
  have h₁ : 55 = (110 / 100 : ℝ) * x := eq_55_mul x h₀
  have h₂ : x = 50 := solve_for_x x h₁
  exact h₂

name: aime_1995_p7
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma.  
   This lemma, `k_eq_10`, `m_eq_13`, `n_eq_4`, takes all the hypotheses as arguments and returns the three equalities.  
   Inside the lemma we:
   - Use `norm_num` to simplify numerical expressions.
   - Apply `nlinarith` together with basic trigonometric bounds (`Real.sin_le_one`, `Real.cos_le_one`, etc.) to derive contradictions unless the specific values hold.
   - Use the coprimality condition `Nat.gcd m n = 1` to eliminate other possibilities.

3. **Combine the three lemmas** to obtain the required sum.  
   A fourth lemma, `sum_k_m_n_eq_27`, first obtains the three equalities via the previous lemmas, then rewrites the goal `k + m + n = 27` using those equalities and finishes by `norm_num`.

4. **State the main theorem** `aime_1995_p7`.  
   It simply forwards the arguments to `sum_k_m_n_eq_27`, fulfilling the theorem statement.

**Key Points for the Lemmas**
- `k_eq_10`, `m_eq_13`, `n_eq_4` are each proved by contradiction: assuming a different value for the corresponding variable leads to an impossible inequality after simplifying the trigonometric equations.
- The bounds `Real.sin_le_one`, `Real.cos_le_one`, `Real.sqrt_nonneg`, and `Real.sq_sqrt` are used in the `nlinarith` calls to handle the square‑root terms.
- The coprimality hypothesis `h₁ : Nat.gcd m n = 1` is crucial to rule out fractions like `2/8` that would otherwise be possible but violate the gcd condition.

**Final Proof Flow**
1. Invoke `sum_k_m_n_eq_27` with all hypotheses.
2. Inside, call the three value lemmas to get `k = 10`, `m = 13`, `n = 4`.
3. Substitute these values and finish with `norm_num`.

This modular structure makes the proof easier to read, maintain, and reuse.
### Final Lean 4 Proof
```lean4
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  k_eq_10 (k m n : ℕ) (t : ℝ)
    (h₀ : 0 < k ∧ 0 < m ∧ 0 < n) (h₁ : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
    (h₂ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4)
    (h₃ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = m / n - Real.sqrt k) :
    k = 10 := by
  have h₄ : k = 10 := by
    have h₅ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4 := h₂
    have h₆ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k := by
      exact_mod_cast h₃
    have h₇ : 0 < k := h₀.1
    have h₈ : 0 < m := h₀.2.1
    have h₉ : 0 < n := h₀.2.2
    have h₁₀ : Nat.gcd m n = 1 := h₁
    
    
    have h₁₁ : Real.sqrt k ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
    have h₁₂ : Real.sqrt 10 ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
    have h₁₃ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
    have h₁₄ : (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
    
    have h₁₅ : (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k = (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) := by linarith
    have h₁₆ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4 := h₂
    
    
    have h₁₇ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = 1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by
      ring_nf
    have h₁₈ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 1 + Real.sin t + Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by
      ring_nf
    
    have h₁₉ : 1 + Real.sin t + Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t = 5 / 4 := by linarith
    have h₂₀ : 1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t = (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k := by linarith
    
    have h₂₁ : 2 * (Real.sin t + Real.cos t) = 5 / 2 - (m : ℝ) / n + Real.sqrt k := by
      linarith
    
    have h₂₂ : (2 * (Real.sin t + Real.cos t)) ^ 2 = (5 / 2 - (m : ℝ) / n + Real.sqrt k) ^ 2 := by
      rw [h₂₁]
    
    have h₂₃ : (Real.sin t + Real.cos t) ^ 2 = 1 + 2 * Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by
      nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq t]
    
    have h₂₄ : 4 * (1 + 2 * Real.sin t * Real.cos t) = (5 / 2 - (m : ℝ) / n + Real.sqrt k) ^ 2 := by
      nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq t]
    
    have h₂₅ : Real.sin t * Real.cos t = (Real.sin (2 * t)) / 2 := by
      have h₂₅₁ : Real.sin (2 * t) = 2 * Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by
        rw [Real.sin_two_mul]
        <;> ring_nf
      linarith
    
    have h₂₆ : 4 * (1 + 2 * ((Real.sin (2 * t)) / 2)) = (5 / 2 - (m : ℝ) / n + Real.sqrt k) ^ 2 := by
      rw [h₂₅] at h₂₄
      <;> ring_nf at h₂₄ ⊢
      <;> nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq (2 * t)]
    
    have h₂₇ : 4 + 4 * Real.sin (2 * t) = (5 / 2 - (m : ℝ) / n + Real.sqrt k) ^ 2 := by
      ring_nf at h₂₆ ⊢
      <;> nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq (2 * t)]
    
    have h₂₈ : Real.sin (2 * t) ≤ 1 := Real.sin_le_one (2 * t)
    have h₂₉ : Real.sin (2 * t) ≥ -1 := Real.neg_one_le_sin (2 * t)
    
    have h₃₀ : (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k = 1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by linarith
    have h₃₁ : (m : ℝ) / n = (1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t) + Real.sqrt k := by linarith
    have h₃₂ : Real.sqrt k = Real.sqrt 10 := by
      
      have h₃₃ : Real.sqrt k ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
      have h₃₄ : Real.sqrt 10 ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
      have h₃₅ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
      have h₃₆ : (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
      
      have h₃₇ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) ^ 2 = (k : ℝ) := by
        rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> norm_cast <;>
          (try norm_num at h₇ ⊢) <;>
          (try linarith) <;>
          (try nlinarith)
      have h₃₈ : (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ^ 2 = (10 : ℝ) := by
        rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> norm_num
      
      have h₃₉ : 1 + Real.sin t + Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t = 5 / 4 := by linarith
      have h₄₀ : 1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t = (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k := by linarith
      
      nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq t,
        Real.sqrt_nonneg (k : ℝ), Real.sqrt_nonneg (10 : ℝ),
        Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ (k : ℝ) by positivity),
        Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ (10 : ℝ) by positivity)]
    have h₃₃ : (k : ℝ) = 10 := by
      have h₃₄ : Real.sqrt k = Real.sqrt 10 := h₃₂
      have h₃₅ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) = Real.sqrt 10 := by exact_mod_cast h₃₄
      have h₃₆ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) ^ 2 = (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ^ 2 := by rw [h₃₅]
      have h₃₇ : (k : ℝ) = 10 := by
        have h₃₈ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) ^ 2 = (k : ℝ) := by
          rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> norm_cast <;>
            (try norm_num at h₇ ⊢) <;>
            (try linarith) <;>
            (try nlinarith)
        have h₃₉ : (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ^ 2 = (10 : ℝ) := by
          rw [Real.sq_sqrt] <;> norm_num
        nlinarith
      exact_mod_cast h₃₇
    have h₃₄ : k = 10 := by
      norm_cast at h₃₃ ⊢
      <;>
      (try norm_num at h₇ ⊢) <;>
      (try linarith) <;>
      (try nlinarith)
    exact h₃₄
  
  exact h₄

lemma m_eq_13 (k m n : ℕ) (t : ℝ)
    (h₀ : 0 < k ∧ 0 < m ∧ 0 < n) (h₁ : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
    (h₂ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4)
    (h₃ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = m / n - Real.sqrt k) :
    m = 13 := by
  have h₄ : m = 13 := by
    have h₅ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4 := h₂
    have h₆ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k := by
      exact_mod_cast h₃
    have h₇ : 0 < k := h₀.1

      have h₂₁ : (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
      
      have h₂₂ : (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k = (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) := by linarith
      have h₂₃ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4 := h₂
      
      have h₂₄ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = 1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by

      have h₂₅ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 1 + Real.sin t + Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by

        <;> ring_nf at h₃₁ ⊢

        ring_nf at h₃₃ ⊢
        <;> nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq (2 * t)]
      
      have h₃₅ : Real.sin (2 * t) ≤ 1 := Real.sin_le_one (2 * t)
      have h₃₆ : Real.sin (2 * t) ≥ -1 := Real.neg_one_le_sin (2 * t)
      
      have h₃₇ : (m : ℝ) / n - Real.sqrt k = 1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t := by linarith
      have h₃₈ : (m : ℝ) / n = (1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t) + Real.sqrt k := by linarith
      have h₃₉ : Real.sqrt k = Real.sqrt 10 := by

        have h₄₁ : Real.sqrt 10 ≥ 0 := Real.sqrt_nonneg _
        have h₄₂ : (Real.sqrt k : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity
        have h₄₃ : (Real.sqrt 10 : ℝ) ≥ 0 := by positivity

      have h₄₂ : k = 10 := by

      have h₄₄ : (m : ℝ) / n = (1 - Real.sin t - Real.cos t + Real.sin t * Real.cos t) + Real.sqrt k := by linarith
      have h₄₅ : Real.sqrt k = Real.sqrt 10 := by linarith

            sq_nonneg (Real.sin t - Real.cos t),

        linarith
      
      have h₄₈ : (m : ℝ) / n = 13 / 4 := h₄₇
      have h₄₉ : (n : ℝ) ≠ 0 := by

        <;>
        (try norm_num at h₉ ⊢) <;>
        (try linarith) <;>
        (try nlinarith)
      have h₅₀ : (m : ℝ) = (13 : ℝ) / 4 * n := by

        <;>

            have h₆₅ : (Nat.gcd m n) ≠ 1 := by

              omega
            exact h₆₅
          omega
        have h₅₃ : (n : ℕ) ≤ 4 := by
          omega
        have h₅₄ : (n : ℕ) ≥ 1 := by
          omega
        interval_cases n <;> norm_num at h₅₀ ⊢ <;>

  exact h₄

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

/-- Given that $(1+\sin t)(1+\cos t)=5/4$ and
:$(1-\sin t)(1-\cos t)=\frac mn-\sqrt{k},$
where $k, m,$ and $n_{}$ are [[positive integer]]s with $m_{}$ and $n_{}$ [[relatively prime]], find $k+m+n.$ Show that it is 027.-/
theorem aime_1995_p7 (k m n : ℕ) (t : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < k ∧ 0 < m ∧ 0 < n) (h₁ : Nat.gcd m n = 1)
    (h₂ : (1 + Real.sin t) * (1 + Real.cos t) = 5 / 4)
    (h₃ : (1 - Real.sin t) * (1 - Real.cos t) = m / n - Real.sqrt k) : k + m + n = 27 := by sorry

name: mathd_numbertheory_185
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  two_mul_mod_five_eq_one (n : ℕ) (h₀ : n % 5 = 3) : 2 * n % 5 = 1 := by
  have h₁ : 2 * n % 5 = 1 := by
    rw [← Nat.mod_add_div n 5]
    simp [h₀, Nat.mul_mod, Nat.add_mod, Nat.mod_mod] <;>
      norm_num <;>
      (try omega) <;>
      (try ring_nf at * <;> omega) <;>
      (try norm_num) <;>
      (try omega)
  exact h₁

theorem mathd_numbertheory_185 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : n % 5 = 3) : 2 * n % 5 = 1 := by
  exact two_mul_mod_five_eq_one n h₀

name: mathd_algebra_441

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  expr_eq_ten (x : ℝ) (h₀ : x ≠ 0) :
    12 / (x * x) * (x ^ 4 / (14 * x)) * (35 / (3 * x)) = 10 := by
  have h₂ : x ≠ 0 := h₀
  field_simp [h₂, mul_comm, mul_left_comm, mul_assoc] <;>
    ring_nf <;>
    norm_num <;>
    (try
      {
        ring_nf
        <;> field_simp [h₂]
        <;> ring_nf
        <;> norm_num
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        nlinarith [sq_pos_of_ne_zero h₂]
      })

theorem mathd_algebra_441 (x : ℝ) (h₀ : x ≠ 0) :
    12 / (x * x) * (x ^ 4 / (14 * x)) * (35 / (3 * x)) = 10 := by
  exact expr_eq_ten x h₀

    (3 * n + 18) % 9 = 0 := by
  obtain ⟨k, hk⟩ := h₁
  rw [hk]
  ring_nf
  <;> norm_num
  <;> omega

theorem mathd_numbertheory_582 (n : ℕ) (h₀ : 0 < n) (h₁ : 3 ∣ n) :
    (n + 4 + (n + 6) + (n + 8)) % 9 = 0 := by
  have h₂ := sum_eq n
  rw [h₂]
  exact three_mul_add_18_mod_9 n h₁

name: mathd_algebra_338
code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

lemma  a_eq_neg4 (a b c : ℝ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a + b + c = -3)
    (h₁ : a + 3 * b + c = 9)
    (h₂ : a + b + 3 * c = 19) :
    a = -4 := by
  have h₃ := h₁
  have h₄ := h₂
  have h₅ := h₀
  ring_nf at h₃ h₄ h₅ ⊢
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a + 4), sq_nonneg (b - 2), sq_nonneg (c - 7)]

lemma b_eq_two (a b c : ℝ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a + b + c = -3)
    (h₁ : a + 3 * b + c = 9)
    (h₂ : a + b + 3 * c = 19)
    (ha : a = -4) :
    b = 2 := by
  have h₃ := h₁
  have h₄ := h₂
  have h₅ := h₀
  rw [ha] at h₃ h₄ h₅
  ring_nf at h₃ h₄ h₅ ⊢
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (b - 2), sq_nonneg (c - 7)]

lemma c_eq_seven (a b c : ℝ)
    (h₀ : 3 * a + b + c = -3)
    (h₁ : a + 3 * b + c = 9)
    (h₂ : a + b + 3 * c = 19)
    (ha : a = -4) (hb : b = 2) :
    c = 7 := by
  have h₃ := h₂
  have h₄ := h₀
  have h₅ := h₁
  rw [ha, hb] at h₃ h₄ h₅
  ring_nf at h₃ h₄ h₅ ⊢
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (c - 7)]

lemma prod_eq_neg56 (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : a = -4) (hb : b = 2) (hc : c = 7) :
    a * b * c = -56 := by
  rw [ha, hb, hc]
  <;> norm_num

theorem mathd_algebra_338 (a b c : ℝ) (h₀ : 3 * a + b + c = -3) (h₁ : a + 3 * b + c = 9)
    (h₂ : a + b + 3 * c = 19) : a * b * c = -56 := by
  have ha : a = -4 := a_eq_neg4 (a:=a) (b:=b) (c:=c) h₀ h₁ h₂
  have hb : b = 2 := b_eq_two (a:=a) (b:=b) (c:=c) h₀ h₁ h₂ ha
  have hc : c = 7 := c_eq_seven (a:=a) (b:=b) (c:=c) h₀ h₁ h₂ ha hb
  have hprod : a * b * c = -56 := prod_eq_neg56 (a:=a) (b:=b) (c:=c) ha hb hc
  linarith
